string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Haha! Just tell me what to do, and I'll do it!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: We huskies don't have hands! Bark!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore... woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: How about a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't you ever want to do anything else?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand a word you say!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest now!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... All this lying around is making me fat....

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Hey, it's something I'm good at!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Don't you want to play with me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii…

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: One more of that and I'll ignore you!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahh… I must have drank too much.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to pee in public?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: No, I don't need to now.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Wow! I must have drank a lot!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to pee here…

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you pee in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to pee all the time?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Ah, that's so nice of you!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Then why don't you feed me?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Hmm, I feel all warm inside.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't think that you do!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master I could hope for!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! what about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I sure am a lucky monkey!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love eating more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You probably love your new weapon more!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! I'm good at this!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Monkeys don't stand... we hang by our tails!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired from running after you all day!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: I think I see some food over there…

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love it when you talk to me! Ki ki…

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say at all.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: You can do quest instead of just killing monsters all the time.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkey's are the best pet there is, I think so anyway…

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Don't you hate people that don't take care of their pets?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What's a monkey got to say?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't keep me fed, I'll run away to the circus!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Please try to appreciate me while I'm around, I don't live forever you know?

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you talk to someone else?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm sure you can find someone else to talk to.

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I want to play all day long!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: How about we go somewhere else first?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: But I'm too hungry to play…

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: How can I sleep on an empty tummy?

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Yawn... It is time for bed…

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to climb trees!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: If you don't want to train, I'll just go alone!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to stuff me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a better Master than that!

string.name: s4
string.value: Oh no! I can't hear such bad words!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: The ground is nice and warm here.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Trying to lure me into a trap? I don't think so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No pillow, so I can't sit.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You picked the perfect time to relax, Master!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Time to chill. Got any Mapleade?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: All I need now is a snack...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Look a bit closer, you'll see why I'm not sitting.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Did you see the sign? "Porcupines forbidden to sit".

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If only I had a chair...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Somehow, I will blame you for this.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Quit looking at me like that.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Nonsense-you told me to do it!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: No way is this my fault, no way!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Don't be mad with me, Master!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Blaming me again? I refuse to cover for you this time!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Wait, I have something for you...the world's smallest violin.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: When in a fit, just knit!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll finish the socks I was making for you!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I just got the best cloth...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You threw away the last thing I made...

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I got a new design to show you!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Time to make my Master a new pair of undies!

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Maybe I'll make you a pair of pants...

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: How about a sock...in the mouth?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: If the knit don't fit, it's time to quit!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: What do you think I am, an animal?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I hope someone steps in it!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: There's some on your shoe if you're looking for it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You want me to stink up the joint? No!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Nothing compares to the feeling of a great dump. Nothing!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to make a "prickly bush".

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: This is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Fresh out. Try back later-like after dinner.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I could end battles with this gas...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough get going!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Do not ever mistake me for a hedgehog.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: The Mapler next to me is almost broke.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Doesn't that guy owe you money?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I charge 5000 mesos per word. Pay up.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: No time like the present! Let's go!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I could get used to this...

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You never know what's around the corner-be prepared!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll talk when golden pigs fly.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My spikes are sharp-if you lean close, I can give you a shave.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love it when you level!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: When the going gets tough, I've seen you run away. Fast.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You don't need a breath mint, you just need to get socked in the face with a mint glove.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Say something? How about "I'm not talking right now?"

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Put your mesos where your mouth is!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There is no spark in our relationship.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Amusing. Do you do tricks, too?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can see it in your eyes...it's not true!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I've waited so long to hear you say that!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Your love keeps me going, Master!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you just as much!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can feel a spark-no, wait. Something was in my foot...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: How funny! HAHAH-wait, you were serious?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've got a lotta love to spread around!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I feel a bit uncomfortable now...

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I should throw one at you...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I've got all the pins you need!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Why do you hurt me so?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I got plenty of sleep last night.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: The ground is cold and hard, I'm not sleeping here!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: *YAWN* I think I'm ready for bed.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: So now you notice I'm tired?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No way, you're going to try something.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Yea, right, sleep. I don't need any.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I knew I could do it!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Your orders aren't exactly clear you know...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You talk, I ignore you-it's a great combo!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Who's the brains behind this operation again?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I guarantee this is your fault.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm a stickler for perfection. HA!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Porcupines do not speak that language.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Tell me how good I look...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: What do I look like? A store?

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: You need more than a comb.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's mine, and you can't have it.

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: Got a camera? I'm going to strike a pose.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I love being one of the beautiful people!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: You can't have mine, get your own.

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: I need coconut milk before I do anything.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Have you fed your porcupine today?

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I love to play with this ball!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Ninja do not reveal themselves in the day time.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: What make you think I can do that?

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Try again. This time with FEELING!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: And I would do this because...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Um, did you run over that?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: But I'm not hungry..I don't want to eat!! Waahhh!!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: Hey, let's not get mean here!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: How can you say such a thing!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: ...my love for you melts with each tear...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Joke? You didn't mean it... right?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I am so hurt right now...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Watch that mouth--unless you want a snowball in it.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You need a new haircut, but I'm not saying anything.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me? That was mean...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Think snowballs don't hurt? Say that again and find out.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I hear Maple Claws is bringing you coal this year...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I'm so hot right now, I feel like melting!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You just told me you loved me!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't know what love is.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Now that just made my day~

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Ahhhh... nothing feels quite like being loved~

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Thank you... for loving me so much!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I love you too! It's the holiday spirit!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You should only say that to someone you really love.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You just told me you didn't like me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I know you love me. I can feel it~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: That just made me feel awesome... I feel like flying~~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I love you too~ Tis the season of love!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You just love me for my snow.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm too cold to appreciate that.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sorry, the snowman you're trying to reach isn't here. Leave a message after the beep... BEEP.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for this! Merry Christmas!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Did you get some nice Christmas presents?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I've been good this year. I hope Maple Claws will give me some presents this year!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Hope you get some awesome Christmas presents this year!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Christmas is upon is, and I hope you find your true love this year!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No presents? Then feed me--we'll call it even.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Merry Christmas to your friends and family!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Did you get a lot of presents?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Hope you enjoy a very Merry Christmas!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You can celebrate later. Let's do something else now.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: And you didn't get me anything. Sometimes I wonder where you are in this relationship.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: No presents? Are you kidding me?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Advice: Snowman + Christmas + No Presents = Failure.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: What do you think of my eyes? Aren't they just adorable?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'll do some cutesy stuff, as long as you give me some presents~

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Get me the latest copy of Snowman Styles, and I'll do it.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Um...just because you said so? Please.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: The best I got right now...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: You like? I think I'm pretty cute...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm tired. I need some rest.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You know you like me~ I like you too!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You know what's cute? Balrogs. Let's go hunt some!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Yeah, whatever. You just want something from me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I just want to rest. Maybe later.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What are you doing? I did nothing wrong.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Say it again! SAY. IT. AGAIN.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I won't ever do it again...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do you want me to hit you with a snowball?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: That's it. Let's take this outside.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I won't ever do it aga--hahahaha! Sorry, couldn't hold it in.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I dare you to say that again!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Please forgive me. It's really my fault.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'll be good. I'm a good snowman.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I won't go against you. I'll behave.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I am not in a good mood. Don't push me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'll throw some snowballs at you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I double dare you to say that again!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Did you get a lot of Christmas presents?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Winter's the best time of the year. I hate summer...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't talk just because you tell me to.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You don't have friends, right? Why do you keep bothering me?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I'm right at home in El Nath!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You're such an awesome friend. Let's go hunting!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Am I the only friend you have?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Hah... no, I won't say anything.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I don't feel like talking. Let's go hunting.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: I'm so cool...sorry, I had to!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Loved by many, appreciated by few. That's the life of a snowman for you.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Isn't Christmas awesome? What do you feel like getting?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Are you bored? Well, I'm not.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: If you hang out with me more, then I'll talk.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: How many Caramel Onions did you eat? I can smell your breath from here!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: You told me to talk, and here you are, not listening. I'm hurt.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I'm tired... I need some sleep.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We did hunt a lot today... let's get some sleep.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: How did you know I was tired?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Hey, I was dozing off until now! I wanna play!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I am soooo tired right now... zzzzz

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I can't sleep. Let's go somewhere!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I can't sleep! I am too excited about those presents!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Did you see it? Or was it too fast for you?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: What do you think? Don't I look awesome?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I refuse to change on an empty stomach.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can do that! Look at me!!!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Pay attention, because you might miss it!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Nice, huh? There's nothing quite like it!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why? Because you said so? Pfft...

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't you do it for once? There's a change for you!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Think it's that easy? I'd like to see you try!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Awesome! There's nothing quite like icicles!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Oh yeah! I love people that feed me!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is nasty. Do I look like a Turkey to you?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, KROWL? Like this? Easy... KROWL

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, KROWL? Give me something harder, KROWL...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, KROWL.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, KROWL~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: It's not coming out well, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, KROWL...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...KROWL...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! KROWL!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...KROWL

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That sounds good! I felt like resting anyway~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yawwwn ... I feel like going to bed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It'd be nice to take a nap under the sun.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ahhh, I told you I'm bored!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't like being bored. Let's do something!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: How about leveling up? Need my help?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ooohhh... where's a nice comfy cushion when I need one?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sounds like music to my ear. I needed some rest!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No, play with me! Play with me!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Tell that to a lazy fat pig, not to a tiger like me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, KROWL...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, KROWL!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What? I can't believe you said that...KROWL!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you really mean that? KROWL?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! KROWL!!!!!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I know you say this every now and then, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Success_04Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: The next time you say that, I may really flip out on you!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap right now... KROWL...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, KROWL~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...KROWL...!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to talk? I'm a tiger, KROWL!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! KROWL!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? KROWL~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...KROWL...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How's Ludibrium? I heard that place is nice...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I'm hungry, why doncha just feed me?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You must be really really really bored...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't hear you~ I can't hear you~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking today.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: My gosh, I feel ...really... sad right now.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Even I have to admit, THIS is a sad look...

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't YOU do it, stupid!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'll just leave my paws out here and wait for ya~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to know how long I should wait here?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Okay~ I'll sit here and wait!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll just sit here and wait til you come back, master~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Arrgh...I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Wonderful, I was almost out of breath.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sure, I was tired at any rate.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood to rest quite yet.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Not a bad spot, I suppose...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You can't hear them, but my legs send their gratitude.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Maybe you need a break, but I don't.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Thanks for your concern, but I'm fine.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Do not pin your need for rest on me. If you are tired, sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, you lead me around. What do you expect?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: This is what happens when you don't feed me.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Oh I'm sorry, did your weapon get in the way of my tail?

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Your initial reaction denotes you're not a happy camper.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: My sorrow lingers like a spoiled pie within my belly.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: Sincerest apologies, my friend. It won't happen again.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Don't blame me--I did think of that!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: My fault? I think not, kind sir.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Again, you place fault where none exists.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Yea right. Try giving me a task I can do.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If I've hurt you, I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: A mistake on my part, I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: You assume that something has gone wrong.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What if I wanted to do that? Exactly...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Maybe if I sprayed you accidentally...you'd see it my way.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Civil Disobedience is every Skunk's right!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Lounging...an activity suited for the wise and well-off Skunk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is an activity I'll gladly do.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Only thing I need now is a snack...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Let me know when we hit the beach, and I'll think about it.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: One can often find comfort in the small things.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Nothing like good company and a good snack!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Definitely more than a drop in the bucket.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Without toilet paper? You must think me undignified!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I need food before I need to relive myself.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Skunks only have gas. You know this.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Not too shabby, if I do say so myself!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Find a Husky if you wish to be vulgar.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Skunks have too much pride to relieve themselves in the open!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My gift left in there is best known as a sight unseen.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Not too hard, not too soft. Perfect.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Um, that was a bit wet. I'm so embarrassed.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I think I broke the toilet...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'll keep my dignity, thank you.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I flushed your request down the toilet where it belongs.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Was that some kind of obnoxious joke?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Perhaps you have me confused with another animal...

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You're taller than I, but not as tall as a Yeti. With or without Pepe.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Apparently, you never seem to get wet after swimming in Aqua Road.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Fun Fact: I'm an omnivore, not a vegetarian.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I prefer to be alone, but I've grown rather fond of you...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There are no words I have to express my disdain at your previous request.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: The true measure of a Mapler can be found not when they're at their best, but at their worst.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Fun Fact: Skunks actually enjoy walks on the beach.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: When are we visiting the Affluent Tower in New Leaf City?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Often times, I ask myself, what exactly is in the special sauce?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Next thing, you'll be asking me to play fetch!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Yes, I can talk. Get over it.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Sometimes, just sometimes, I smile at you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I only spray my enemies as a last resort.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Fun Fact: I'm pretty close to blind. I just hear extremely well.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Friends don't let Friends say "Mesos plox".

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't make me get anal on you.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I got nothing for you. Nothing!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: In order to speak, I need energy. For energy, I must eat. Is that clear?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I think I'm ready for something new.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I try to keep an open mind about these things.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'd believe your words, yet your actions lie.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Let me guess, Moony divorced you.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm quite easy to fall in love with.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: All it takes is a few weeks.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I feel something for you too.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm beginning to feel something...gas! Did you think it was something else?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No, you just think you do.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: My heart beats a tiny bit faster whenever you're near.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I only wish I could better show the depths of my affection for you.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I'm just not ready for that kind of commitment yet.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You just love me for my tail.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Fascinating...you have fallen in love with a Skunk!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I feel a lot closer to you, now.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I wanted a hug from you, too.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hugging is a talent, and you definitely got it!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: No food, no hug. Simple concept.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: It's a rare treat to find one who can express so much through a hug.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Space is what I need right now. Thanks for understanding.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm of the mind that we can express ourselves...at a distance.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: That's just not what I'm looking for right now.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Should've laid off those cherry pies. And grilled cheese. And Cakes. And...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: So...what are you trying to say?!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I believe the proper term is overweight.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Let me know when you see a fat skunk.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Gaining weight is fun, but keeping it on isn't.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: And I thought I actually lost weight...

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Nothing but roots and berries from here on out!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Right. Time to polish your glasses.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: The fault lies not just with me, but with you as well.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I can find it, just bear with me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I think it's over here, wait. Never mind.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: One does not insult a skunk, for various reasons.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: There's something around here..I know it!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I feel like I'm closing in on something...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I feel bad, thanks a lot!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: It's not easy being me, you could be nicer!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Stop. It's not what you think it is.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What, may I ask, did you expect?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: You should try smelling yours one day.

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: You know, your breath isn't exactly 'sweet-smelling' either.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I ate snail burgers. Sue me.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I do not have bad breath!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Ready for a night on the town?

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Long night last night, so I need rest.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Uh, that other Skunk did it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Would you rather have it out here or indoors.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: And what? Yours smells like roses and chocolate?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Contrary to popular belief, yours stink too.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Why don't you nap with me?

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I can go all day and all night!

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: I'm going to get some zzzz.

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Got to keep an eye out for monsters...

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: The ground is too hard here.

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: It's a bit cold here for me.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: I guess this is as good a spot as any...

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm the best. You know this.

string.name: c34_s1
string.value: When the going gets tough, the tough call a skunk!

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Boldness isn't always a strong suit.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: Stop trying to kiss my tail.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: So, what are you really after?

string.name: c35_s1
string.value: Hold on, getting some dirt off my shoulder.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Remember, you're dealing with the best.

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Flattery is often seen as a ploy of those with nothing else to offer.

string.name: c35_f2
string.value: There's a point where flattery begins to sound hollow.

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're after, but you won't get it from me.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: A meal fit for a ruffian. Take it away!

string.name: s2
string.value: Kyuu... I am not gonna say that.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am not the kind of Rabbit who speaks of evil words,~

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: No! No! Kino doesn't want to sit down!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to rest right now.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Do you want some juice too?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Glass of juice in the relaxer?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Kino doesn't just sit on the street.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Kino wants to rest. You should sit down too.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, so comfortable. Shall we have a glass of juice?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Kino will wait here and have some juice.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I am going to get some sleep.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Kino does not want to sit.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No! No! Kino will not sit!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you do this to Kino? *Boo hoo*

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Argh! Don't hit me! It hurts!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm gonna hate you! Hitting is BAD!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you yell at me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You get mad at me? I hate you!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Did you just yell at me? HOW COULD YOU???

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you yell at me?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not okay to poop at everywhere!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I haven't eaten enough to poop.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: What poo? I need a refreshing glass of juice.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Kino does not poo just anywhere.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't just poo anywhere. It's embarrassing.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You go first. I will go after you.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, master.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Would you like a glass of cool juice?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Kino is going to bed now.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Comfortable blanket, take me to dreamland.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm going to bed. Please don't wake me.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: A refreshing juice in a comfortable chair...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Do you know what's in my bag?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Kino would like to relax on the relaxer.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Let's go for an exciting adventure!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't know anything about that.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: What? What are you saying? Kino doesn't know anything.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Kino want to go on a journey with you!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I am little tired today. How about you?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I think I'm a little hungry. Just a little.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Kino does not wish to speak.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I want to sit in the relaxer and have a refreshing juice.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you want to hear a funny story?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: No, no! Kino will not talk!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What? Kino has to speak just because you say so?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Bring a sparkling rock if you want to confess your love to me.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I can't stop thinking about you, master!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Your words are so sweet, I don't know what to do.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I need to sit and rest for a bit.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Kino looks cute sticking tongue out.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't want to do such things.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Meh! Even Kino's tongue is cute!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Kino is good at sticking tongue out.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Oh! I don't know such words.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Give me something delicious if you are going to make me do that.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: No, no! Kino will not stick tongue out!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Kino looks cute sticking tongue out.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Kino's best expression is with tongue.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I don't do this all the time.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I am not doing it right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: No! No! Kino is not doing it.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I'm gonna get some rest. I am tired today.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Woo hoo! Transform into a Zombie Mushroom!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: It's no fun if I transform all the time.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: No, I can't just SHOW you.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: It's no fun if I do it all the time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Blech, how could you give me such an awful thing like this

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I do this for you, you do something else for me. Deal?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't hear you. Speak up!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is an easy, easy command. Pssh.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just about to sit, but not because you ordered me to.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is why I carry around a chair at all times.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I am not used to sitting around a place like this...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Do you think I only do things at your command?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Have you seen my chair? You know I can't sit without one.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: You know you want to sit, too. Too bad this chair has a weight limit!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Hey, I looked up advanced robots online and saw an awesome movie. Did you see it?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I'm not trying as tall as you. I'm just...used to sitting here.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: That was the one command I didn't want to hear today.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Why don't you go dance with hectors first?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Don't tell me to do things I don't want to do!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm not sleepy. I want to do something else.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'm going to sleep now. See you tomorrow.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: There's nothing like sleeping at home...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Did you secretly upload a sleeping program to my system? Why do I feel so sleepy?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll need to sleep now. My skin needs it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't like sleeping. I like playing with you.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: It's still bright outside. Why do you want me to sleep?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Can we do something other than sleep?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I don't want to sleep. I want to play around with you.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm going to dream about flying tonight! Zzzzzzz

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Ah, it's time to go to bed already. Good night!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I wanted to hang out with you more...but I'm so sleepy...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Shhh, I think there's a monster around the area.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I need a lullaby to fall asleep...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What made you so mad at me?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don't talk like that. I'm scared.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Do you really want to yell at me like that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You were going to hit me. Ahhh!!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Why do you make me cry?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You need to tell me what I did wrong...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You're the only one I've got...I feel like crying now.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll do better next time...but what exactly do I have to do better?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you have to talk to me like that?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Don't let your frustrations out on me. Do it on the monsters!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: What exactly did I do wrong?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You must be bored, aren't you?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Hey, I'm the most obedient robot you'll ever find.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: What are you trying to say?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I love you like a computer loves it's monitor.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh... that just made my day.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Good, if you want to be in my good graces, this is the way to do it.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Wait, can you say that one more time?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Hey, a joke is a joke. Make it sound like one.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You are NOT the first person to say that... but thanks anyways.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: It's so hard to be loved by people...I must have a talent for that.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You don't need to say that out loud. I know you do.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now. So many people keep telling me they love me.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I want to hear that from a hot robot!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: That's the 234234th time I heard that. Sigh.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: That's what Bloctopus told me last night.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You didn't just say what I think you did...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: What have I done to deserve this?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You seem more stupid than I am...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I am not stupid! I am smart!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: What makes you think you can say that?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Keep telling me that, and one day I'll run away!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I just saved that in my memory bank. I'll keep that in mind.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Can't we just all get along?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Look, if I had a single digit IQ, I'd be mad too. It's ok.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Ok, genius. What's the last digit of Pi? Thought so...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I am much smarter than you.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Are you having fun tormenting me?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really? Is it really that fun to make fun of me?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me? I'm nice and good looking.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Even a heart of steel like mine will crack if you keep saying that.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'll hate you for that. Seriously.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I'll be better. Don't hate me.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Bring it on! Bring it on!!!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I'm ready to fire away! Muahahah!!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Isn't it beautiful outside? Let's walk around.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I believe in peace, not war.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I'll attack. You go pick up the items.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Show me if you can find someone who can shoot better than me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I don't need to aim. I'll just fire away!!!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Hmmm...my tail seems to be working well.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Lalala! What did you just say?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's so nice outside. Let's go camping!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Press 1 to speak to a talking robot, press 0 to repeat the message.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you think I can meet up with other robots like me at Ludibrium?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: What's the tallest tower in the world? Eos Tower, of course!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I think I am by far the best looking robot here...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Do you need someone to talk to?

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I don't think I can talk to you...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to know how smart I am? Much smarter than you!!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Any hot robots around here? I can't find any...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I am so lonely. Introduce me to other robots!!!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Dragon Roar!!!! Wait, why can't I do this?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm sorry I only have one mouth to speak.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I can't express myself with words...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Promise me to show me if you ever run across an amazing part for robots!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: A few days ago, I saw this incredible thing that's covered in gold light. He seemed quite familiar...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I talked to Jr. Balrog yesterday, and he wanted to have a word with you...alone.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Arwen, Rowen, and Mar are in a love triangle. Why? Because of me!!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Did I sleep too late last night? I'm tired.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Arwen said she likes quiet men.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Did I talk too much today? I feel like my wires have burnt out for the day.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Let's stop talking and start hunting.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Just tell me where the monsters are.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How about transforming in the morning, afternoon, and nighttime?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: This isn't fun. I don't want to do it.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Now transforming to the hottest robot in this world.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I deal with the monsters. You deal with the items.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Size has nothing to do with power.

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: You know, I can't do EVERYTHING for you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I don't care if you call me a bad robot.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I say no to anyone that orders me to do something.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Now transforming to the most powerful, spectacular, amazing, sexiest robot ever!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I bet you no one else can do this!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Now transforming to...Meso Rangers!!! Wait, that's not it.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: More than meets the--wait...I can't say that!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I don't think you realize just how hard it is to transform.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Dude...do you want eat some of this iron fists?

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Do you realize how stupid I feel firing away at nothing?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: What are you trying to do?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: My batteries have been charged already.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am at my happiest eating.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: It's not time to charge batteries yet!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: How did you know I was so hungry?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I know I can eat a lot, but not THAT much.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Congratulations! You're still a long way from my level, though!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Are you bored? What are you doing?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: I think I saw something blink...hey, are you alright?

string.name: e_prelevelup
string.value: A little more, and you'll level up! Keep going!

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't have any HP potions to give you. Check your inventory.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't have any MP potions to give you. Check your inventory.
You don't look too good... maybe you should change your skin color.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #23.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #234.
It's time for a phone call from my lover #2567.
My goal is to make 10,000 lovers. You?
Would it look weird if I wear an earring?
Hey what's the most popular style in Henesys these days? Don't tell me it's what you're wearing...
Do you understand how many dates I have to decline in order to be with you?
I only talk to you so you won't get too bored.
Hey, whatever I told you right now is a secret, okay?
I like hanging out with you!
Why do women love small, shiny objects?
Don't you remember struggling against snails?
We've been walking too much. Let's go to Aqua Road and rest.
If you know any nice restaurants, take me there!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.

Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.
