string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Don't you like how I do all this for you?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Wow, you really want to hold my hand?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hands? I only have feet... Shoooo...

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Do I have to give you my hand when you're asking for it? Nah...

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Are you trying to play rock paper and scissors?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Am I sweet or what? Love me!!!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, aren't you the nice one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Here...I think my right hand looks better than left.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You don't even help me get a pedicure on my nails.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Here! Please help me get a pedicure.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sleepy...why are you asking this to me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I know what you mean. I understand...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You were scolding me just now, and now you love me? Whatever.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Have you been secretly liking me for a while?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Seriously, is that all you got? Find another way to say that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I think you're really into me now. Muahahaha.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Oh wow, my face is turning red.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I really really love you, too.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Do you need me for a favor? I won't do it.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I love someone else. I'm sorry.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wow...I can feel your love penetrating through my heart...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I love you, master! I really do!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't feel the love. I'm hungry.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I thought you were dating someone. Pssshhh..

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You're empty handed. You expect me to accept you without anything?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I've heard that quite often, but...you're not my type.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I know I have a luscious voice. If you really want to hear it...ahem.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to talk to other people, too.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I am a robot. That's it.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I need to be greased up. I feel clunky.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You said that I was too loud. Sheesh, make up your mind.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go see other places. Take me take me!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Really...I can't stand you... NOT! You know I love you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Who are you? And who am i??

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I want something delicious...and I want a shirt or two...Can you pay for them?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say...why don't you say something instead?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I am tired! I talked a lot! It's your turn!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I have a wish...will you do it for me?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You are an awesome friend of mine! Thanks!!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: So you haven't forgotten me...we need more time to talk like this!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Wow...why does it feel like whenever you ask me to say something, I get tired all of a sudden?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? What did you say? I didn't hear you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking right now. Maybe some other time.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Shhhh...I can't say this right now. I'll tell you later.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Boom chiki! Boom chiki! Ready to fire!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Don't I look awesome like this?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm ready now. Just say go!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Move everyone! Mad robot in town!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Target in play. Ready to fire.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Guns ready. Arms ready. Legs ready. Let's roll!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Beep! Beep! Sigh, I'm too old now.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I AM TIRED! Let me just sleep.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Okay, which weapon should I use?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look at this posture. Isn't it awesome? No one will be able to go up against me!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I've been waiting for a day like this! Ready for attack!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: What? What do you want me to do?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Where's my weapon? I can't find it!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I think it's time for me to get some rest. Sigh...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's have a shut eye for a second.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: It's not time yet. You go sleep first.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am not ready to sleep yet. I'm ready to fire away!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: You always tell me to sleep.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Oh no, it's time already. Time to go to bed!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: That was a long day. Good night!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey isn't it too early to go to bed?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don't sleep! Just replace the batteries for me!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am too full to sleep!

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I'll sleep later. You go ahead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Lend me an arm so I can sleep on it!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Isn't it way too early for bed?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I don't want to get fat by sleeping all the time.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I heard too much sleeping will kill you...seriously...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I need to level up! I have no time to sleep!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: That was good. I am full now!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Seriously...do I look like someone that's hungry?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: My level of contentment has just increased.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: My level of discontent has just increased. Buzz off.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey you might die now. Go get some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the HP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: I don't think you have the MP potions. I can't feed you what you don't have.
I feel like crap right now...
So breezy around here...ahhh, I like it.
I want a pudding that looks like a slime!
I feel off right now. I want to go to the Sleepywood Sauna for some rest. You know you can recover HP and MP much faster there, right?
Don't you think I'm the bomb?
No one can duplicate items or mesos. Watch out for those crooks!
Password? I won't tell you mine! Of course not!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Kling klang! At your command, master.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Kling klang! Just input the right command, and I'll do the rest.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Perfect command. You are a computer master! Kling klang!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Beep beep! An error has occurred.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Kling klang! I won't site until you sit first.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: An error has occurred! Please double check the command. Beep! Beep!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: "Sit" is such a great keyword for all pets... Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Oh oops! I almost farted while sitting down. Kling klang!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: You know exactly what I want. I really wanted to sit right now...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hmmm...an important program that lets me sit is corrupt. I can't do it..heh

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I want to talk today, master, beep beep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Beep beep! Grrr...I can't move right now due to an error.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Make me move first. I don't see a lot of effort on your part.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh!! I almost cramped up my legs.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Like this? Precise commands yield smart pets like me.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I feel too weak to stand.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You just told me to sit. Jeez! Make up your mind!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: How many times do I have to tell you? You're saying it all wrong!

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: I'm in tip top shape right now. I'll follow your command.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Beep beep beep...ahh I gotta just sit.

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: My body's not functioning right today. Just let it go.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Master, you have been verified! Will stand now!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you my master? Enter your ID and PW.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get another pet with a different color? I can read your mind, you know.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Due to system overload, I cannot process commands for the rest of the day. Time for me to rest.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I want love and affection from my master. What's wrong with you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are a bigger dummy than I am.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Who? What? What did you say?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you say so...then it is so...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I am a fool for your love, master.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I don't understand what you're saying.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Now you're saying this. Do I look that easy?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Unrecognizable word. I don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I may be dumb, but I still follow your commands.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: If I got fixed on time...I'd be the best robot in this world.

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Stupid...? What do I need, a virus scan? Run it right now!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Master, you must be afraid of me.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: First time hearing it. I can't find the resulting value for that command.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: If you don't like me... then oh well, good riddance.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: An error has occurred. Please leave. Beep beep!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong...? Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I won't do that again. Please love me. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm sorry. I'll be better next time. Shooooo...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm only doing this to catch your attention. Shoooo...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't do anything wrong!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: My ears hurt... Stop nagging on me, master!!!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I hate you! You keep ragging on me for no reason!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Is that some foreign language? I don't understand a word of what you're saying...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do that on purpose.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Are you really mad? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Are you messing with me? What did I do wrong?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: So you're in a bad mood...that doesn't mean you can go off on me like that!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying right now.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I did nothing wrong! It's all you!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: That was my bad. I won't ever do that again.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'll do better now. Please don't hate me!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are you just trying to pick something with me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master, you need to loosen up a bit!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Seriously, it's really not that serious.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was trying to apologize, but I don't like your attitude.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: e_levelup
string.value: Wow! Congratulations on leveling up! You look that much more powerful now!

string.name: e_rest
string.value: Master... did you just leave me out here in the cold again?

string.name: e_HPAlert
string.value: Hey hey...you might die! Take some potions.

string.name: e_NOHPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough HP potions. Go get some!

string.name: e_NOMPPotion
string.value: Hey, I don't think you have enough MP potions. Go get some!
Will I see her at the gym today?
Oh no... I almost stepped on that snail!
For some reason, I feel drawn to the Krakian Jungle...
Bananas are a Gorilla's best friend!
Be nice to your friends! Don't fight over items!

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: Fight on until you level up.

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Fight on until you level up.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You can begin a quest by talking to an NPC who has a blinking light bulb above his/her head.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You can begin a quest by talking to an NPC who has a blinking light bulb above his/her head.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I think I love you too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I think I love you too.

string.name: s1
string.value: You shouldn't use that kind of language.

string.name: c1_s3
string.value: How did you know my legs hurt?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: Let me know the last time you've seen a reindeer sit.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: Me? Sit here? I'm going to get dirty, then.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: I can only sit on top of a clean field of snow, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Oh, this is a perfect place to sit!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm going to sit back, relax and enjoy the show.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: So then, you were all like "Sit" and I did it. w00t!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm really tired. I think it's a perfect time to sit.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Did you just order me to do something?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am a revered pet. Don't like it? Get a dog.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I am not like other pets. I sit when I want to!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My knees are creaking from all that walking. A non-running reindeer is toast!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Good, I felt like sitting down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No way! Not on the bare ground!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Treat me with respect!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you give me commands.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Thanks. Finally time for some rest.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm soooo tired, I feel like falling asleep.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ahhhh, it's been a loooong day.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay, now that I'm sitting down, you got something to tell me?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I don't understand why you'd want me to sit all of a sudden...

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I am not tired, thank you very much.

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Why are you so mad at me...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville. Don't yell at me!

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Take a look at yourself in the mirror first.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me...?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong... sniff sniff...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm going to tell Santa what you're doing to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why are you yelling at me? I don't understand what I did wrong.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: This is how you treat me all the time. I don't buy it.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't have a problem. I think it's you with a problem.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You don't need to raise your voice to get your message across... sniff sniff..

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Don't yell at me... you're scaring me...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. I swear.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: What do you think you're doing yelling at me?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm going back to Santa's house... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Why do you keep picking on me... sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm the most revered pet in Happyville... why...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop talking to me in gibberish!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What in the world are you saying...?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a noogie?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're trying to do...

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Since when did I do stuff like that?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I gave Santa a hug?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: What are you going to do? You can't stop me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't do anything stupid here. You're embarassing me.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: So, wanna hear about the time I left Santa a present?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing that.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No, it adds wrinkles to my face.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This one time, at reindeer camp, I ate a cookie.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Meh. That guy needs a new haircut.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ugh. Tell her to get her hair done!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Since when did I do juvenile things like this?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Your desperate attempts for my attention is not working.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: You'll see the REAL me now... ahhh!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Um.. I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm too tired to do this right now.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes yes, I am good at this.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look closely. This is a momentous occasion, you know.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: What do you want me to do??

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: More than meets the--Oops. Can't say that!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I feel something holy going around here.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Allow me to show you who I really am. Tada!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm too young to do that just yet.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'm too tired to do it. Seriously.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like doing anything right now. I'll do it later.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I look awesome right now. I don't need to do that.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Time for me to dust off my go-to move.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Don't you wish you could do this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Allow me to show you why I'm the most revered pet in Happyville.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I have no idea what you want me to do.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am a revered pet from Happyville. I do not take any orders from anyone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Um... excuse me? What did you just say?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I am too hot. Seriously, way too hot.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't touch me. I'm not in a mood.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Now that makes me feel great today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: La la la what a wonderful day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I think you're the only one feeling good today.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What makes you feel so good there?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Just thinking about that makes my day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I hope you have a great day today!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Are you going out with someone?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I had a sweet dream, you know?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Of course I'm happy. I'm with you!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I feel so blessed right now.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Did you do well on the exam? No way.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With me, you'll never get bored!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I am so happy to hear that!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Don't just say it. Show me!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't just love anybody, you know.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I think we're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Just look at me. Nobody else, okay?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Keep saying that. I like hearing that.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: You can't just say that. You'll have to show me you love me.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but I have someone else in mind.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I understand that you love me, but I don't think it's time.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Hey, you are already seeing someone anyway!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I will love you til the end of the road.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I am way too popular for my own good.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: What makes you think you're worthy of my love?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Whoa...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Are you trying to tell me you love me??

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Do you want to hear a story about the Snow Queen? Once upon a time...

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Do you want to hear more? Okay here we go...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You like my stories? I ever tell you about the Snow Queen?

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: For some strange reason, I feel at home in El Nath...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What exactly do you want me to say?

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I'm too thirsty to say anything right now.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to humans.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Once upon a time, in a snow castle far, far away...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Okay so do you want to know where I came from? I'm from the west.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Passion, vigor, and pride! That's the reindeer way!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This year, Santa said I could take the holidays off, so here I am!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Today's not the best day to chat.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I am hungry, and I am tired. Let's talk next time.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I don't feel like saying anything.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: My crystal form is a lot like the Glimmer Man's.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Are you ready for an all-night chat fest?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: You know, I have some funny stories you'll love to hear.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Okay, then here's a story about the snow castle I used to live in. Way back in the day...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I am the most revered pet in Happyville. I only talk when I feel like talking.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Uh.... What? I don't understand your moonspeak.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Ahh... time to go to bed.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to fall asleep...?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping yet.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: No, I do not feel like it.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: No, I feel like playing some more.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I'm so hungry, I can't sleep yet.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping right now.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Hmmm... this pillow is so comfortable.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: I ... am ... so ... tired ... I ... must ... sleep ...

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Thanks. Time for me to go to bed.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: Hey, it's not bed time yet!!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: A revered pet like me shouldn't waste time sleeping.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: It's beautiful outside. Why should I sleep right now?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This is really gross. Don't you have any Snowflakes? Or pie?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Why do you keep giving me stuff like this?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is better than anything I've had in a while.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I am really, really hungry. This doesn't cut it.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Bleh. Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: c1_f1
string.value: What if I don't want to?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I wanted to sit anyway... Thank you master!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Then I'll take a quick rest. My beak is so heavy.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Yay yay! Can I sit for a while?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I like flying much better, okay? Just let me be!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Do you think my beak is too big to fly? I can fly!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Hey, if you're tired, YOU sit.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Okay! Let's take a rest. We've been moving a lot.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Telling a bird to sit... What a stupid...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Do you want my beak punch?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Then why did you take me!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I didn't know you hated me master...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Oh, no... I'll get mad if you say that!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: What hurtful words... My beak feels a lot heavier today...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hahaha! Take my beak punch! Pow! Pow!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You thought that would offend me? Practice more.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hating me after choosing me? Your loss! Hahaha!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Such hurtful words when being loved isn't even enough! Bad master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I don't understand.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Hahaha! Take my beak punch! Pow! Pow!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I'm stupid, then you're stupid too! You know that, right? Same for master and pet? Great!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't want to be yelled at.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Leave me alone.. I want to be alone.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't want to be yelled at! What should I do?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Oh I'm sorry master. Forgive me...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't yell and say kind things, please? Pet my beak.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: When are you going to stop yelling? I'm sorry but I'm hungry… Give me food.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hey I don't understand a word you are saying. CooCoo! Do you know what this means?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You think that would scare me? Absolutely not. Hehe!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll take my punishment, just please forgive me this time.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be a good pet for you. I'm sorry master.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You always say no... Do I seem that easy?!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: What did I do! I did nothing!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Leave me alone! Bad master! I hate you !

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Yes, I only have my Master!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I only love myself. Because I'm worth it!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Hehe! I love this feeling. You feel the same way?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I'm blushing so much that my beak is turning red...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Your undying love like the ever-burning Sun!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm a bird and you are a human.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I already have a lover. Nice try though!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll think about it, but don't keep your hopes up too high.. I don't want to hurt you.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I will be with you always till the top level!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You are my everything! I love you!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Can't you just look at me?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I like tall people... Not such short ones like you... Sorry!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: We are too different to love each other...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Yeah, I think I'm getting hungry.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Okay! I was actually a little bored so play with me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm kind of busy now. Talk to me later.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Haha! Talking is my specialty among specialties. It will be loud, is that okay?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What a great weather! Feels like we'll be able to pick up some Elixir.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: People say heavy lips mean few words, but I'm the exact opposite. Hahaha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm usually talkative, but right now I'm so hungry. Give me some food before you tell me to do something.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's time for me to sleep... Let's talk tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: What am I supposed to say? How about at least giving me a subject?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I can't just talk through this beak! I can attack real good! Let's go!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: O-kay, prepared to attack! Let's do this, master!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Collaborative attack of man and bird! It's got to be the first ever!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Really, why do you bother me so much... Do this stuff alone, please?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Are you going to work me out like this on an empty stomach? This is bad!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm sorry I'm in for peace... Just talk it out. That's why my beak is so hug. Hehe!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Good, I'll show my great power!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will swipe all with my huge beak!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Okay, have a good time there.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: It is time to work. Lazy master!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Do you think I can sleep with this beak?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Ah~ I'm so tired from laughing and chatting all day.. Good night master!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hehe, then shall I try out the new Coconut Palm tree bed!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You let me rest when I've worked hard! The greatest master ever!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Look... The sun is staring right into our eyes. You sleep!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You think you can make a nice weapon with this speed? Hunt more monsters!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I can't just sleep with my heavy beak... Master will have to hold it up. Will you?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can you be quiet so I can sleep?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: You better give up if you think that's going to work on me!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Your whistle sound is so mellow and sweet...

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Hmm? Actually this is a secret, but I only live in Brazil. Bet you didn't know that? Haha!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Oh, how do you do that? Tweeeeeeeet!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Hey you! Want to call out all those monsters? Keep quiet!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're embarrassing me with that sound in this great Maple World.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I'm 30 years old now... I'm too old... Stop this...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Wow, what great food! It's like heaven in my mouth!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This can't fill up my starving tummy.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is the best ever!! This made my day. I love you master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You are too harsh... All this time, and you don't know about my taste yet?

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Do you have a fever? Come here...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: People don't like it when you tease them so much.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Cough, only you care for me...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Then just give me a present!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like you as much I like rabbits, but I do like you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: How can I do that with a toy?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You are nothing but a lowly peon.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't have pointy ears like rabbits.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Do you still like me like this?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: This emotion is too difficult for me to handle.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I feel like I will get better sometime soon!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: You need to learn some common decency.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Please do that at the appropriate time and place.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You should not do that outside.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Urgh, so annoying. Okay, I'm on it!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I didn't really eat much because I wasn't feeling good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Why do you make me do such things?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Ah... this feeling... I can feel that I'm getting better already..

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I just went. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: What does that mean? I've never heard that before.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: How did you know that I had to go?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: It's so annoying to live in a human body.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I will think about it if you bring me a rabbit doll.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I was sleeping all day yesterday in the hospital.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: You should get some sleep too. Come here!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: It's not a bad idea to take some rest from time to time.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I wish I can see Lotus in my dreams.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I've been suffering from a headache. Night!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't fall asleep just anywhere.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Are you sleepy? Take a nap. I will keep a lookout for you.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to feel this refreshing breeze little bit more.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Are you going to bed already?

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I feel like I am going to have a great dream tonight!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I'm so tired. I was walking around with an IV bottle in my hand all day.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: What are you going to do when I fall asleep?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: 4 hours of sleep is enough for a day!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I cannot fall asleep. Is this because of the medicine that I took?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Are you going to run away when I'm asleep?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: *YAWN* I wonder how Lotus is doing.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should get some sleep too, little toy.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Come here, I will hug you like you are my rabbit doll.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Thought I wouldn't notice you talking?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Stop speaking to me in such a commanding tone.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I will think about it if you get on your knees and beg me.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I remember the first time I met him in Hallowed Forest.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I love the way I am now!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: AH.. I want to get better so I can fly like before.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I was in bed all day yesterday.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I must exercise to be stronger.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to take a walk in the grass.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My legs were hurting. Thank you so much!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Take a seat here, little toy.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No. I'm not going to do that.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I have no energy to talk.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to wear my uniforms again.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: It was great to be with Lotus...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: It's so interesting to live in a human body.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you still have my rabbit hair pin?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Shhhhh! The rabbit is about to fall asleep!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I didn't know what it felt like to be sick when I was a spirit.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Don't tell anyone, okay? I'm actually really really strong.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you know Lotus, my other half?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Are you telling me to sit on the ground? I am a patient!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I know I'm ill, but that doesn't mean I will listen to a mere toy.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I prefer to sit in clean places.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I feel refreshed! How come I couldn't feel this when I was a spirit?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I want my legs to get better soon.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I wish Lotus was by my side.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I will think about it if you sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I want to take a walk little more...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I need to stand still with this IV bottle in my hand.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm gonna get better soon so I can fly again!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay. I will sit down for you this time.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You are weaker than my rabbit doll.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Little toy, you are a little odd today.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you feeling sick like me?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: How can you be so cruel to someone sick?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Do you want to fly away?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I wasn't really feeling good lately. Sorry!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I sincerely apologize if I offended you.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: It was just a tiny mistake.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna go back if you keep being this way.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I feel like my headache is getting worse.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Even Lotus doesn't do this to me.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Sorry. I only like Lotus and rabbits.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Ha ha, that makes me happy.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Overeating is never good for you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: It will only get worse if I gain more weight.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I feel like I am all recovered!

string.name: s2
string.value: What a horrible toy you are...

string.name: s3
string.value: Huh? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Quack! Is this the right place?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Quack! Who do you think you are?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me fat and lazy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No way, White Ducks get dirty too easily!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Quack quack! You got it Boss!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Now is not a good time...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: It's too dirty to sit around here...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Just because you're lazy doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Don't take your anger out on me!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Quack, that's a bad look for you.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: I was just sitting there, quack quack!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Wow boss, I really didn't mean it!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Quack, I'm really scared right now!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I wanted to stretch my legs anyway!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Quack quack, I don't think so.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: QUACK! I don't feel like it.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're lucky to have such a smart duck.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hey, I'm much taller now! Quack Quack.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I must be REALLY good, right?

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: You won't find a Rudolph that can stand like I do

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Now that I'm up like this, I can see things from afar

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Standing up is sooo easy now.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: Why do you keep asking me to do the same thing?

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: I can't hear you. I can't hear you

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: No, I don't feel like it.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Quack! It's rude to poop in public!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I poop when I want to.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That's the last time I eat at the pet park!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'd poop if you fed me.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Quack Quack I don't tell you when to poop!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhhhhh, please don't look. It's embarassing

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Careful, you might step in it!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: That's a big smell for a small duck!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I have a lot on my mind right now, sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: My poop is none of your business!!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I like getting closer to you.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I love hearing I LOVE YOU!!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: No. I spit when I talk.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk to you!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It's fun being a travelling duck!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I'd like to hear a joke!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Just being near you makes me bored.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't talk to someone uglier than I am.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I think I have a sore throat!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Quack! I'm a duck, not a professional film and television actor!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Have you thought about getting a haircut?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Somebody needs to go on a diet!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: An apple a day keeps the doctor away!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone to talk to?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Nothing like a duck hug! Quack quack!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Big hugs for my favorite boss!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I feel so close to you! Quack!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Do I look like I want to hug you? QUACK!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Go jump in a lake! Seriously...you smell.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Boss, don't you have any perfume?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Quack Quack! Duck hugs are the best!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'd take a duck hug over a bear hug any day!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't hug people I don't like.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Quack! You're not so bad yourself!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do we need to have a talk?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Quack quack, I love you too!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I only love those who shower.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You need to decide if you love me or hate me.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: How can you resist this face? Quack!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I got it from my mom!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm having a horrible hair day.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Say it again! You know you love me!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I do it for you boss!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Quack! I'm so cute it should be illegal!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quack! You can't make me be cute.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: It's a blessing and a curse.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I just want to be left alone.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Quack quack, why don't you be cute?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: It's one of my best qualities!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Anything you want boss! You got it!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm don't do stupid tricks for stupid people.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Being cute doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're not the boss of me! Well...technically you are.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking swan in the country!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Being beautiful doesn't just happen! It takes time and effort.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Quack! I'm tired! You know me so well.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep right now!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Sigh...I guess I can do that.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Are you trying to get rid of me?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Yay! I love a good nap!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Okay, but can we get some lunch when I wake up?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I'd enjoy catching some Z's! Zzzz...

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I don't take cat naps, I take duck naps!

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: I can't sleep if I'm not tired!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: How many times will you ask me to dance?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Don't be jealous of me! Let's see you dance!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I only dance with people I love.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: To be or not to be...dinner...that is the question.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: The simplest solution is always the best!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Never assume malice when stupidity will explain everything.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I think, therefore I am...a duck?

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You should try reading a book.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: You can't tell me what to do!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No thanks! If I eat another bite I'll explode.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't have room for anymore food.

string.name: c1_s4
string.value: Ok, I won't budge until you say so...Pink!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I'd love to relax on a luxury leather couch.

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Hey, I don't just sit anywhere, you know.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Woohoo, feels like sitting on a cloud.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sure...want me to cross my legs, too?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't just sit anywhere! I have standards.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Hmm, think I can reach my toes from here?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ah, tummy's full, weather's nice…and master's all right, too.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A tail lets you sit without falling backwards. Try it sometime.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Wah, I can't! I'll roll over backwards if you don't hold on to me.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Eh, this doesn't exactly look comfortable. No, thank you.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Unfortunately for you, your wish is not my command.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I learned this posture from a yoga guru!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Can I get a drumstick? Pretty pwwwease?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I can sit like this for minutes at a time.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Finally! A chance to rest my stubby legs.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me again, and I'll bite you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Planning to steal my food when I lower my guard? No way. I'm onto you...

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Hey, I did the right thing...just at the wrong time. Oops.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Ahh! My tail cramped up, that's why!

string.name: c5_s4
string.value: I learned from my mistake. I'm sorry.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Oooh, you're giving me nightmares. Yeah, right.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Black Bean framed me, I swear!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: My bad, my bad. Since when did humans get so smart?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Yes, I know. Please don't pull my tail!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Yes, yes. I get it. Don't pull my ears, please.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Don't make me show you my mean and scary side...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Another word, and I'm putting you on my Ignore list.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Yeah, sure. Blame me for your mistake. Nice try.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying...lalala.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Oh, all right. So when's detention?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I love my new name. "Bad" has a nice ring to it.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Is that really how you want to treat your pet?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I only hear things I like. Selective hearing, you know.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It takes one to know one! Ahahaha!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Well, my mother disagrees with you.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: C'mon, I know you have a bigger heart than that.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll try to be nicer next time.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: No one loves me anymore. Sniffle.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I do accept apologies, you know.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Do I have to listen to this?

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I am rubber, you are glue...

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: You need to wash your mouth with soap.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Please tell me that was a lie. Please...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Sniff, but I'll still follow you wherever you go.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: You don't have to announce it like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You don't have to tell me that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Pink…isn't our favorite color anymore? Sniffle...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Are you really angry? I'm sorry...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I didn't do it on purpose.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What are you talking about? I learned my bad habits from you...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hmm, I suddenly don't quite recall who you are...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Fine! Then I'm telling everyone you're a bad master!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'll start exercising! If I lose ten pounds, will you like me better?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm only misbehaving to get your attention. Pika pikaaaa...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Master! What'd I do wrong anyway?!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I'm going to tell on you.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Good thing it's too loud in here for me to hear you.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Are you just trying to pick a fight?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Don't take your bad mood out on me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: As long as you don't mind.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Hey, pooping is not a skill!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This isn't my only trick, you know...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oops! Can't hold it anymore...Excuse me.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Please don't let anyone see me!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I have more important things to do.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to hug my plush dolls, or else I can't do it...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I can do more than poop, you know!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Aw, all that good food gone to waste.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Where is the nearest pink toilet?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Where is my poop poop newspaper?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Are you kidding? You haven't fed me enough...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ah, the effects of a good fiber supplement.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep an eye out for Peeping Toms.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Woo... I feel my tummy's getting smaller...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Not now. Put it on my to-do list.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Unlike you, I don't want to soil this beautiful place.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What do you want to hear...pika?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't stay balanced and talk at the same time.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Wanna know how I got this tail?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Why am I called a bean? I look more like a mouse...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Baked bean, coffee bean, jelly bean...None of those compare to me!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I roll on the floor when I'm tired of walking.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't you have anything better to say?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Just keep quiet and stop making me talk.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: You didn't know Tory and Tommy aren't real bunnies?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I don't want to be all emo and rot in a corner...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: My hands are too short! I can't tap my head and rub my tummy at the same time...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Have you met Mr. Bean, my dad?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Can someone get Ronnie a pacifier? He's always sucking his thumb.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do you think I'll ever get a double chin?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I do not wish to be disturbed right now.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Talk is cheap. Let's get the show started!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Put on your shoes! Your feet stink! Ugh.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I just look at you, and it seems like you're not that smart.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I feel so comfortable around you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: It's fantastic hanging out with you.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Scram. I'm so not in the mood.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Yawn. I can't be bothered with you at the moment. Zzzz.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Shower me with all your love! Pikaaa!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I love the phrase "I love you" more than anything else in the world!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Lurve? Lub? What? Forget it, I'll just sit around and rub my tummy.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're annoying. I have nothing else to say.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You are so boring me right now.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm afraid I'll have to reject you. Pink!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I've been waiting for you to say those words.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: That's so nice! I feel the same way about you!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I love you, too. This is quite embarassing...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'm liking you more and more with each passing day.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I don't get it. First you hate me. Now you love me?

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Don't lie. It'll cause my delicate heart to shatter into tiny little pieces.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I am very busy right now. Can we talk about this later?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You can't possibly think I have a good impression of you, can you?

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Let me do my belly dance! Aw, yeah!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Aren't you dazzled by my sweet dance moves?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Pink Bean's freestyle time! Be dazzled.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't like the music here.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Not when I'm the only one grooving.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I am not here to entertain you.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Let's pound the ground with our dancing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: I think you'll laugh at me, so no.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: You can't ever be as cute as me doing this...Bleah!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Oops, did I spit on you?

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: The time for jokes has ended.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Keep joking and see what happens.

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Let's put a smile on that face of yours.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Let me show you how to freak someone out...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Stop doing stupid things in public.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You are more gross than funny.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This is boring. I'm going to look in the mirror instead.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Your legs are shorter than mine. You can't catch me!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: This is how I express myself.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You don't have any class, do you?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Can you ask me to do something a little more challenging?

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Goody-goody Pink Bean is sleeping early!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Nighty night, master! I lov...vee...ee... Zzzz.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Can you tuck in my blankie if I accidently kick it off?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Can you wake me before September ends?

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Please leave the lights on. I'm scared of the dark...

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: It's too noisy to sleep here!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: You see these circles around my eyes? I'm suffering from insomnia!

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I'm not going to sleep tonight, and you can't make me!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: I need a snack before I go to bed...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Join me in a jumping race!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Boing! Bouncing up into the clouds! Piiink!!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I have a bouncy personality. Pink!

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too full to do anything...

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I don't think we're on the same page, you and me...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat anymore...My stomach's about to explode.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. Pink...

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to go on a diet.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I feel dizzy.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I'm getting too heavy these days.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Can't you see how fat I'm getting...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: At this rate, I won't even have enough energy to eat.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't have much of an appetite.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'm so hungry I can't think.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm so hungry that I can't go on anymore.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My stomach feels like it's going to shrivel up.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'll eat when I want to. Stop treating me like a child!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Give me something good to eat at least!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Why are you being like this to me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I can't understand you these days.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're getting mad at me for nothing...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You thought I was going to cry didn't you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why don't we just talk about this?

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Why are you getting mad at me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: This is not what I was thinking...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Do you hate me that much?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know how to get mad too!

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I don't even have enough energy to poop.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It's not going to come out.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I've been having trouble going these days.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I really had to go bad.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Something has to go in before it can come out!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You want me to go again?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look like some kind of mutt?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I can't go here, it's too dirty.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Please don't make me do this...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I told you I don't want to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't want to waste my time with sleep.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm a cute baby tiger! Don't yell at me!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: That's not going to make me mad.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You're always getting mad at me...

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What did I do?! Tell me!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't want to hear it.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I know how to get angry too!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You want me to sleep? Okay.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know anything about that...

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: All I want to do is sleep...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: It doesn't seem like a big deal.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say...

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Aah, you just wanted to hear my voice!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: We really do need to talk more.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't feel like talking to you today.

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: A long, long time ago...there was a handsome tiger...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: What do you want me to talk to you about?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: I just don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll talk if you compliment me.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: I really don't feel like talking.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: I want to enjoy the quiet.

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: What's wrong with you all of a sudden?

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Don't just say it, do it.

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: Love is about action, not just words.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: We're a match made in heaven.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: You should've been nice to me.

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: I don't think we would look good together.

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: I'm sorry, but I'm in love with someone else...

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: This popularity just won't go away.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: This tastes bad... I only like steaks.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so yummy. Chomp, chomp. So delicious.

string.name: s2
string.value: Baby Tiger doesn not know that word.

string.name: s3
string.value: Baby Tiger wants the master not to say that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Master never orders me to do that.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Keep watch while I sleep, master.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'll just rest my eyes for a minute...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're not the boss of me!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Nah, nah, nah. I hear nothing.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'm sorry! I didn't mean it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I wish Utah were my master instead.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: You make me feel so warm and fuzzy.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That means the world to me!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: That means the world to me!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You mean the world to me, master!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I smell adventure in the wind!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Eh, how about a nap first?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: My scales hurt when I talk.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Wow, master! I'm having so much fun!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Can I use my mouth to chew instead? Hint, hint.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm not one to gossip, but...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sure! That's what friends are for!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Do you know what no means?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: We both know where this is going...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will be big and strong one day!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You want me to eat what?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Did you wash your hands first?

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'm getting pretty good at this!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: I have other skills, you know...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Is that all I'm good for now?

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: I've been saving that one just for you!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end of me...

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been saving that one just for you!

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Wonder if I can breathe fire from that end of me...

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Nobody passes gas like me, master!

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I don't want to gross people out!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Lose a few pounds first, master.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I'm too fat! Please look away!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Please no more! I can barely breathe.

string.name: s2
string.value: Please don't ask me to say that, master.

string.name: s4
string.value: You need to wash your mouth, master.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure... If it makes you happy.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I guess it's time for me to obey…

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Maybe you should have a rest too Master!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Can you sing me a song as well?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Is that the only thing you can ask me to do?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey sitting still?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Can I really take a rest?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: How did you know I wanted to rest?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I need to take a rest here!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You are the best master ever!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: It is so dirty here, I can't rest!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No... I'm getting fat these days....

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I am getting fat because of all this resting!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Just because you don't want to play with me, huh?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Don't look at me like that!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I will be better, really... Kiii...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Master I won't do it again...

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I'm good, you're bad... Yes that's it!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Bad! You don't love me anymore!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm the most obedient pet around! AHHH

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say it again and I'll ignore you.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: You expect me to poop in public?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhh I feel so much better...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Look at that Master... Have you ever seen a monkey poop?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: How can I poop when nothing's coming out?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't feel like it! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It isn't nice for a monkey to poop here...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ah that is what I call real Monkey Business!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to pee when you didn't even feed me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't you poop in public too?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Don't you have anything better to do than asking me to poop the whole day?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Me ear feels a little itchy here...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I love you too Master.. kiiii...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hmm, Master you're so nice to me!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I feel nice and warm inside!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love you too! Give me a hug!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You're referring to somebody else, right?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're the best Master a monkey can have!
