string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I love you too! What about going for a hunt together?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm such a lucky monkey to have you as my Master…

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: It is bad to tell lies Master, Please don't.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I love bananas more than I love you!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You haven't hugged me for ages!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm sure you love your new weapon more! ARP!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can stand! I can stand!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Huh? My ear feels a liitle itchy here...

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll stand if you feed me!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Have you ever seen a monkey standing so straight?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Look Master! Aren't I good at this?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I did it! Master! I'm standing!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm already standing?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm tired running after you! I don't want to stand!

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Look master, do you see a banana there?

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I love the way you talk to me.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I love bananas! Do feed me more of those!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I love you Master! Do you love me too?

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: What do you expect me to say?

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Instead of killing monsters, you can do quests to level up too!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Monkeys love bananas! I bet you didn't know that.

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I hate people who abuse their pets, don't you?

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: If you don't feed me, I'll go back home and not come out!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: It is rude to wake a monkey from its sleep! ARP!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Talk talk talk.. I want to do something else.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Tell me honestly, have you ever heard a monkey speak?

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! ARP! ARP!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: We pets are created by Cloy of Henesys.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: If you don't feed me well, I'll just run away!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: If you buy me a meso magnet and item pouch I can collect all your loot for you!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: I won't live forever, so do treasure me when I'm around!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: What do you expect me to tell you when I'm always following you around?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have any other things to do?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Why don't you ask my lupin brothers to talk to you instead?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Isn't it better for you to talk to your buddies instead?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I've wanted to play with you all day long!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: What do you want to do?

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Can't you see I'm busy now?

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Feed me first... then I will think about it!

string.name: c29_f4
string.value: Don't even want to move my tail...

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: I've been waitiing for you to say that!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm thinking of how we are going to play Master!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Who sleeps in the middle of the day? Not me!

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: How to sleep when I'm hungry?

string.name: c35_s3
string.value: That was kind of you Master, I'm indeed tired!

string.name: c35_f1
string.value: Don't want to sleep! Let's climb trees instead?

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'm not as lazy as you think Master...

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: If you aren't training, I am!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: No more for me... too full!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master! I like this a lot!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Master... are you trying to kill me?

string.name: s3
string.value: I thought you were a good Master...

string.name: s4
string.value: Kii, I thought I told you, I am against those bad words.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't want to sit here.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Yes, a rest would be nice.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Oh, my legs are sore. Thank you. Mrow!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't order me around like that! Meow!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Meow... I don't sit in places like this.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A nice, leisurely rest would be nice...mrow!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Some weather, huh? Let's relax for a while, master. Meow!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Meow. Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You can't always get what you want, master.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Do I look like a remote control cat to you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I won't do it again. Meow!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you doing this? MROW!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: What have I done wrong? Meow!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Meow! Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm sorry! Forgive me! Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: H-how can you yell at me like that?!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Why are you taking it out on me? MROW!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Meow! I didn't do anything wrong. Bad master!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! I won't do it again. Meow...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You're not enjoying this, are you?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Are you really abandoning me? Meow! Meow!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Liar! I don't believe you! MROW!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Say it again! Say it again! Mew!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: MEOW! You're the best! Mew! Mew!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Mrow... You know I'm a cat, right?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm sure you say that to all your pets.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Mrrow... What can I say to that?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm happy to follow you around. Meow!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love is fine, but I'm hungry!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Ah! Shh, someone will hear you!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: This is not a restroom! Meow, meow!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Can you get me some toilet paper, master?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why...are you telling me to do this?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: No one's watching, right? Watch out for me. Meow!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I made you a gift, master!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Errr... I don't have to! Meow!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go! Do you, master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Meow... What am I suppose to do here...?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Meow! Everyone's watching! I can't do it here!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Maybe a little cat nap would be good...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Meow. It's not time for bed yet...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Meow! The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Aren't you sleepy, master? I'm sleepy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up. Meow!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can't I just sleep when I want to? Mrow!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I still want to play! Mew!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: This was a such a long day.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I feel like sleeping for 3 days. Meow!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Oh, just let me sleep already!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I told you, I don't want to sleep! Meow!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Isn't it too early for bed?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master? Meow!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: What do you want me to say? Huh? Meow!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I grew up in an elegant palace.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Have you ever met as eloquent a cat as I?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What should we talk about? Meow!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm thirsty... Can I have a red potion?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: It's your turn to talk, master.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I hope this conversation never ends!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you ever had a Power Elixir? How did it taste? I want one!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm glad you're my master, master.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why do you keep saying that? Mew!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: What are you talking to me for? Bored?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You can't talk me into liking you more, master. Mew!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You are truly skilled at bothering your pets.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What's your wish? My wish is to be your kitty forever.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The most important thing is health. The second most important thing is...also health.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No thank you. Talking to you makes me mad.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why talk when we could eat instead? Mrow!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Don't you have any other friends?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'd rather talk to a wall.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore. Meow!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you have something different? Meow. Meow.

string.name: s3
string.value: Meow! How can you talk to me like that...?

string.name: s4
string.value: Meow! Are you a bad person, master?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Don't look at me like that.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You have made a grave mistake.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I will not make the same mistake twice.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: It is you who is wrong!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Does it really matter that much?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: No... A true ninja sheds no tears...!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: That has been taken care of.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I seem to have eaten too much...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I will give it my all!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Done! Ready for my next mission!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't eaten anything all day.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I will not obey such a command!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I do not care for your tone.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: That is simply too much to ask.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: There. This should last me until tomorrow.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Feed my stomach, not my heart.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You are the only one I serve.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Is that supposed to make me happy?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You are the only one for me.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: My love is for another ninja...

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I will not fall for that again!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I see no need of that now.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I have nothing to talk about.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: This is no time for chatter.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: My elder sister is a kunoichi.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Our enemy is on the move!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I will bring honor to my clan!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Ninja have no need of chit-chat!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I am meditating at the moment.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: A ninja must be focused and ready at all times.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: I had dreams of good fortune last night.

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: There is no time to play.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Do you mean like... rolling a ball or something?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: I have a talent for hide and seek.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: How about we race to 1000 KOs?

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I am not fond of playing at night.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I want to hear you sing.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Perhaps I can teach you to transform as well.

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Let us fling some fireballs for sport.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: I am meditating at the moment.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: I must concentrate on my training.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I will do what I can.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: How about we race to 1000 KOs?

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: I have a talent for hide and seek.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: How about hide and seek? I am... pretty good at that.

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I am fine. Let us continue.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I have matters to attend to.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: The enemy could strike at any moment!

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: I have an unbeatable sleeping technique!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I am still deadly, even asleep!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I will not hear of it!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall take... a low stance.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I cannot rest here. My heart is not in it.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I lurk in the shadows, not sleep.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You should rest as well. There is much to do.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: I shall rest easy, for once.

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: Yes, I will prepare for tomorrow!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: If I sit, there will be no getting up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: But then the enemy can surprise us!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: A ninja is like the wind. Wind does not sit.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I will not agree to that.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't understand what you are saying.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I do not want to rest yet.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I will rest a bit here.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I cannot follow such a command.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I do not want to rest yet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Eating more will put my stomach in danger.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I am picky about my sushi.

string.name: s3
string.value: I do not want to hear it.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Yoooou're not the boss of meeeeee.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't have to listen to yoooooou.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're not my daaaaaad. Or my mooooooom.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You're not gonna eeeeat me, riiiiight?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yooooou like caaaakes more than piiiiiies, right?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I aaaaalways wanted to learn to baaaaake.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Run run run, as fast as...waaaait, that's not right.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Let them eeeeeeat pie! Cakes are your friend!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm giving you the siiiilent treeeatment. Oooops.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Noooo. I ate too much. Can't belieeeeve.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Cake in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: My moves are sweeeet like sugar.

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I neeeeed a better partner. Hee hee.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: If I trip, I go splaaaaaat.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I call this the Caaaake Waaaalk!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: What if my frooooosting comes offfffff?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm sweet but yooooou're not. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Pie do nothing but sit. Hee hee.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Floor dirty. Pie have 3 second rule.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Pie fall down. Pie meant to do that.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Rock-a-bye pie-e, in the hot oven... Zzz

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Pie get it. Pie sleep, wake up on plate! No way!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pie hear something dumb. Pie no listen.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pie no understand, but pie obey.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Pie did it, pie do it again! Nyah!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Pie filled with love! Or cherries. Pie no remember.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Pie not ready for relationship. Pie want be friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Pie hate clowns. Take pie, throw, go splat.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Why pie missing piece? You take?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Pie ready for bigger things! Pie ready for ice cream!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Pie am well-rounded friend. Hee hee!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Pie lucky number is 3.14...pie forget rest.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Pie want meet nice tart, settle down. You help pie?

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do who with the what now?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Pie just ate? Pie no remember.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Where good food? Pie is gourmet.

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Glad you see my true potential!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: I'm the best looking Pie in the country!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Pie boogie! Sound gross, is fun!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: Pie need right partner. Not you.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Pie on the right track, baby! Pie was baked this way!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Pie not feelin' the vibe here.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Pie poo berry much. Hee hee!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: Why did Sally sell seashells by the seashore?

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: The measure of a Mapler is determined by his friends.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Lala...such a cool wind in my mane.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Wehee...I don't desire to do so!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Ah...I miss the chairs in the castle...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Thank you for your kind consideration.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: How dare you! Do you realize who you are speaking to?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Aah, since you are asking, I shall.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish! Wehee!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Owie! I've been pricked by a thorn!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'd rather not, I'm a bit sore.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Okay, hut! Ahh! My legs won't bend!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: La ti da...I can't hear you...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Lala, I am singing a song of repentance!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I am of a noble personage.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I can get angry as well! You...cough cough...my throat...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You must not like me anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I acknowledge my mistake. I am sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please accept the apology of a unicorn prince.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Do you realize that you are speaking to one of nobility?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I am quite disappointed in you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sigh...It is only natural for a horse to move forward!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: I am not the right one for you.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Lala... My heart is yours as well!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I hope that your heart shall never change.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will stand by you always!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will overcome our differences, to stand by you!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I shall be returning to my kingdom soon.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: We are of different classes. I am sorry.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Did you at least bring me some sugar cubes?

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: If that is what you desire...

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I am a prince, but I can be down to earth! Hrrgh!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: No, this is not right! Not right at all!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I hope that you will learn to be a bit more elegant.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Phhhhhhrt... You didn't hear that! It wasn't me!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Unicorns are too dignified for pooping.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I am no commoner. How can I go in such a place as this?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My leavings are not for all to see!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest too.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I am find just as I am!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You need to move around more. Look at your love handles!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Posture is important, even when sleeping...zzz...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: So, this is how the homeless sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Can you even think of sleeping at your level?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Aah...I miss my golden bed back in the castle.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I am not used to taking orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I wish for my kingdom to appear in my dreams.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: We have much to do. There is no time for sleeping!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: How dare you try to command me!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bring me some sugar cubes! I am hungry!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Lala...I am the first prince of the Unicorn Kingdom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I have come here just to meet you.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Dignity and elegance are my pride and calling.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I shall invite you to my kingdom someday.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Lala... Let us sing a song!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My sister is a beautiful unicorn with a light blue mane.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Esel and I are good friends.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I hope that my sister will be able to visit Maple World.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Esel and I still feel quite...lonely.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Members of the royal family like myself must be careful in all that we say and do!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: It wasn't a mistake that brought me to Maple World.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My kingdom is inhabited by only unicorns.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you wish to learn some manners from me?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Elegant unicorns such as myself enjoy silence.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: What? You surprised me. I wasn't expecting you to talk to me.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: There are days when i just feel like being alone. Alone!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: It is not for anyone to see.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: If I don't move for 10 minutes, call a doctor.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: How dare you command a member of the royal family!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I refuse! How can an unicorn of my stature stoop so low?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wehee! How dare you try to command me?

string.name: c22_f4

string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I could do this with my eyes closed. Yip!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a good boy, right! Gimme a treat! Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I'll write this down in my diary! Yip! Can I have a diary?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...
