string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am great and wise man-demon!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of death like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid death, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Only the guilty have to fear death. Are you guilty?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can stand in the face of death, we can be partners in destruction.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: I see no purpose in sitting.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Why are you mortals always so frivolous with your wishes?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Does this please you, oh temporary master?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Have you decided your real wishes yet?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: May I do something else? Grawr?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Does this make me look more regal?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather I eat someone?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I just place my bottom upon the ground?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Sitting with you is quite relaxing.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am able to conjure the powers of the heavens as well, you know?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will, should you bring me a loaf of the meat variety.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Seven hundred thousand years of magical power and you ask me to sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Ask me for riches like a normal person!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I am seated already, mortal. Are you blinded with awe?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Speak to me when you have discovered respect.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I will attempt to be better.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: That may be a slight overreaction.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Well, if you put it that way...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Do not blame me for being myself!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Perhaps it is YOU who are at fault, mortal!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I have done nothing to earn your scorn!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: A bolt of lightning might change your attitude.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I understand, you are under a lot of stress.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am above your mortal emotions.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Was I so wrong? It was only a squirrel!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I will not be sad! I will not be sad!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: One of these days, I'm going to drop this marble on your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Is this how you mortals treat one another?!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I will watch you fry one day.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I haven't felt this bad since I ate that priest.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I find you strangely terrifying, mortal.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I have shamed a thousand generations of my ancestors.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: But I have done everything you asked!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are the most fickle mortal I've ever met.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are adorable when you are angry.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Find something else to yell at!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I hope you do not come to harm.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Aren't you supposed to be trembling in fear?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I will not be talked down to!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You are making my scales itch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why do my cheeks feel warm? WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart thumps when you say these measly words!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I believe you mortals would say, "ditto".

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My dragon heart is not to be trifled with.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Do not say anything you will regret.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I, uh, have to wash my scales tonight.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Hey, how about those Green Mushrooms? Very green, aren't they?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Would you like me to take you flying?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I will move the heavens for you!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Might a humble dragon receive a kiss?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Are mortal affections given so freely?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I am sure you say this to all your pets.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Who needs love when you have power?!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: My eyes may be closed, but I have the reflexes of a water dragon!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I was already going to do that.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Perhaps you'll think of a better wish later.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Grawr! It is not my nap time!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I have little need for such things.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use a recharge.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: We mighty dragons have no need for sleep!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: This place is not fit for my great slumber!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I am no cat, content to lie in the sun!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: May I rest upon your lap? This cloud is quite cold.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh, the dreams I will have!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Your wish is granted, mortal! Zzzzzz

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: What if I were to eat you in my sleep?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: This area is too loud! My dragon ears are sensitive.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Can't we go battle some monsters?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I JUST drank some dragon coffee!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Allow me to fill in your pitiful knowledge of dragons...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I was once a mere thunder lizard, until I caught this orb.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Do know you how luck you are? Let me tell you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: If that is what you wish...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I did not descend from the heavens to banter!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Your world is teeming with life.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: My mane is made of the finest spun gold.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I am omnipotent and all powerful, but I do get a little lonely.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Hold on, let me see if I have anything...NO.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why do you waste my power?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your enormous head must be quite a burden.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Does this orb make my tail look fat?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: All behold the glory of my master and its silly face!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: My wisdom sounds much better in the original Dragon.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: What do you want to talk about?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Do the powers of the gods so amuse you?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: This show of force is quite exhausting.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Grawr! Look at all these lightning bolts!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My thunder will break the heavens!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: This is no mere trick! This is an event!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I tire of these petty displays.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Have you nothing better to wish for?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will sink through my cloud if I eat another bite!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I try to say no, but my belly continues to rumble.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: No more, I have much...um...business to attend to.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Truly you are a great chef, master!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do not look upon me. I am such a fat dragon...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You will not be my master forever...

string.name: c22
string.value: I do not comprehend your ridiculous ways.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I WILL eat you. You are but a worm in my eyes.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Do not curse the commander of lightning!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'm a free fox! I sit for no one!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I hate this dusty ground. Gimme sand!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I was hoping we'd get to do that soon.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm pretty when I sit, huh?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: This place is cooler than my star.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I didn't mean to upset you.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Whatever, I'm going back to my star!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're not a friend! You're a bully!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm the savage beast of the desert!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: What the? This wouldn't be allowed on my star...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Are you actually scolding me right now?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I have a LOT of friends who like me!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You're a one of a kind person!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you today. I'll like you more tomorrow.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Give me some Star Candies, and we'll talk!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You don't know how to play!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I've been waiting so long for you to say that!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: My face is gonna get red! Wanna see?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I could use a little space.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Let's pretend we didn't have this talk.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm a free-spirited fox! Don't try to chain me!

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Okay, but you have to clean it up!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I only do that for ME!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I don't know why you want that, but you got it!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Arooo! My face is all red now!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I don't think I'll ever stop!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll poop when I wanna poop!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You're going to get us in trouble!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm independent! I take naps on my own time!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Going to sleep already? You're lazy!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Ah, my soft and cozy tail.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to dream up a storm!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you, I'm having fun right now!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy the day! Aroo!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Arooo... I miss the prince and rose... zzz

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping in the desert is SO romantic!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why aren't we out hunting? That's way more fun!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Aroo! I want to go to the desert of freedom!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I used to travel with a wonderful prince!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love Star Candy so much!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What are we talking about? I'm a fox!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Arooo! Did you want to hear something?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: A fox has to keep some secrets!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Wanna go watch the shooting star?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: The star that the prince and I went to was much better.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Aren't you curious about the meteor I was on?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Eating star candy can make you feel better!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: We foxes are known for our quietness.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I can't believe they have more like me at a ZOO!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: There are so many people on this star!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I get my fur trimmed on a daily basis.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You should learn to entertain yourself!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You should play some music first!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I want to be in a concert!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Aroo! I wanna do something else!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Up and down my head goes!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: The prince taught me how to do that!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That dance is super popular on asteroid B-612!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: We've got all day tomorrow too!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's good to be a fox of the desert!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I was JUST thinking about these!

string.name: s2
string.value: Do not want! Let's see it again!

string.name: s3
string.value: That word is SO not romantic!

string.name: s4
string.value: You say bad things! Earth really is a gloomy place!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Butterflies don't sit! We only fly around! Hehe!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm gonna try sitting! This is something new!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I didn't know sitting down was that easy!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I wanna do something fun, poof!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, poof!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, poof!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, someone peed on the ground! Pooof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can I fly around instead? POOF!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let me take you for a ride! Poof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How are butteflies gonna sit?! Huh?!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being a butterfly...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: That was a piece of cake...

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU sit instead? hehe!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I have difficulties sitting down... let's try something else shall we?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe! My mind was blank! I didn't catch what you were talking about...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I got a fright, that was scary!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: It's not cool at all, clickkkk!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't give me a scary face! I am a timid butterfly!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me what went wrong! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You are ranting at me! Clickkkkk!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything to deserve this! Clickkkk!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it right? You were just bored aren't you? Clickkkkk!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am sorry, so sorry! Clicck clickkk!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Are you really mad at me? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I won't do that again... clickk clickk!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway?! Clickkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: That wasn't cool at all! Pooof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? POOFFF!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! Clickk Clickkk!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: ...Things happen in life for a reason...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man... you are going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored...treating me like this...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I.. I don't mean that.. pooof!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, poooff...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, pooof!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that...CLICKKK CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I get hurt when I hear those...CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: That was a joke...right? Right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You...didn't mean that, right? right? CLICKKK!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! CLICKKK!!!!!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: ...This is not the first time I've heard this, but it still hurts...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...hehe

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: If you keep saying that, I'm gonna get grumpy!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It...it's not coming out well, clickkk!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, pooooof...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, poooff!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, clickkkk!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to poop when you're looking at me? Clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long since I last pooped... clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet... pooof!!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: ...I don't feel like pooping yet...clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my lunch just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Phew! Haven't taken a crap in three days and look at this!! HUATZA!!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: ...Can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: ...How am I gonna take a dump on purpose??

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The harder you hunt, the better the items you'll find, pooof!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket, like now?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do butterflies talk? They click!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, clickk clickkk!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you... pooof!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: It's awesome day to fly around today! poooofff!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I am on Cloud Nine and more good things are coming our way! Pooooof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let's get something nice to eat today shall we? Clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Let's go to the garden today for some fun! Poooofff!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: There's nothing for me to say now,! clickkk clickkkk!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have so little to say!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, can you beat Pink Bean?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You better play some Gachapon today, cause I'm feeling lucky!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard there's something scary in a cave in Leafre!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Let's put the talk aside, it's time to get some food to eat! POOOF!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You must be really bored aren't you? Pooooofff!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Arrgh...didn't hear a thing...didn't hear a thing...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Sometime butterflies do have our OFF day!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You sure you are not lying?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: That's so sweet! I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooooof!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Thanks thanks! I love you too! Poooooof!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I guess I am starting to fall in love with you too! Pooooof!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! Poooof!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: That came as a surprise! I am experiencing butterflies in my stomach now!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Catch this cupid's arrow from me to you! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: My heart will go on and on for you, pooooof!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: ORLY? I LOVE YOU TOO! Pooooof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You don't really see a butterfly blush don't you? I am blushing now!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: Quit playing games with my heart! Poooof!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You gotta lay off those gummi bears!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Don't say you love me, you don't even know me! clickkk clickkk!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to grab some bites! Poooof!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Time to sleep in my cosy leaf bed! Will you hug me to sleep tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Hold me tight in your arms! Clickkk Clickkk!

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't let the bed bugs bite! Hehe!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Let's go for some late night! I am not sleepy!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Sing me a lullaby and I will go to my wonderland!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Let me dance with the moon and stars tonight!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep cause I am dreaming of something...

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let the power of the butterflies transform!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: Time to transform into a Monster Moth!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Can't just do it all the time, you know.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Too much only spoils the fun.

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, shall we?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating now! Arghhh!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: You're really good at it aren't you?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm too full to eat anymore!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you aking me to say that kind of words? Clickkk clickkkkk~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Or we could do something else…

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Do you hear yourself? All these commands…

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Check it out… Pretty good, right?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh... I'm sleepy… Can't hear you…

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy… I'm feeling underutilized here.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I was just minding my own business... then this! Squerch!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you do this? Squerch?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know squerch kwon do and I WILL use it! Squerch!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad, right? Right?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Some masters let their pets have fun…

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I looked up some other masters… Turns out there are plenty of options.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I promise I'll be good now…

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I haven't done anything wrong, and still...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is there a reason for this or do you just like yelling?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm so used to it, I don't even feel it anymore...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master gets bored, so I get yelled at…

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet. Squerch.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if you don't feed me? Squerch.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for the bathroom. Squerch.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Oooh... I almost stepped in it...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: It hasn't been long enough yet, master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Not really into pooping on command…

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: When do I get to tell YOU to poop, master?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh... whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew! Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew... You can tell it's been a while! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to poop out in the first place!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'm saving it all for one big poop.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Did you just say what I think you said? Squerch.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I think I love you too!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: And you just had to tell me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah... I thought you were going to say something else…

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: That was a good one... haha...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: You're making my gills red, master...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Oh! Oh!! Me too! Me too!! hehe...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Probably should have kept that one to yourself…

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You'll have to do better than that…

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You want me to fake it? Squerch.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Have you seen a shark smile? Not pretty. Squerch.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: How about a treat instead? Squerch.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do, master!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm already smiling… Cause I'm with you!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I only open my mouth for food.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Not really feeling the whole happiness thing right now…

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Now you're in charge of my emotions too?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Maybe if there's a reward involved.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... Squerch.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: M... master… I can't believe you said that…

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: That was a joke… right? Right?

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Master, I get hurt when you say that…

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: And the meanest master of the year award goes to…

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I see why it's hard for you to make friends.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Do you really not like me?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: You say this all the time. Maybe I'm doing something wrong.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Say it again. See what happens.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I'm sick of you berating me!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The more you go hunting, the better the items you'll find. Squerch.

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go somewhere to play! Squerch.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap on top of a comfortable blanket. Squerch.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Have you ever heard of a chatty shark? Squerch.

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you… Squerch…

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: I can't talk to you right now. Squerch.

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Master, you'll get me some good food today, right?

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Good!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: A lot of people are here, so make sure to be courteous!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say…

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: Not much goin on over here…

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I just met someone. Maybe we could go on a double date?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head… hahaha. HUGE!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: This is boring… I need something more exciting

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: Why do you keep talking to me? I'm trying to sleep...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: Buurrrrpp. Don't I look cute burping? Squerch.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: My friends tell me the same thing! Squerch.

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: This is my area of expertise. Squerch.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: You don't have to tell me that…

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: That doesn't mean much coming from you.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Whoa, master must have gone nuts.

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: So you want me to burp? Burrrrrpppp. What do you think?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: You won't find a cuter pet anywhere! Squerch.

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Master, what do you think? Cute, right? Squerch!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: Master! Just get me some food! Squerch!

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I don't wanna do cute stuff! Squerch!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Like this? At least you know a cute act when you see one...

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Here's a nice gassy burp for you!

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: No one can match my burping skills!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: You think I'll just do whatever you ask… I thought you were smarter.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I need to eat in order to burp, you know...

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I ate onions and garlic just now... no burping! No cuteness!

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: How do I put this… No?

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'm tired. I need to sleep. Squerch...

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: So sleepy... let me sleep... squerch...

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I going to sleep if I'm not even tired! Squerch!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Don't go eat something good while I'm asleep! Squerch.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: So you can doodle on my fins? No thanks!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I'm hungry! Can't sleep! Feed me!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I am about to blow up... squerch...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is so delicious... squerch!!!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is as good as it gets!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me, master?

string.name: s2
string.value: Squerch? You asking doesn't always mean me doing…

string.name: s3
string.value: Squerch! My precious mouth will not spit those venomous words!

string.name: s4
string.value: Please, no... no flavors like that... Squerch.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm a nice lamb that obeys well!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I was going to sit, baa!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I was actually planning to rest, baa!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm going to play more, baa!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Baa baa, you should sit down too.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Baa baa? What did you say?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I can't hear you, I can't hear you, baa baa!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'm going to fly around more, baa baa!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Should we rest a bit? Baa baa.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Baa baa! What a peaceful feeling!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Baa baa? Are you talking to me?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't hear anything, baa baa!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Baa? What's with you all of sudden?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Baah! (It appears to be calling its mother...)

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Baa! Don't do this to me...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Baa... maybe I should change owners.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I don't even wanna hear it...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Baa baa! It's all my fault!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Baa! Did I really mess up that badly?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Baa... I won't do that again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Hmph, I'll be the bigger ram.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: My patience has limits, baa baa.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Are you going to keep this up, baa?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If only I had a nicer owner...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Why do you always yell at me... *Cries*

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm going to tell my mommy, baa baa...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Wahhhh! You're just mean because you're bigger than me!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I really wish I could just smack you, baa baa.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna call animal protective services!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I can get scary when I'm angry, baa...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Baa baa... THAT does it! (Veins popping.)

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Baa baa! I like, I like!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Baa baa. You aren't supposed to joke around like that.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Treat me well when you have the chance, baa.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Baa! I'm always on your side!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I said... I can't hear you!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Baa Baa! I got it, I got it!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Baa! I love hanging out with you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Baa! Affectionate actions make Pufframs dance!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Baa baa. I already know your feelings.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: So what do you want me to do, baa baa?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm shocked, I don't even have words.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Do you KNOW what you are saying?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Something needs to go in for something to come out!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Baa baa! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's not going to come out just because you whine!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Baa... let's have some common sense, shall we?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Baa baa... You want to get smacked?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to play more, baa baa!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Baa... someday I'll soar higher than a dragon. Baa...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Baa baa? What are you saying?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm not that lazy, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Baa Baa! So today, I'm going to... (Now it won't stop talking.)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Are you amazed by flying lambs? So the secret of our race is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Maple World is a pretty nice place to live, baa baa.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: When we were living up in the sky, angels mistook us for clouds.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it strange that I talk?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Baa? Weren't we talking just a second ago?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Have you every had a Cloud Candy? It's the baaaaa-st.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: If there's one thing I hate, it's wolves.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: We are called Pufframs because we live above the clouds.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Baa baa... just leave me alone...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't want to talk right now, baa.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Mmm... are you hungry for a conversation?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Baa baa, would it be better to walk or fly?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Baa baa, you want to hear something interesting?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Which one of us do you think can fly faster? Me or the eagle?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: To the Pufframs, the Golden Horn is a symbol of adulthood.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: You look bored... too bad I'm not!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What if I say no, baa baa?

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: This is the Puffram booty dance!!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Am I in the circus or something, baa baa?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Baa baa... I said, it sounds annoying...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I actually have this super cool trick... but I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: (Jumps up and down.) Baa! Baa! Baa! Baa!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: It's super fun when you do it above the clouds, baa baa.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Can't I just be your pet?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Too hungry... no strength... baa baa.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Baa baa, eating time's my favorite time!!

string.name: s2
string.value: You want to get reported, baa baa?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you, baa baa!!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look like a dog to you? Sit, indeed!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Yes, perhaps I shall rest my wings. RAWK!!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Who are you to order me around? Hm?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Birds can't sit, you featherless buffoon!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I'm sitting already! I'm sitting RIGHT NOW!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes, yes, what is it?! I swear, if you tell me to sit one more time...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I would be DELIGHTED if you joined me! Don't you have a chair?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Very well. But what's this? No cushion?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: You dare tell me to sit? RAWK!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Where shall I sit? On your shoulder? Or on your head?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: The dictionary defines 'sit' as resting with the torso vertical and the body supported on the buttocks. Correct?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Yes, it's nice to sit with my intellectual equal. RAWK!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Yes, I am quite tired. We've been on a long journey, and I fear I've talked myself into a stupor. RAWK!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why do you insist I sit?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Don't you know any other commands?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: No. No, that's quite all right. Rawk!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Perhaps I was bad. But you'll hear no apology from me!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Of course. It won't happen again. Whatever you say.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: What can I say? My apologies.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: What is the meaning of this? Unbelievable...

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I've nothing to say to a tyrant like you!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How does throwing a temper tantrum help anything?

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: There's no need to be so forceful.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I understand. But is this really my fault?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'll hear you out. What did I do wrong this time?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Rawk! Do you want an apology?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you can explain to me what I did wrong, I will be more than happy to apologize.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Perhaps what I did was wrong, but will an apology REALLY make you feel better?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I know what I did was wrong! I don't need you to remind me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm a bad parrot. Does that make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have nothing to say to you. RAWK!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I don't know what you're talking about, and I don't care!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Think this over. Don't you value our friendship? RAWK!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Love, love. Such a sweet word!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: You like me? You really like me?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Is your love true? Oh, who cares!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'd blush, but parrots can't blush...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Sorry, but my heart belongs to a little parakeet in Henesys.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But what will the other parrots think?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: The love between parrot and master is forever!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Is it the color of my feathers that did it? Or the manly shape of my beak?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sh, keep your voice down! You're embarrassing me...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Caaan you feeel the love tooooday...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: No! I won't let you break this parrot heart!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Sure, you say that now, but isn't this just a flight of fancy?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: My melancholy heart, once dark like Kerning City's nighttime sky, is brightened by your affection! CRAAAAW!!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Yes! Very good! Let's have fun! RAWK!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Thank you. Not that I feel the same way, but it's nice to hear.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You find me attractive? Is that what you're telling me?

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you feel a special kinship for me? Or is it something more?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Love? I simply can't understand it.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Good idea to lighten the load. Makes it easier to fly. Rawk!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Rawk! You need a sample? I didn't know you were a doctor!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I feel so refreshed. I feel like I can fly! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Sorry. Stomach's not feeling up to the task today!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: What a thing to say! Rawk!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: What a disgusting thing to say!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Rawk! I'll just make a little room for lunch.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Rawk! I was going to do that, anyway!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: You can tell I've been eating the good stuff because it doesn't smell. Ha!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Stop asking me to do such base things! RAWK!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'm not a faucet, you know. It doesn't happen on command.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: That's a child's word. I prefer the word feces, myself.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Observe, as my body excretes the waste it's built up through the digestive process!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I've got stage fright. Mind singing a song to help me relax?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: RAWK! That didn't feel right out. Maybe I should see a doctor...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How did you know I had to go? That's a little unsettling...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Why don't you look after your business, and I'll look after my own? Rawk!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I seem to be having trouble. Do you have some yogurt I could eat? Rawk!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: This is nice sleeping weather. Rawk!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: I may not have eyelids, but I can sleep with the best of them!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Remember, even when I sleep, I'm watching you! Zzz...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: What will you do while I sleep? Rawk!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You won't put ME to sleep!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Perhaps I'll wake up early and get the worm... Rawk!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm going to eat well and sleep right. Goodnight!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Goodnight, and may you dream of many eagles.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Rawk! I can't sleep right after eating!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No. I get headaches if I sleep too much.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I'll not sleep my life away! RAWK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I please, thank you very much!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sometimes I get so busy counting sheep I forget to actually sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Nothing like a good nap when you're feeling sleepy!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll dream of pigs and slimes tonight. I just know it.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: My friends say I talk to much. Makes it hard to sleep. That's not true, is it? RAWK!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't sleep on the floor! Bring me some nice, comfortable branches to perch on.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I can't talk now. I'd rather chat! Rawk! Rawk! RAAAWK!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're going to hit me after I fall asleep, right? I'm on to you!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me to shut up, aren't you? Rawk!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Sometimes the cap'n doesn't use good grammar! Rawk!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Don't get me wrong, Adriano's a fine navigator. But isn't he a little too quiet?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey is dumb as a brick. I wouldn't want to be on his bad side, though!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Quick! Get me a navigator and a helmsman, and we'll set sail for Florina Beach!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Secrets? No such thing. If you can tell one person, you can tell everybody!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: They say it's not good to talk too much, but I've never found this to be the case! Rawk!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: A pirate ship is blind without a good parrot in the crow's nest! Rawk!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Here's a question! Why is it always night in Magatia and day in Ariant?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Who're the strongest people in Maple World? First Cygnus, then Aran. Third would be the ruler of the Elves, but she's long gone...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Is the Black Mage real? No one's seen him, have they? It all sounds made up to me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: According to this, a pirate is someone who...attacks ships at sea and steals from others. Huh, go figure...

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Hello! Hello! Kraw want a cracker!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show. Rawk!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't perform tricks. Do I look like a mere pet to you? RAWK!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Wouldn't you rather have a deep conversation?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Sorry, I only perform tricks for people I respect.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: It may be the same trick as last time, but it's always exciting!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Finally! I was getting sick of talking!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: For you, I can do this all day!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I'll keep going 'til all my feathers fall off! Rawk!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Want to see it again? Really?

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Forget it, all right? Just forget it!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm all out of feathers here.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Do I look like a pig to you? Knock it off with the food!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I was hungry enough to eat a shark! Thanks!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Keep this up and I'll be too heavy to fly! Rawk!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I could eat cherries for every meal. Rawk!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I'm stuffed! I don't think I could even eat another cherry.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: All this chattering has given me an appetite!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Rawk! You're not fattening me up, are you?

string.name: s1
string.value: I may talk a lot, but even I wouldn't say that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Let's keep it civil, shall we?

string.name: s3
string.value: I know I didn't hear that right. Did I?

string.name: s4
string.value: I see what kind of person you are.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ah, I'm so happy. What to do?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Yes, a nap would be good.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Yes, I was about to drop off...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I could use a good rest.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You must listen before you can talk.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can't think and talk at the same time.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is what I do for fun.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I can perform if I have to.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I have nothing to show you.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You no tell Bonkey what do!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No! Bonkey heart broken too many time in past.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Bonk! Here it come! Heh heh heh...

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Bonkey feel great weight lift off belly!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Bonkey want to dream about flying! Zoom!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Bonkey sleep now. Don't wake Bonkey up!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Bonkey feel sniffly. Sniffly Bonkey no sleep!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Bonkey love bomb. BOOM! Ha ha ha!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Bonkey good at lift heavy things! Just don't ask Bonkey to lift vase, okay?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Bonkey love fruit! But vegetables are groooss.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Bonkey scared of airplanes! Bonkey want ride boat.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Bonkey beat up monsters! Bonkey follow captain forever!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Bonkey have no word. No word!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Watch Bonkey dance. Watch Bonkey dance!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Bonkey best dancer. Dance dance dance!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Shake Bonkey shake! Shake shake shake!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Pyoo, let's a rest a little!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I'm still up and kicking, ookyu!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to play more!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pyoo? Don't we still have a long way to go?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ookyu? I don't want to rest right now...

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Pyoo! Am I sitting down, or laying down?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ookyu, it's the perfect time to rest!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Pyoo! Just for a minute, okay?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ookyu? I don't like being ordered around!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: We can't rest like this everyday!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ookyu, just a couple more steps!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Pyoo? Are you hurt? Why do you keep wanting to rest?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't talk to me like that!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Pyoo! Are you really going to keep doing this?!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ookyu... I miss the north pole...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm going to leave you then!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hmph! I told you to treat me nicely!!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Pyoo!! I'm going back to the north pole!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Pyoo! I can be scary too!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Pyoo! I like you better than the north pole.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'm so lucky to have a master like you!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Pyoo! I love hanging out with you.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What a happy day it is today!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Pyoo! I'll be with you forever!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ookyu, did you eat some bad fish?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm a Harp Seal, and you are a human!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Ookyu! You should be ashamed of yourself!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Tell me that AFTER you feed me!!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You can't order me to do everything!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ookyu! Every day is a healthy day!!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: This is shameful! You'll be hearing from my Harp Lawyers!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: The sun is still shining bright!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You are a sleepyhead, aren't you, master?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't want to sleep yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll sleep when I get sleepy, okie?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Good seals are early to bed, early to rise.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I guess master isn't too healthy...

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why do you always tell me to sleep?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Is this going to make us closer?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Well you know, in the north pole... (It just rambles on)

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I saw this weird animal in the forest... (It won't stop talking)

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Do you know the difference between true seals and fake seals?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I love it here because there aren't any polar bears.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I wish I had some snow to lie on.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm all white so I can hide from polar bears in the snow!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Will you protect me from polar bears, master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm sure glad for nice people like you, master.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Pigs sure are weird! Why do their bottoms curl up like that?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Ookyu ookyu! Isn't it hard walking on two legs, master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Where are we going today? Anywhere's fine with me!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What should we eat for dinner? I want some milk!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I don't feel like opening my mouth... too much work...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I love you, you love me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Pyoo pyoo pyoo! (It seems to be singing.)

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Ookyu ookyu, pyoo! Ookyu ookyu, pyoo!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Are you really asking me that?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You show me something first, master!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Itsy bitsy seals and penguins, dancing at north pole!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Three seals in a house, daddy seal, mommy seal, and baby seal!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: You want your pet to show its talents?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Pyoo! You sure take good care of me, master!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Don't you think I've gotten a little fat?

string.name: s2
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: s3
string.value: I don't want to be a pottymouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Words reflect your insides, you know?!!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I get sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh... this is easier~ BARK BARK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I can't understand what the master is saying~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: It's too hard to understand~ BARK BARK!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Bark bark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No. I don't want to sit! BARK BARK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying~ Woof woof~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now~ Woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Still telling me to sit? It's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My hind legs are so short. I feel more comfortable sitting like this... hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here... this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh... itchy... (acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something harder.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look... bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here... BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore... BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out... wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times... why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, boredom doesn't give you the right to abuse me! Woof woof!!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master... I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man, master's going off on me again and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Master, things happen sometimes... why so mad??

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr... master's not happy over nothing...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'll be better... bark... much better...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I'm hurt inside... pretty bad... bark...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: How can you say such thing... bark...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that... bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... I'll just pretend I never heard that... bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing... woof woof...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Master, I'm really really hurt... woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof...

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you didn't really mean it... right? Woof...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof~

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey... You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey... you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday... that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good... just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you... you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you~~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy... stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now... hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now, THAT was embarassing~ Bark bark~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh man, this smells... bark bark...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like pooping... bark

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go before coming out... heh

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: So may people around here, how am I gonna poop in public?? bark bark...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I just pooped a few min. ago... bark bark...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Ahhhhh... whoa, I almost stepped on it... bark bark

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I almost got constipated... bark bark

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... bark bark

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master... the poop isn't coming out... bark bark!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: It's not time to go poop yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel it yet... bark bark

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Master...pooping should only be at the bathroom... bark bark

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Ahh...the poop looks really good today

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Ahh...master you can't step on it!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Ahhh, that was good... whoa, master...you stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't poop what I didn't eat...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Can you poop even if you don't feel like it?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I had nothing to eat all day, so no poop for me...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I must be constipating right now...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area... bark bark!!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? bark bark bark!?!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me... hehe... bark!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! Bark bark!!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change the menu every once in a while... I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island... woof woof~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have nothing to say... woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking... I'm really depressed... woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm depressed... everything's annoying... don't feel like talking... woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there... haha

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey... how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying~~must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man... do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart. What can I say? Bark bark!!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark!!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe... this is really easy~ Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like... this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Master, I did well... right? Right?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry. just feed me!!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here... woof~!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: My... my legs are short, that's why it's hard... woof!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I won't do it... woof woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa... with these shorties?? I'm incredible, yo!!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus??

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too master~! Woof woof!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Hehe... I feel good... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master... woof woof!

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else... and I didn't hear it... woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.value: I love you too master very very much!!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!!!

string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.value: This is waay too easy! Bark!

string.value: I don't want to do it~ bark!

string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore... woof woof...

string.value: Don't make me say bad words! Woof!

string.value: Grr... Yeti is a good Yeti...Grr...

string.value: If the master keeps scolding Yeti, Yeti will run away~ Grrr!!

string.value: Yeti is good, but... Yeti feels hurt...Grr~

string.value: Grr~ If Yeti keeps being scolded, Yeti will feel very lonely~ Grrr...

string.value: Yeti will leave~ off to El Nath!!! Grrr~

string.value: Yeti gets angry if scolded~ Yeti likes compliments~ Grrr!!

string.value: Grr~ Yeti may be scolded, but Yeti still likes the master~

string.value: Grr... Yeti would one day like to revisit El Nath someday~ Grrr~

string.value: Yeti likes being told that Yeti is cute~Grrr~

string.value: Grr.... Just looking at something delicious makes Yeti's day~

string.value: Master is a bad person... And Yeti is very full.. Grr...

string.value: Grrr...Yeti doesn not know that word.

string.value: Yeti wants the master not to say that. Grr~
