string.value: Master never orders me to do that.Grr...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I think I will, thank you.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'm extra adorable when I sit. Look!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: As you wish! Can I have some ramen now?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Sigh, why are you so bossy?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I think better on my feet.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: All right. I think I deserve a rest.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: A bowl of ramen would make this moment perfect.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sure. Why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What? Here? At least get me a chair.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't want to get my tail dirty.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll sit here and think about ramen.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My legs are short and cute, but they get tired sometime.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I want to travel, not sit!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I really don't feel like sitting right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're right. Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean I can get away with everything.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: If I let you have my ramen, will you stop scolding me? Please?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You don't know what you're talking about.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Are you TRYING to make me mad?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: If I behave, will you give me some ramen?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're going to make me cry!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: C'mon. You can't scold someone THIS cute.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll run away, and then you'll regret getting mad at me.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Don't stand so close to me.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: For that, I'll let you scratch my tummy.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do I look easy to you?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Then shower me with ramen, please!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I always knew I was irresistible.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not as much as I love myself.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: When you gotta go, you gotta go.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Hope you brought along toilet paper!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Such a perfectly round little pelle!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not right now. I have a headache.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You into that sort of thing?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Does this make me a party POOPer? Get it?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Hey! Are you saying I have a stick up my butt?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Will you sing me a lullaby?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Don't even THINK of using me as a pillow.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: You're not the boss of me.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can sleep if you want. I'm busy.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of ramen.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I count pies and donuts to fall asleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Will you pet me until I doze off?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I only sleep on silk sheets.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Last time I slept, someone tied my tail to my ears. Pass!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm refusing just to be rebellious.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I suppose I could afford to take a break.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Hey, I just wanted to tell you that I think you're really... Zzz.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You should rest, too. You can cuddle with me.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Coffee ramen, pizza ramen, donut ramen... Zzz.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do I LOOK sleepy to you?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You're so lazy, sometimes you disgust me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have recipes to create! No time for sleep!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I'm not chubby, I'm big-boned. Just wanted to let you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Everybody who meets me, loves me. Didja know that?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Just 'cause I'm cute doesn't mean my life is easy.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Ramen is really good with sugar and honey. Try it!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Go away. I'm sick of your face.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why do you always follow me around?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Ugh, what do you want from me?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My dream is to become the world's best ramen chef!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I think about new ramen recipes all the time. Imagine: deep-fried ramen!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Here's a secret: my parents can transform into human shape.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Do you think red herb ramen would do well in this market?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't you have anyone else to pester?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: You must be really lonely to be bothering me.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm going to pretend I don't see you.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I figure, if I stick with you, I'll get to travel and try all sorts of ramen!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm actually a really great dancer. I've got the perfect figure for it.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: People who want to bring me down say I'm fat, but I know it isn't true.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes people tell me I have no parents. I don't get it. I DO have parents!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Do I LOOK like I'm in the mood?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: We can dance if we want to!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Ah, I'm so adorable when I dance, I want to hug myself.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: You love me even more than before I danced, don't you?

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm not here for your amusement.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I'll think about it, IF you get me some ramen.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Believe it or not, I'm actually quite shy.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You ain't never seen nobody as cute as me!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Buy me a mirror so I can admire myself when I dance!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: What, and then you'll give me a treat? How demeaning.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I'm on strike until you take me to a new ramen restaurant.

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is why I love you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I could eat ten servings in one sitting!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Mouth...likes. Stomach, not so much. Too full!

string.name: s4
string.value: I can hear you, you know.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit like this? Bark?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It's so sleepy sitting down, bark!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't understand what the master's saying! Kong!

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I have no clue what you said! Barkbark!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: No I don't want to sit! Barkbark!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Master, this is how you sit, right? Woof!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Master, I'm doing well, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I hope the master keeps asking me to sit...woof woof!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I have short legs, so it's easy to sit! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, I can't tell what you're saying! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, do I HAVE to sit right now? woof woof!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Let's do something else right now! woof woof!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's too dirty to sit here! Woof woof!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Yo master...still telling me to sit? IT's waaay too easy...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: My back legs are so short, I feel more comfortable sitting like this...hehe...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: You want me to sit? Here...this is the right way, right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Ahh...itchy...(acting like I didn't hear it...)

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting is waaaay too easy. Give me something hard to work on.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: (scratching) Whoa? What did you just say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I'm sick of doing stuff at your command...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please don't give me that look...bark bark!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Krrr...Do you want to be punished by ME?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Bark Bark Bark!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I was just sitting here...BARK BARK BARK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Krrrr...One of these days, I won't take it anymore...BARK BARK!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Master, I'll be careful from here on out...wooof...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Master! Things like that happen at times...why so mad? Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master, just because you're bored, doesn't mean you have a right to abuse me! Woof woof!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find a cute pet like this? Krrrr...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong! Woof woof!!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master...I'll be more careful next time...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Master, I'll be good, I'll be good...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Man...the master's going off on me again...and I didn't do a thing...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Rrrr...master's not happy over a nothing...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Huh? I was too itchy to hear that...bark...!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...I'll just pretend I never heard that...bark...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: What did the master just say? Bark...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: How can you say such thing...woof woof...

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Master, are you for real...? Woof........

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, was that a joke? Woof!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: You didn't mean that, right? Woof woof...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Ey...You mean that for real? Woof???

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Ey...you were just saying that because you're bored, right? Woof?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You say that everyday...that hurts you know...

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Master, I'll be good...just don't leave me alone...

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Whatever you tell me, I'll still be following you and only you...sigh...

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How can you...you don't really mean it, right?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: What? What did you say? I can't hear you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ahh, itchy...stop saying that and bathe me instead!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that now...hehe...

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Oh that felt good! Bark bark!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Hehe...I must have drank a lot of water...bark bark!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't feel like peeing right now...bark...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How am I supposed to pee on purpose when there's nothing coming out...bark...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarassing to pee here...BARK! BARK BARK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hehe...NO!! Got some on my legs!!! Woof.........

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Master...it hasn't been long since I last peed...woof...

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey master, it's not time to pee just yet...woof...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh, that feels good...but it's still embarassing...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Shhhh....wait, that OJ I drank...that's a funny-looking pee there...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Shhhhhhh! Oops, almost stepped on it...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to pee out anyway...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: It's a secret, just between you and me...I have a hidden bone around this area...bark bark!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: What's the latest on radio? Bark bark bark! Kong!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What's your hobby? Hopefully it's something that involves me...hehe...BARK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I heard in one of the hidden streets at Henesys ther's a huuuuuge mushroom called Mushmom, am I right? Bark!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How's a dog supposed to talk? Bark!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: NO! Don't feel like talking! BARK BARK!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you! Bark!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I feel like crap! Bark bark!!!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Please change up the menu every once in a while...I'm sick of eating the same thing over and over again...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Every once in a while, I feel like riding a boat to some other island and just chill there...woof woof!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: How are you today? Good? Right? Good!! Woof woof!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: You better be careful not to get ripped off when doing business with someone else...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking...I'm really depressed...woof woof...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: II'm depressed...everything's annoying...don't feel like talking...woof...

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: What's the menu for today? Can I get something nice?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Master, you have a huge head! hahha!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You look like you've got yourself quite a belly there...haha!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ey...how about feeding me right now?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: So annoying! must have nothing to do right now...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Man...do I have to talk again? Don't feel like it...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: What do you think? Good? GOOD? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Well, I'm smart, what can I say? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sweeet! Here, what do you think? Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No! I wanna do something else! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't know what you're saying!!! Bark! Bark!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Can't understand what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You have a short tongue, right? I have noooo idea what you're saying! Bark bark!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Master, that was good, right? Right? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehe...this is really easy! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll do whatever you ask me to do! Woof woof!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Master, is this how you do it? Woof woof!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Just feed me first! Woof woof!!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: The floor's too dirty so I don't want to do that! Woof!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you lie on your belly first! Woof...!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: You show me first!! Woof woof!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Like...this? I'm just going to do this once...

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Like this, huh? Whatever you ask me to do...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Hey master! I won't do everything you ask me to do...!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Master! I'm hungry; just feed me!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Like this? Woof woof...this is hard...

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Whoa...the air's much cleaner up here...woof!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: MMy...my legs are short...that's why it's hard...woof!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to get up with these legs? Woof woof!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Hey master, but I can't walk on two feet...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Whoa...with these shorties? I'm incredible, kong kong kong!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Maybe if I get fed right now...

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: With these short legs, I can't even stand on four feet well..

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Is the master trying to put me on showcase for a circus?

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can't be asking too much from a dog...

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: What did you just say? Bark bark...

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: That's MY MASTER, ladies and gentlemen...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I know you're lying, master...woof woof.

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I was thinking of something else...and I didn't hear it...Woof...

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: You think I'll like you back? Woof...

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you too master very very much!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: You better love me and no one else!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Everyone knows that's just a token gesture...

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: And then the master will go off on me later...

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: You think I'll fall for that again...?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I'm so full I can't eat anymore...woof...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Master, this is really delicious! Woof woof...

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master, I can't eat anymore...woof woof...

string.name: s2
string.value: No, please don't say that! Woof!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting down. Aren't I obedient?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Well if you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit around!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I guess I should obey you.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sorry, I was lightyears away. What's up?

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I wanna see more of this!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I wanna go look around some more.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You think being the master's all there is?!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You're going to be sorry if you don't stop!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Act like a good owner already!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You don't have to sound so ominous...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Maybe getting hit by a shooting star will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever see an angry star?!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You REALLY want to see me mad!?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I feel kinda icky when you say that...

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Uh, great, let me just go think about that...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: We were destined to be together!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm so happy you're here with me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I'll be by your side until I supernova!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Do you think me a savage?!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Like a little golden pile of sunshine!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Why are you laughing at me!?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Come back when you learn some etiquette!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Busy! Doing star business. Come back later.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Play with me! Don't wait till I fall asleep!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Did you know that tiny stars in the sky are bigger than the Earth?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I may be a tiny star now, but I will grow up someday!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You prefer stars or the moon? Or the sun?!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Hold on, I need to catch some rays...

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I saw the neon signs in the city the other day. I can totally do that!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can produce all kinds of light!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm usually sleepy when I see Mr. Moon... Is it just me?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: There are so many stars in the universe that you haven't met!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You think it's weird that stars have wings? I think it's weird that YOU DON'T.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I heard there was an animal called a starfish that looks like me!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Space is a vast place. You couldn't even imagine!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Starwings dine on Milky Way Essence to become majestic stars!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I sometimes want to be the only star.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I'm a little busy now, but I'll tell you something interesting later.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Starwings can spin like this and not get dizzy!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Cool, right? This dance move isn't easy!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Us Starwings dance like this when we're really happy!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: This may look easy, but it isn't!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I hardly have the energy to stand right now...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't think now's a good time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I want to eat, but I'm just too stuffed...

string.name: s2
string.value: That's not something a human should say...

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: An' a one, an' a two...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong. YOU'RE bad!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm gonna hang out at the Free Market.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Sometimes I wonder...is all this really worth it?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I need to get myself ready.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: *Grunt* It feels like my face is burning.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to play outside with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A, B, C, D, E, F, G!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy be to with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: Do you want to become a demon?

string.name: s2
string.value: You must not say something as foul as that.

string.name: s4
string.value: Why would you say something like that?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Landed too hard. Bruised my butt.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: No thanks. Sometimes when I try to sit, I trip.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Well, I guess I could use a rest.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Would you look at that view! Beautiful world we live in, general.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Sit with me? We can discuss our adventuring strategies, general.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew, I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: But we still have a lot further to go!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: To be honest, it's not that easy for me to sit down.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I'll just snuggle here next to you, general.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Oh, good. I needed to groom my wings anyway.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: My wings need exercise. They're getting pudgy!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Please don't hit me! Are you going to hit me?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: When I hum to myself, I can't hear you.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I think I'm going to cry!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You just might make me angry for the first time in my life.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Be nice to me! Please! I'm sorry!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You... You still love me, don't you?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: But I love CARROTS, not you.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm so happy I could fly, except I'm scared of heights.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Do you have to say that in such a creepy voice?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Just keep galloping. Just keep galloping.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the strongest, bestest person I know.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Just feed me and don't talk, please.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone right now.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Got any toilet paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: Oh! I feel much better now! Neigh!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I'll try not to lose my balance and fall in this time.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Hey, it's orange! Just like my favorite food, carrots!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: An adventurer never poops in public!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Whoops, is that a brown speck on my wing?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Does the texture look a little off to you?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Quick! Make sure no one's peeking!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't need to go right now.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: This is how I snore: zzzeigh, zzzeigh.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I could use a quick little nappy nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: A true adventurer never rests! Right?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: When I close my eyes, it gets dark, and I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: But what if monsters get me?!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I think you just want an excuse to nap.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I hope I dream of carrots!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't let anyone hurt me, mmkay?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: But what if I get nightmares?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You sleep, general. I'll stand guard.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Can you buy me a stuffed carrot to hug?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Keep me secret, keep me safe, general.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I can't keep my eyes open. Zzzzzeigh.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: But I just downed an energy drink!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No! I want to have an adventure!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Carrots are amazing! They're nutritious, orange, pointy...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I lick my wings to keep them clean, just like a kitten.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If you have a heart of courage, the world is your carrot!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want to be alone right now, please.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes people call me a unicorn, so I tried tying a carrot on my head.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My second favorite thing in the world? Carrots. My first favorite thing? YOU!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I want to be just like you when I grow up!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Where should we adventure to next, general? I can't wait!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: We're too busy to talk right now!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I trip over my own feet sometimes, but I won't let that stop me!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes, my wings get tangled up in each other and I fall on my face.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm brave, general? I really hope you do.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What's your favorite? Deep-fried carrot, carrot steak, or carrot stew?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We should save our energy for our adventures!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not good at small talk.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: But I want to hear about YOUR adventurers, general!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Heh, not everyone can pull THIS off.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: Hold on to your hats, ladies and gents!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I'm an adventurer, not a circus performer!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Think I deserve a carrot for this, general?

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Let's see a unicorn try to pull this off.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This comes in real handy for an explorer like me.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, please.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Hey, I'm a colt, not a pig!

string.name: s2
string.value: General! An adventurer ought to know better!

string.name: s4
string.value: Do you see the disappointment in my eyes, general?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I shall sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: And why should I listen to you?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I can't hear you . Speak up.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I never tire, I'm just sitting for fun.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can neither hear nor see you right now.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hmph. Fine. I get the point.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: You'll never hear me say this again, but I'm sorry.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I suppose you detest me now.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I KNOW you're not talking to ME.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I'll do you a favor and pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You have three seconds to take that back.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: But I'm always up to no good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I don't even know why I'm saying this, but sorry.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Why are you acting like this?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How DARE you speak to me like this!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I suppose I ought to say thanks, but instead I'll say: SCRAM.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You have to do better than that.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Stick around. I might have some use for you.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You're kidding yourself if you think you have a chance with me.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Have you looked in a mirror lately?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Now clean it up. Use your hands.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Consider that a favor. Now you owe me.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Some things you just don't do in public.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You're not even going to bribe me?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I don't know if you can tell, but I'm rolling my eyes.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You think you can just tell me what to do?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Maybe if you weren't so NOISY.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Do you have any idea what time it is?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: But I'll have nightmares about your face.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Your stench is too strong. Can't fall asleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You really think you can make me?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I can spend hours thinking of ways to make people cry.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There's nothing more satisfying than an evil deed done well.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: The weather annoys me. Change it.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I enjoy traveling. Why else do you think I let you hang around?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I enjoy food. So feed me.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sometimes, I wonder where I came from.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If I wanted to talk, I'd talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I want to lock all the people I despise into a dark, windowless room.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Big Headward has an awfully large head for such a small brain.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Some creatires are so ugly, I don't know how they can stand to look in the mirror

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: That Wonky the Fairy'll eat anything. I've tested it.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I'm the silent but deadly type.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: s3
string.value: Try to keep it classy, will you?

string.name: s4
string.value: Mind your manners. You embarrass me.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd like to see you try to make me.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Are you testing me? Now I'm scared to move.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Happy now? Can we go now?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Don't you care about saving the world?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: La di da... Doo doo doop...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: It was YOUR fault. You made me do it!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. It was MY fault, okay?!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Do you have it in you to forgive me?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I'll make you regret saying that.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you say that to me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, so now you can't be mad anymore.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again. Promise!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: All words have consequences. Just wait and see.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: When you're least expecting it, I'll get you back...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I'm not unhappy you said that.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You're kind of sweet, I suppose.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I'm not quite ready to say it back, but thanks.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: At least buy me dinner first.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I'll just pretend I didn't hear that.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Please tell me no one's watching.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not that kind of dragon.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: Don't ask that of me. Please!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You just don't let up. Oh, very well.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It makes me uncomfortable that you're watching.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: This... This actually feels kind of good.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I, uh, I have a headache.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm actually really getting into this.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: You're watching, right? It's not the same if you don't watch.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't MY feelings matter to you?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Please. I just want to disappear.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave the lights on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm fine as I am, thanks very much.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You go on and mind your own business.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first, if you wish.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you weren't so much bigger than me, I wouldn't have to listen to you.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I refuse to go to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Just because you're tired doesn't mean I am.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: You'll keep the boogieman away, right?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're going to have to say that again, and slower.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: But what if the nightmares return? Sniffle.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I come from a line of prestigious dragons, you know.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: My daddy could change colors. He could even turn invisible!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My daddy could beat up all the other dragon's daddies.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My daddy's roar would make you go deaf.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'd like to see you try to make me.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Someday, I'll rule over ALL the dragons.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: What about YOUR heritage? Are you anyone special?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'll tell you a secret. It took me a long time to learn how to fly.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Sometimes, I just don't understand what you want.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Isn't there anyone else you can go bother?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I have no idea what you want.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: When I grow up, I'll be able to turn invisible like my daddy.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Just watch. I'll turn invisible. There, did you see it?!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey, what do you think of the Nova?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Can i go play with the other dragons?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You can be a real pest.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I learned this from my daddy.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I don't have any talents, I swear!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: I don't know what you want.

string.name: s3
string.value: You are so mean. Don't talk to me.

string.name: s4
string.value: I'm so disappointed in you. So disappointed.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'll sit, if that's what you want.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: It feels really comfortable to sit!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it... I feel so sad.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to go back to the patch...

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: It's good for bears to rest! A lot.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Come to think it, I feel so furious!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Why are you trying to pick a fight with me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me...

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You went too far. I mean it...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't ever do that again!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You just bummed out a bear...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I am going to run away from home.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Be careful on the street at night.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll always be at your side.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do that?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: You do it first. Go on!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Hahaha, I did it! I took a dump!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't want to take a dump now.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Not now... It's all fluffy down there.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm going to do it at my home.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave my light on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You may go to bed first.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I have to go to bed.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I am in the dream world.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Hold on, I have to think about this.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: There were three bears in a house...

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It's all because of a bear!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Sometimes us bears get a little snoozy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: The word for bear is 'bear' in Korean.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You should be able to spend time alone.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: A bear's belly is as round as a plate.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I've been a fool for my entire life until now. A fluffy fool!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Are you interested in gall bladders? Because that's gross.

string.name: s2
string.value: Huh? How could you do that?

string.name: s3
string.value: You're awful! Don't tell me about it.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I guess I have been working pretty hard.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Will that make the constituents like me more?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I've got a few bills to review anyway...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just had these slacks pressed.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: That's no way to win a campaign!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Maybe I need a rocking chair...

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: My voters really love when I sit down.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Can we do something else, please?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't like to sit down, I like to work!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's as easy as fair taxation!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: A good sit helps the mind focus!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I could do this all day.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You repeat yourself quite a bit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't afford to look silly.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I suppose I could use some rest.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That'll give me time to think about my next bill.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I don't know the meaning of the word!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: That's not how you win elections, friend.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I could use a little time off...

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Just going to run over my speech a few times...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: My advisors told me to look busy!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: No way, no how, no sirree.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: When I set my mind to something, it happens.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I like that, makes me seem more down-to-earth.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: There are hands to shake somewhere!

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The whole world is going to know!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: This is a scandal just waiting to happen.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you tell that to the reporters?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Really? Because I haven't seen a buffet in weeks.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: In the blink of an eye, I stand.

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: We're going to hit the issues!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Look what a perfect candidate I am.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I can walk and talk with the best of them.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I should be working on my speech.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: Can we get a little food first?

string.name: c25_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: The military isn't strong enough yet.

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: What do you know about income tax regulation?

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can be fun, like normal people!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Hard work and no play is un-American.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I can do this all day!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: There's too much work to do.

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: We still need to talk about the important issues!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Have I shown you my fastball?

string.name: c29_s2
string.value: Let's play... With the federal deficit!

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I love a good bit of fun!

string.name: c29_s4
string.value: Can't wait to see how fun this looks on the news.

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: Playing alone is just no fun.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: Can't we just watch eagles for a while?

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You know what's fun? Balanced budgets.

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: Come help me find an alternative energy source! Wooo!

string.name: c30_s4
string.value: I'm going to pretend I'm president already!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: We're running out of games here.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: People aren't going to take us seriously.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: Let me check with my advisors first.

string.name: c30_f4
string.value: I think the people want to see me being more serious.

string.name: c31_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c31_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c32_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.value: Get outta here before the press gets wind of this!

string.value: Well, uh, you wanna talk about the economy?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I don't know if this is the right time...

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I'll have to run that past my advisors.

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: Don't flip-flop now, I need your vote!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I know a fibber when I hear one.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I hope I've still got your vote.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Don’t take that out of context.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Don't give up on me yet!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I was wrong about that, and I admit it.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: My opponent is just as bad as me!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I know that wasn't he best result, but I can fix it.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Please don't hit me in front of the cameras...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Why are you blaming me? It was one of my aides!

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'm feeling a little exposed, but here we go.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Keep it out of the media, okay?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I'm the boss, I don't have to listen!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I suppose we all have to relieve ourselves.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: For the good of the country!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Drinking lots of water is good for you.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: A little shut-eye is good for the complexion.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Just a little more work, okay?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: There's no time! I need to prepare a statement.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I can't let the delegates see me sleeping!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm not ready to rest! I'm ready to fight!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Time for sweet dreams of my heroes...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You're just waiting to get a funny picture of me for the papers.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: There's a whole lot of meeting and greeting to do!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I should be kissing babies right now!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Now's not the time to be slacking off.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I believe in hard work and good people!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: It's good to be on the right side.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Remember to take care of yourself and your country!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Everything you need to know is on my campaign website.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: The debates aren't for another few days!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Let me tell you about my recovery plans.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: We need to bring our troops home!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: It's time to get real about family values!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I need some more time to fix this speech.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I don't know what to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: America is the best nation on the planet!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm bringing the stars and stripes back!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What do you know about corporate regulation?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I need to talk with my advisors first.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: What looks better? One leg, or two?

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: No sir, I don't like it.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm perfectly comfortable where I am.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I feel pretty strongly about you too.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I want to go back to the patch...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Pumpkins don't get mad... we get revenge.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: You can't fake being a pumpkin! Impostor!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: But... this dirt is so crummy...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What do you take me for?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am going to poop in your lunchbox SO much.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Don't do anything you're going to regret when you go to sleep tonight.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't say it unless you mean it!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You better hope I don't get ahold of your shoes.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I said it won't happen again.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I wish somebody had carved me a mad face.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Want to see an angry pumpkin? Do you?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I've got a lot of laxatives to put into some candy tonight...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Don't do it! Listen to your pumpkin!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Why are you doing this to me?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You're creepy in a good way!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You are the seeds in my brain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'll be at your side until the day I rot.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Think of me as a child with a misshapen head.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Does it look like my insides?

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Gonna need some more candy wrappers here!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's a good thing I bought those candles.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Why are you asking me to do that?

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: It is against pumpkin law for me to go first.

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Makin' squeezin's outta my pumpkin butt!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Which one of these creases is my backside?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't have to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am on this like black on a bat.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Let's go get some candy instead.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Leave my light on! I'm scared of the dark.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I have gourd business to attend to.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I need to scare some children first!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Not until I see a ghost!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I dream of turning YOUR head into a lantern.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Sorry, I can't hear you with all the awesome in my brain.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Not until we trick or treat!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I need at least three screaming kids to lull me to sleep.

string.value: First time seeing a talking pumpkin?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Wanna see some pumpkin magic? Gimme your wallet.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: October is obviously the best month.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Do you know when Halloween is? I don't understand the concept of time.

string.value: Pumpkin is NOT delicious. Don't eat me.

string.value: Don't expect too much from a pumpkin.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You should be more like me... a terror to all humanity.
