string.value: I will do as you say.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Scram, my clothes are getting dirty.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Why don't you take a break too?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hmm. Don't block the path of a rabbit.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Too much dust here. Can't do it.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: These clothes are pricey. I can't just sit down.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I'm going to put a candle in your head.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: (Little veins are popping out on its forehead.)

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Come at me! I'll take you on.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: It makes me sad that you have to discipline me.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You want to feel the wrath of the rabbit don't you?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: All right... If that's how you want it.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: If I wasn't a pet... I would....

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Blah... I will take the high road here.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You ever feel the punch of a rabbit?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If I was just a bit younger... I would have taken you on.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I like you a lot too!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I feel the same way too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Give me some time to think it over.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You are you, and and I am me, and that is all we'll ever be.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I don't know if feeling this good is legal!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: This is the happiest moment of my life!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I will be with you always!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: My insides are nice and clean.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Do you want to get locked up?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: It's good to eat right and live well.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Stop that nonsense and let's play!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My eyes are closed. I am one with my bowels.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't want to hear that dirty talk.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am still good to go.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Now is not a good time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Sleeping is done on beds. Or hutches.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Do you know what's popular these days?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You are pretty fashionable, I guess.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I only like the designer stuff.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Not all expensive clothes are designer clothes.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: It's important that clothes fit you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't wear it just because everyone else is wearing it.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: My hair is the product of a famous stylist.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You want to go shopping with me?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Be aware of Purty... She is a scary person.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't have such a thing.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: You expect too much from this rabbit.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I am not leaving any leftovers!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm so full, I am about to explode!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: How do you expect a Merlion to sit? On my tail? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Let me sit in a nice pose like this! Cute? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It wasn't easy sitting down on my tail but here you go! Pretty me?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: It's never easy to sit on my tail! Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's do the Merlion Dance! rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Can we do something else? Like, spitting water?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, rwarrrr!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, I will obstruct the railway station! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It was nicely done right? Rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Sitting was never easy for me, but I did it! Rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Why not instead of asking me to sit, you get me some cookies? rwarrrrr!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's do the Kallang Wave for fun shall we? rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I need to strike a nicer pose to sit! rwarrrrrrr!!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Are you all hopped up on Gummy Bears? I can't understand you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's not easy being the iconic symbol of Singapore!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It was a piece of cake!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Whaddaya think? It was cute right?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you wear a Mermaid suit and try sitting down! Rwarrrrrrr!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: tskkkk! you gave me a fright!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am a Lion and you ain't scaring me! NO!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Tell me baby where did we go wrong? Rwarrrrrrr!!!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Why not you tell me to take all the blame?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Oh so you think I did something wrong eh?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I know you don't mean it, you don't!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: You're not really mad at me are you? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I promise I wont do that again!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong anyway? Which way? Tskkkk!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You are trying to be cool but you are not cool!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can be resting at Sentosa and not walk around being your pet you know? Tskkkkk!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep doing that, one day I will spit water at your face!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will take note of it and be careful from now on!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: This I promise you! That I will be good!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You don't stare at a Merlion like that!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I don't think I have done anything wrong but you are...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I have been in here for so long.. longer than you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You see! You going all out at me again for nothing! Rwarrrrrrrrr!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You must be bored! No problem, let me spit water in your face!

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So you think you are more clever than me? Really?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Throw me around all you want, I'm just gonna splash you!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: You don't like me? You can leave me here! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Ok, you win! No more waterworks.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I dare you to NOT take back what you just said! RWARRRRRR!

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: It takes one to see one jerkface! tskk tskkk!

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: You won't like an angry Merlion! rwarrrrrr!!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: ...I can't believe you said that... rwarrrrrr!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: My heart is like beach glass, it breaks easily, and has been smoothed by the waves of the sea.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Tell me it's not from your heart, or I will spit water in your face!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: YOU HAVE CROSSED THE LINE, YOUNG ONE! RWARRRR!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I give you 60 seconds to take back what you just said!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You broke my heart into a million pieces!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You hurt me once, you hurt me twice! When will this stop?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You'd leave me behind like this? Who do you think you are? RWARRRR!!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I still like you, really! Hehe!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Do you not love me cause I am cute?

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Say that again and you get a face full of water!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: It got stuck at the causeway! Helpppp!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Oh, it smell like durian! Yikes.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Not yet! Not yet time to poop!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I dont want to poop, what can you do to me?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I can't go while you're looking at me.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: No more poops! Too much bad luck!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Oh dear, the smells are coming out!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm all out of poop power.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: It's been a while since the poop has flowed so regularly.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Please bear with me while I create the feeling!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I don't want! I don't want!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Do you read the newspaper when you poop?

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Ahhhh! The feeling is sooooo gooood!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I can't believe the buffet I had earlier just came out like that!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: The more I look at my poops, the more they look like you!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I haven't had a poop this good in years!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: There was nothing to come out in the first place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Errrrr can you bring me to the toilet? I cannot poop here, I am very shy!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You can't force me to poop if I don't have to! RWARRR!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Seek and you will find! Time to go hunt some rare drops!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Let's go for a tan on the beach! I will spit water at you to cool you down!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Sometime I wish someone could cover me with a blanet at night!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: How do Merlions talk? They spit water out from their mouth! HAHA!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Very hard to talk to you with this much water in my mouth.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say, nothing!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: The sun is out to play, so are the Merlions!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: The sky and the heavens tell me you will get lucky today!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Bring me some food and I will give you more luck!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Shall we try out something fun today?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't say this when you don't mean it!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I have little to say! rwarrrr!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I might be big but you can hold me tight!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who are you dating? Can I date them?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Hey, Have you heard of the Legendary Phantom Thief?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I heard that in a faraway island in a cave, there lives a scary monster with three heads!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Get me some cookies and we shall talk!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't wanna close my eyes! I don't wanna fall asleep!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Man I am so tired, don't feel like talking to people today!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hehehe! So shy now, I'm blushing! rwarrrr!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sure? Ok, I take it as a YES!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: What's up young one? Got cookies?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: ORLY? OK! I LOVE YOU TOO!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I love you too! Really! Rwarrrr!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Really? Haha! I love you too!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: You are very cool! I love you!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Pass me some food like... NOW! NOW! NOW!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: My mind isn't working straight today, I was thinking of something else!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I know you are lying! You ARE!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Whatever goes around, comes around! Right back at ya!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: You are my one and only!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Me too me too ME TOO!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Have you been eating my special Merlion cookies?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: Time to give me some food! Like... NOW!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Will you hug me to bed tonight?

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I am sleepy, can you give me your arms as my pillow?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You don't pretend to sleep when you are not! I can read your mind!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: The night is still young! Let's grab some cookies!

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: If you sing me a lullaby, I will go to bed!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I know you will run away when I am asleep!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: I can't sleep on empty stomach! cookies PLEASE!

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: Let's go for a ride! Vrooooommm!

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: You do it once but not twice alright!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I can't just do it anywhere.

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: Good thing only last while it last and goes to those who waits!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: Let's just sit and relax, ok?

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I have to stop eating, I am overweight!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: There's a limit to my stomach capacity!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Can I have a 2 piece Fun Meal please?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Hey, I am REALLY FULL! STOP FEEDING ME!

string.name: s2
string.value: Why are you talking to me in alien language?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: My gams could use a break.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Just gonna get my haunches down here... Ahhh...

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: What do I look like? A wombat?!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: That's not easy with a tail like mine.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Lemme take a little load off here.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: My legs are all cramped up!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Let's go on a walkabout instead!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Let's make up and get ourselves a sanger.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll try not to be such a dag.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Was I causing too much trouble?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'm not trying to offend you...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Say that when my gloves are on...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: Don't think too bad of me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't appreciate that kinda talk.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll just head back to the wild then...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Aww, I didn't mean anything by it!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: You're too strict, but I understand.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Can we just be mates again?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You don't have to be so mad!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Let's just take a minute to cool off.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Mind giving us a turnaround, mate?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can we get a little brekkie first?

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: You're just trying to get me in trouble.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: What kinda galah do you think I am?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: There's nothing moving in my britches.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm gonna need a little more fiber.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been needin' that, I tell ya.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really get a kick out of my backside.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I don't mean to whinge, but no!

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Easy way to make a quid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'd love to take a camping trip.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: How high do you think I can hop?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: How do you feel about koala bears?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: That's just gonna get us fightin'.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: You're just gonna let me loose in the paddock?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Lucky for you, I duxed English!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sometimes I like to do a little hop, sometimes I like to make it big.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Don't you think you'd be faster if you hopped?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: This joey's got better things to do.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I used to know a bushranger who could talk all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I sure miss my mum's pouch. It was so warm.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be a big old boomer one day.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Lemme tell you about the time I boxed this fella...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Maybe you should call one of your mates.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why don't we go bail up some monsters instead?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I'm not in to bodgy talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Don't tell anybody about this, mate.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm gobsmacked to get this kind of attention.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Okay, but just to get warm.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Don't think that's the best idea.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I hate to knock your thinking, but...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: All right! I was startin' to think you were a conch!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: We're not within a cooee of that happening.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I think we need to know each other a little better.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Thank goodness, you've been running me ragged.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: I could use a little kanga-nap.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Just point me at the matilda.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Let's go catch a flick instead.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: It's the middle of the afternoon... somewhere!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Thanks heaps. I was getting tired.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Just a little bit of shut-eye here...

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Don't put anything in my gloves while I'm asleep.

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: This seems like a terrible plan.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Can't you find a nice human?

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: I'll give it a fair go.

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: I hate to turn down my mates.

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: That sounds pretty nice, I suppose.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What did I do to deserve this?

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: Ha! You're such a dag sometimes.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: A dinkum roo like me doesn't do love!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: You're one of the good ones.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I think you're pretty all right.

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Let's just take it nice and slow, all right?

string.name: c28_f4
string.value: Can I chuck a sickie on this one, boss?

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: I'm just gonna throw this out there.

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: You want the wrecking balls? You got 'em!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: This is how we do it in the outback!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: I just got my gloves off!

string.name: c32_s2
string.value: And here I thought you were a wowser!

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: I'm gonna give you the good stuff!

string.name: c33_f2
string.value: Is there a copper I can call?

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Seems like a bad plan to me.

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: I need brekkies before I do anything.

string.name: c34_f4
string.value: Why? I don't see anything on the ground.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I'll put that one on my schedule.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: I don't want everybody to think I'm a show pony.

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: You really know how to barrack up a bloke.

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: That's good to hear from a mate.

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I mean, I LIKE you, but...

string.name: c37_s1
string.value: Well I don't want to big-note myself, but...

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: Yep, the best looking roo this side of... Anywhere!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: Mum always thought I was a looker.

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: I don't like where this is going.

string.name: c37_f2
string.value: No. Just not going to happen, mate.

string.name: c37_f3
string.value: That's a ripper of a joke!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm getting a little chunk around the tail.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This is my one favor for the day,

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Look at what I can do!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I suppose I could make the effort.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Sitting my koala behind dowwwn on the grouund.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I didn't mean to make you mad!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're supposed to love me no matter what!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Just because I'm smaller that you.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm going to call those crazy animal people on you.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Just let me stare into space, okay?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I have a busy schedule of doing nothing all day.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I come from a land far, far away.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: The koala bear loves to go to sleep, go to sleep, go to sleep.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Koala wala, bo bala. Fee fie foe fala. KOALA!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My favorite trees are eucalyptus trees.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My schedule of doing nothing keeps me busy all day.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Hug me! Hug me! Hug me! Let me sleep on you!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My favorite part of a conversation is the pauses between words.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I think I'm just about the cutest thing ever.

string.name: c1_s1
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: How about a snack while I'm sitting here?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Sit, stand, sit, stand. I ain't a circus elephant.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Give me one good reason why.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: *chews on a leaf and ignores you*

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You look in a mirror lately?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Well, if the pot ain't calling the kettle black...

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You got something to say, you say it to my face.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: You're the one who raised me...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I've made a note of that.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Back at ya, but don't tell anyone.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Do I look like a sucker?

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: All right, but keep it on the down low, okay?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Well, shucks, I love ya, too.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I guess things could be worse.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Clean up after me, will ya?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I can't just do it, you know.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I need more fiber in my diet.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Whew, that was a big one.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ouch, I think I sprained something.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Been holding that one in for weeks.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Talk louder. I can't hear you!

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Shut the window, will ya? Don't wanna catch a cold while I nap.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, kid.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Only because I feel like it.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'll sleep when I wanna sleep, not when you tell me to.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Do you see me giving YOU commands?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Guess I could catch a few Z's.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I was going to do that anyway.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Let me just put these dentures away.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You ain't the boss of me.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Don't speak until you're spoken to!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: WHAT DID YOU SAY?! Gotta turn up my hearing aid.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Everybody's got an opinion these days.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: When I was your age, I beat up monsters with my bare hands... Uphill! Both ways!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Wanna hear a secret? BE QUIET.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: The world just ain't what it used to be.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a nice, long back rub.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Candy should be illegal. That'll teach them kids to steal my slippers.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Whatever you're selling, I ain't buying.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: My bones ache. Got any painkillers?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Darn kids keep trampling my lawn.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: What do you mean 'old man'? I'm only two!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: You wanna talk? Get yourself a parrot!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: What I wouldn't do for a moment's peace and quiet.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Stop trying to shove food down my throat.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I'm not wearing my Pants of Sitting!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: What are the rewards for completing this quest?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: But I just wanted to play!

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I can be fixed, I promise!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Can I restart from the last checkpoint?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: How many lives do I have left?

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I missed that. Can you repeat?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Let's not and say we did!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Do koalas dream of electric eucalyptus leaves?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I always have my favorite dice in my pocket.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: All of my Monster Life critters are level 9999.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My favorite show is Game of Ornate Kingly Chairs

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wish I had an HP Bar over my head.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Life would be better if I lived in a video game.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Why don't people like pocket protectors? They're extremely useful!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Yes, of course I'm from the secret koala level.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My alter ego is a superhero who can fly and time travel.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: On the weekends, I cover my fur in gold glitter and roleplay as an elven ruler.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I'm building an android koala army to combat the pending zombie apocalypse.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I dust my action figure collection twice a day.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Want to read the first draft of my epic fantasy novel?

string.name: c2_s1

string.value: You're just as charming as me!

string.name: c12_s4

string.value: I may be quiet, but I haven't forgiven you.

string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I accept, but understand that I don't feel the same way.

string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Why do you make me suffer?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: I'm not going to throw that away.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm trying, but nothing is coming out!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Don't talk to me! Can't you see that I'm concentrating?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: You're the one who needs some sleep. See those bags under your eyes?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: How can I sleep when I don't feel sleepy at all?

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I don't want to sleep! Don't make me!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I've plenty of fire in me! I don't need sleep!

string.value: I sleep whenever I want. It has nothing to do with you.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I also sleep during the daytime.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Can't you see that my eyes are still WIDE open?

string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.value: How dare you try to have words with me...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: You need to be quiet here!

string.value: Yip! Yip! I wanna be quiet right now. Yip yip yip yip yip!

string.value: *Whimper* It's so cloudy today. I wish the sun was out.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I got nothing special to say. Yip!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Admins never ask for your password! Yip! What's a password?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I could look at you all day. Yip yip!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Is there really a scary dragon living in Leafre? Yip!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Yip! What do you like most about me, master? Yip yip!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Yip! Woah, I'm so out of it right now.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I tried to look up my horoscope, but I can't read. Yip!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Yip! Yip yip! My back ITCHES!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! I can read your miiiind!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Thanks to all the treats, I got a tummy! Yip!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'm not scared of no monsters! Just gimme potions. Yip!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You look JUST like me, master. Yip!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tail's wagging! Look at it go!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Gimme a snack. Yip!

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Let's get on a boat! Yip!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Yip. What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Yip yip yip! Tell me a joke!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't I look cool? Yip! Yip!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I can do this all by myself! Yip!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! My tummy's on the ground.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Yip! Does this make my butt look big?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Gimme more time to practice. Yip! Yip!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Aren't I good? Gimme a treat! Yip!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Yip! I can do ANYTHING! Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Ugh, my stomach. It hurts to crawl. Yip yip!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm still working on it. Teach me to do it better! Yip.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: Yip? Yip? I'm a good Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: I'm a useful Husky, am I not?

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: I'd even get you the stars from the sky if you ask me, master. Yip!

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Sitting down is more comfy. Yip!

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: *Whimper*My back huuurts. Someone hit me yesterday!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: Yip! Yip! This is too hard.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Wow, I can do it too! Yip!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Yip! Yip! My back was sore, but now it feels better.

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: That was hard, but I did it! Yip yip!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: This makes my legs look even shorter! Yip!

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'm too out of shape... Yip! Yip!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Yip! Yip! Now I need to learn how to walk like this!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Yip yip yip! You're still taller than me.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I'm doing it! I'm doing it! I'm the best dog EVER!

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't wanna. Feed me first! Yip!

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: It's scary! I might fall! Yip!

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You're mean! I don't wanna! Yip!

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Yip yip yip! I'm so happy!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You're not talking to me, right? I am a dog. Yip!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I pooped in your slippers this morning. Yip!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You're the best master in the whole wide world!

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! Yip yip yip!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Yip? Of course you do! I'm adorable!

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: Don't you have someone better to say that to? Yip!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I love you SO much! Yip yip!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you! Yip!

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: Yip, yip! I must be the happiest Husky in the world~♡

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I don't think I know this one... Yip?

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Yip yip! Am I doing it right?

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: *Whimper* There's a thorn in my paw...

string.name: c31_f2
string.value: Yip yip! Huskies don't have hands to shake, silly.

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: There's nothing a Husky can't do! Yip yip!

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Yip yip! I'm tired of this. Just shake my tail or something.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: How did you know I'm hungry? Yip?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: This is so good! SO GOOD!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Master... You're fattening me up... Yip!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Yip yip! It's SO good. Gimme more!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I-I don't wanna turn into a pig. I'm a dog! Yip yip!

string.name: s3
string.value: Don't put icky words in my mouth!

string.name: s4
string.value: Yip! Yip! Bad word is bad!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired? Thank you!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You are being considerate of me master? Thank you!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: You go ahead and just stay put master.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together master?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: It has been a long time since I got some rest.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: My legs are comfortable when I sit.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: My legs are cramped up right now.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think there's dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: We can't play if we are sitting. Let's go play!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You think I able to do anything right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to all of the master's orders.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I am happy that you are happy, master!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say? I didn't hear.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, I feel more comfortable standing!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I will never do wrong again.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't get mad. I will do better.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why are you in such a bad mood?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: I am so nice... You've hurt me.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't get angry. I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: You are still the best in my books, master...

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I just did that to get your attention.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I am good and faithful. Why are you always on my back?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you stop being mad, I will give you 100 kisses!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master, I swear this will never happen again.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Please go easy on me this time.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I regret what I have done.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else, master!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How can you get mad at a nice pet like m?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You are the only one for me!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I like you very much also!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Your words are always so sweet.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart always goes out to you!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Master, you always get me so emotional.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Master, what about your significant other?

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I... Well, shucks, I love you, too.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Okay, let's give this thing a shot.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to call you master, but... Nah, forget it.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: You ever heard of common decency?!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you making me go when I don't need to?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: You're not even carrying a baggie!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I have no desire to go right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: This one looks just like me!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It feels so good to go.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Can you give me some cover? I need to go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Take a whiff! It doesn't even smell!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I just pooped. Did you forget?

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You can't just force me to go.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I want to go play at the neighbor's.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee?

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't fall asleep in this noisy place!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to dream about me...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: No. I'm going to play some more!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why do you always want to sleep, master?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: The grass fields of Henesys are nice.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You are so awesome today master! I think I am in love!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If you are tired, I will be there for you.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Do you fancy the way I talk? Why keep talking to me then?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I am in no mood to talk today.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't talk. That's how I am.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I have lost my appetite lately but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the Night Market is so creepy.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Manager Karl in Ludibrium is so kind.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I wonder if Pepes are related to Penguins.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Let's play a game... The game is to see who can be silent longer.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: What do I need to say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything master gives me is good!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think you are the strongest in the world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Hey master... Are you single? Want me to hook you up?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My wish is that you become happy.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you! I hear nothing!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Wow... This is my favorite food!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I hate eating until my belly hurts...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: I am about to faint, I ate too much.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Arg... I'm too full. It's impossible to eat anymore...

string.name: s3
string.value: I am a pet who don't say such things.

string.name: s4
string.value: What goes around, comes around you know?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Sitting makes me feel like a tree again.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I feel free again, thanks to you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I will bow before your power.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: How dare you speak to me that way?!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Why must I listen to you?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I will comply. You have proven yourself to me.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How is it? My attempt to be closer to you?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: I have no reason to put up with this!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Your face is scarier than mine...

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: Please do not get out the chisel.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Shall I return to Shadow Veil Forest?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Who are you to tell me what to do?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How many apology sculptures must I make?

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I cannot live if I do not have your favor.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: My ears are made of stone. I hear nothing.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I thought you were finished hitting me.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Is that what you think of me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Yes, it was all my fault.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Befriending humans can be difficult, please understand.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: But I thought it would please you...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: If you forgive me, I'll blow you 100 kisses! Mmhmm!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You purified my heart, please purify yours.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm just gonna head to bed.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Fine, I'll just smash you in your sleep...

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: My heart aches to hear you say that...

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Really? Is that how you feel?

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: I don't like what you're saying...

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: I have more wisdom than you in my knee pebbles.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'm so mad, I'm going to crumble.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Take those words back, or else...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I'm not in the mood for jokes!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I will grind you into rubble!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Your words are full of pain.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: What can I do to purify your heart?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: There is no reason to hate me.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I will be your friend, no matter what.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You are the one who is that word you said.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Clearly I'm smart! You are wrong.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I don't like your arrogant attitude.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I don't want to be friends with you anymore!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: It has been done, though a little privacy would be nice next time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Not now. It is all dust and chaff down there.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Where I come from, we are particular about where we go.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: The bowels of stone do not move so readily.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: An excellent suggestion. My cavern is full.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not understand your poop obsession.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You cannot force the mountain to move.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: You told me only to do that on your neighbor's yard.

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Please turn your head, and plug your nose.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: This may be my finest sculpture yet.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Let's go give this to the neighbor's puppy.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I must be fed to create waste.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do not project your own needs on me.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I am not sure why you believe I should do that.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Only if I can go on your head.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: You are quite the talker today.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: The world revolves, and I am part of the world.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I hear a scary dragon lives nearby... Shall I pay it a visit?

string.value: Why is the sky so blue? It makes me homesick.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: The falling leaves remind me how lonely I am.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I was not created to talk...

string.value: Baa, am I the best pet you ever had?

string.value: Yip! It doesn't smell bad, does it?

string.value: Pretty rams like me don't poop.

string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.value: Pretty rams like me don't sleep in a place like this.

string.value: My dream is to have cotton candy for my meals, EVERYDAY!

string.value: Baa, what do you want me to say?

string.value: I don't have anything to say, baa?

string.value: Have you have cotton candy? It's all sorts of awesome.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Sometimes I just wish I had longer legs...

string.value: I know I look fluffy like a cotton candy, but don't try to eat me!

string.value: My wish is to live with you forever and ever.

string.value: Look at my pink cheeks. Pretty, huh?

string.value: Shh, I actually like you the best! Baa!

string.value: (It appears to be thinking about something.)

string.value: Give me some alone time, baa...

string.value: Pew pew, that's the sound of my heart shooting out!

string.value: Am I cute, or am I cute? Baa!

string.value: Today is just not the day for it!

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm to hungry for that. Baa...

string.value: I know I'm smooth but I'm not so easy.

string.value: Stop, you'll make me bubble over.

string.value: It's so hard to go with your flow sometimes.

string.value: I appreciate everything you do, you know.

string.value: I guess you're charmed by my flavor too.

string.value: This is a very flavorful relationship.

string.value: A decent bathroom would be nice!

string.value: Today is not a good day for that.

string.value: I had a good one today.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Life can be so rich and savory.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Life is bitter. Bitter isn't always bad.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What? What do you want me to say?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Don't expect me to entertain you.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Let's just sit quietly and drink tea.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: The past is in the past.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Everyone needs refreshments now and then.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Young people these days have no patience!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Do you think I'm old-fashioned too?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: You're sweet, I'm bitter... We're perfect.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: How about reading a book instead?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm not the talkative kind of tea!

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I feel like I'm babysitting you.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If you're so bored, why don't YOU talk?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Tea must be dried properly to maintain the natural taste.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Every cup of tea must be poured from the heart.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Matcha is only one kind of green tea, you know.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Does your house have a nice garden?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You have nothing else to do?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I will decide if I sit or not.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Sure thing. My legs would hurt if I had any.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Resting is good for the soul.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Sometimes I just want to say no.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't like sitting in random spots, thanks.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: If I do, I'd rather sit in a nice garden.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: A cold, hard floor like this? Really?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Would you like a cup of tea while I'm at it?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Let me teach you the way of tea...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: It's not ideal, but I guess I can sit...

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I think there's been a misunderstanding.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I'll be more careful next time.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't get mad at the small stuff.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I won't do it if you don't want me to.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Thank you for pointing that out.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How about a cup of tea to calm you down?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You have such a terrible temper.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I have never seen a more mature matcha than me!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Okay. Admitting mistakes is part of being an adult.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'll be more careful next time.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I do not wish to eat.

string.name: s1
string.value: Drink this tea. It will help your breath.

string.name: s3
string.value: I am thoroughly disappointed in you.

string.name: s4
string.value: I cannot obey if you keep speaking like that.

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: I am sitting, as you see.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: What? I-I'm not ready for this...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I'm not sure that I like this.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Oh, this is so very lovely!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I l-l-love you too! Ahh, my tender heart!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you say that to all of your friends?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: You shouldn't say that so much.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Do not toy with a lady's emotions!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I hope we stay together forever.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: I'm chuffed with your kind voice.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Oh goodness, I'm getting all steamed!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Let's discuss this further over some nice, hot tea.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: This is a tea leaf, not poo.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I do not do such things.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You do not say that to a lady!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: What did you tell me just now?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: W-wait a minute, look that way.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It smells nice, I must say.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: A lady's poo is not for display.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I don't feel sleepy in the least.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: You should go to sleep first.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Yawn, oh excuse me, I'm just... Zzz.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! It's not all brewed yet.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I want to enjoy my tea time a little longer...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'll sleep if you get me some milk tea.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I won't sleep without a lullaby.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Are you plotting to put me back in the cupboard?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I cannot sleep without a nice tablecloth.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I can't sleep. Too much sugar, perhaps?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I was on a carriage in my dream...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't put me back in the cupboard while I sleep.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Afternoon is the best time of the day.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Be polite in your requests, please.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I feel like I'm on a picnic!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: What do you want me to say?!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I don't like being in the cupboard.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Sugar told me once that there are worlds without fairies!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't always talk so much, you know.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Sometimes it's better not to talk.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Do you need to hear my voice all the time?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Let us just... listen to the birds.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Every table needs some pretty flowers.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I dream of a tray FILLED with cakes!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: No scones? Bring on the cakes!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: A lady will hold a cup by its handle, not the cup itself.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Bring me a nice handkerchief to sit on.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Can we walk a little more first?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Excuse me, don't speak to a lady like that.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: You want me to sit... here? Really? Here?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Don't think i can be controlled so easily.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Oh, is it tea time already?

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I think you need some rest too.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How can you do this to me?

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I like you better when you're nice.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I didn't realize you wouldn't like that.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I was just trying to be nice...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Is this about that time I ate your strawberry?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I'm appalled you would get mad about that.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I've never had anyone get mad at me like that.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I won't do it if you say no.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'll give you some tea. Forgive me?

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I know, that wasn't very ladylike.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This isn't bad. Did your chef make it?

string.name: s1
string.value: I don't like it when you say such things.

string.name: s2
string.value: And you kiss your mother with that mouth?

string.name: s3
string.value: Do not drink tea with that filthy mouth!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Ha ha ha it is kidding right? Kick?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: What? Haha what are you saying? Poop here? Kick?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I didn't here what you said. Keick...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Please think again after looking around... Kick.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: It is little bit shameful..~ Keick?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I can't poop without eating!!? Keick?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Are you a mokey? How can human ask that?... Keick.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I didn't know that master was against common sense like this... Keick...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Keick? Keick? I heard something weird? Did I hear it wrong?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: It is shameful but...it is master's order...~ Keick~

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: It is also important to poop Kick!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Watch out for anyone coming~ Keick.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I became high enough level to not follow master's ordering. Keick.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Only a monkey would poop here. I am not a monkey.. Keick.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I try not to poop here, I have a reputation.... Kick.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I have not pooped outside during my 500 year long life. Keick.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Keick~ I was about to poop.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Close your eyes. Don't open them ever!! Ok? Keick?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: It's not shameful to poop...I will poop without any shame....no..it is kind of shameful.. Keick!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: It is not good manners to deny Master's ordering.... Kick?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ki? What did you say to me??

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Don't stare at me like that. Keick.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Are you sure? You have weird taste..Kick...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Huh... I don't care what human say to me... Keick.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I am not happy to hear that at all.~~ Keick~

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I know it is a lie...! Really!~ Kick kIck!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Keick~ I can't control my body~~

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Don't make weird jokes it is not funny. Keick.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: What do master expect from me?? Kick?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I thought I was tough... Kickick

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have been told that a lot...so I don't care.. Keick.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It is reasonable that I am lovely Keick~

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I am little bit glad.... ehehehe. Keick~

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Keieing~ ai....master....I get shy... when you say it like that~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Shaking my hips~ Keick~ Shaking tale~ Keick~~

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: What you said is a burden on me. Master. Keick.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Ok...master you are also pretty and cute....you wanted to hear that right?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Kiiie? Praise is nothing without feed...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Thanks for paying attention to me but it is a littile bit annoying....... Kieick\...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: Master. I am just moving.....really....just moving\~~

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Do you think so really? Really? uhihihi! Hmhm I have been told the same thing a lot Keick?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Keick? Really? I am not glad at all...my my tale is jut moving.....hmmm

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I don't know....! Keick! I don't know what you said really~

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Kick? What is that? Is it food?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Thanks but I cant believe that. Kick.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I think that you have something wrong... Keick.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: So what do you want now? Kick kick?

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: What? My heart is throbbing..... Keick.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: ......Hm hm Can I belive what you just said?

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Kieeeee... I seem to fall in love.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Keick? Aren't you tired of saying that?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I can't believe what you just said with that face....Master....

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Why don't you date a human...? You are always single........ Kick.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Kieee... I knew that....I am so happy to hear that from you....

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Keick... Master declared his/her love for me....I am kind of happy...or not.....

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My feelings to master are too big......Kick.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: It is not that hard........ Kick.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: Why don't you sit first....?... Kick?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: You sometimes give me good orders Kick kIck~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It is so nice to sit down.~ Kick~

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Keick~ Why don't you sit and rest~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: if you keep saying that too much, I won't trust it. Master...

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Go away if you keep saying weird things, Master. Kick.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Kick.. I know that you are lonely. But it is wrong to propose to a pet....

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ah...I have been told that a lot....I don't care usually...ah? Hear? This is an illusion! Kick~

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Master! Keep it down....other people can hear you..!! Keick~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I am shy....but I am glad you said that., Master. Keick.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I can't move. Maybe because I am so happy?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say to you.....hmmm I can't understand...... Kick.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Keick...? Talk to you about something? Hmm I can't talk to you.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I am not in the mood to talk to you... Keick...

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Kick... I will think about it after you feed me..

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Please Don't compare me to a Monkey. Keick.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Mu Lung is a good town. But it is not as good as where I came from. Keick.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Kieick~ I easily just defeated a yeti 500 years ago...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Kick? Don't ask me what the flavor of pet food is.....you will see if you try it.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: I can talk a little bit if master start talking first... Keick.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: Don't give me an unreasonable order like this.. Keick.

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: Did you say " Be quiet!" when I told you before? Keick?

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: You seem to be really bored right? Master? Do you want to chat with your pet? Keick?

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I really hate being a doll. Keick. I would rather go to prison than being a doll.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Kick kick? Don't move my tale? What are you talking about? I am not moving my tale.

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I hate being hungry. I hate being scolded. But the thing I hate the most is being lonely.. Keick.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Kieee. I am not able to communicate with other pets because of language barriers..

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: If Master were me, what would you say to me? Keick?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Lets be quiet in public ok? Master. Keick.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Tell!..So is it ok right? Master? Keick? So annoying.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't have anything to say to you...hmm and we are not that friendly....right? Master? Kick.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: Kick. How to spell transforming skill? Hm....I want to let you know.. But are you able to understand?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: How to ride a cloud? Not only monster do you ride on, but also clouds!~ Kick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Honestly other pets are not fashionable. . Keick. Isnt hand band basic??

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: I used to have friends....water ghost and a pig....hm what are their names?

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I cannot sleep before you feed me! Keick~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It is too early to sleep. Keick?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: Kick? How can you order me to sleep on the floor like this?

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: well cloud is a good place to sleep on hehehe...

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: Kick... Why don't you sleep? You look tired.

string.name: c25_f1
string.value: Master it is suspicious that you keep saying "sleep" even though I am not sleepy....I don't want to sleep because I can't trust you! Keick!

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: Kick! I have to save sleeping time to practice my transforming skill!

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: How can you order me to sleep without feeding me, too much...! Master! Kick!

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Wake me up in the morning! Master! keick...

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I am trying to test me how much I endure beyound sleeping! Keick!

string.name: c26_f2
string.value: You will leave me alone if I sleep. I never sleep! ! Keick!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: I am not sleepy....it is not dark circles from being sleepy...it is from hunger! Kick!

string.name: c26_s1
string.value: Kick... Master Good night. Sweet dreams!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: Kick... I am sick of sleeping now... Zzzz...

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Kick? Well I am sleeping because I haven't slept for a long time....

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: Why do you keep ordering me to transform...don't you know how difficult that is?...Keick...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't transform when I am hungry.! Keick!

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Look at me! Such a brilliant Transforming Skill! Keick!

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: Wheeick! How about this? Can you see theTransforming skill ? Keick?

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: Kick! Concentrate on !! don't miss my skills!!

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: Are you going to sell me as a pet that can do Transforming? Keick?

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: .. Why do you keep ordering me to transform. Even though you don't even look carefully? Kick!

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: Kieeeee... You make fun of how funny I am when I am transformed!

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: I can do it if master want! Wheeick~ Kick!

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: I practice my transforming skill for Master! Keick!

string.name: c28_s3
string.value: Kieeee I am confident on my transforming!! Ok now! Transforming!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You know I won't sit here. Master?? Keick?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Are you kidding me?. Kick kick.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How many days have I been in the outside world?? Keick?

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Honestly. Master's ordering is annoying to follow. Kieick~

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: For me it is a piece of cake.! Keick~

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Master sit so you can play with me?~ Keick?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: My level is high enough to not follow your orders right?.. Keick.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Honestly, Master also doesn't want to sit here... Right?? Keick?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I can't hear what you say...it is too noisy to listien to you~ Keick.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I don't want to sit....I want to eat first!!...is there anyone giving me Rupang's Banana?. Keick.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: With Master, Shaking tale...~ Kick? Master you don't have Tale?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can see the sky well!! It is a good place to sit...!! Keick~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I follow whatever Master orders me.~ Kieeeei~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I am full, weather is nice....Master is also nice!!~ KIKI~

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: How can human schold me!!.. Kieick!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I am upset!! Upset!! Upset!! Keick!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Why do you let off steam on me!!? Keick!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: How can you be upset with this......?... Keick!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Are you upset a lot? Keick?

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: I did it because I liked you...... Keick...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't like Master being upset.... Keick...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Why is Master is upset at me.....the one that need to be upset is me. Keick!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: You just curse me? Right? I heard it!!... Keick!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I am not hurt by you at all. Keick...

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I am not crying because of being scold by Master. I am not going to cry at all never !!... Keick!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I don't care even if master is upset!!(crying...)?. Kieick...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How could you scold me without feeding me..!! Keick!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I didn't do it!! Why don't you believe that I haven't!~ Keick~

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Who do you try to scold? Me? I am older than you Master...!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You just said I look like a monkey? Right? I am not a MONKEY!!! Kick!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I am not crying because of what you said to me....Hughugh...this is rain drops. Keick...

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: You are too much....how can you be upset like that? umahahangggg...

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Even though it was not a big deal, Master got way too upset.... Keick...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You said you liked me before.... Master were you lying?..Keick... ?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Kick~Food!~wow~It has been a long time since I ate!!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Kick... It is not delicious don't you have real delicious food? Master?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Keick! If I eat a lot, I can do taoist magic like I used to ?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: ...I don't like a Master that forces me to eat when I don't want to eat... Keick..

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Kick kIck~ Welcome whatever Master feeds me!

string.name: s2
string.value: Your mouth is dirty.. I won't say that.~ Keick!

string.name: s3
string.value: Why do you order me to say strange things. Master?? Keick?

string.name: s4
string.value: I don't want to say that. Let's only use good words! Keick~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: You want me to sit, KROWL? Like this? Easy... KROWL

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Like this, KROWL? Give me something harder, KROWL...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It's a piece of cake, KROWL.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I wanna do something else, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: It's too nasty for me to sit, KROWL~

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I can't sit here, because someone peed the ground, KROWL~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Master, instead of that...give me some food~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Master, let's do something else for fun~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't wanna sit right now~ KROWL~

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Master, you're talking funny, and I can't understand you~

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Master, whaddaya think? I'm good right?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Sitting's waaay too easy...let me do something else.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Ahh..I'm sleepy...what's up? What did you say? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Hehe...I was daydreaming, so I couldn't hear you...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: Please don't make a scary face like that...KROWL...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: What did I do wrong, KROWL?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You're just going off on me, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, KROWL...!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're just doing this because you're bored, KROWL...!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Master, are you really mad at me...? KROWL...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What did I do anyway~! KROWL!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Master that wasn't cool at all! KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Where else will you find an obedient pet like me? KROWL~!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Master! If you keep doing that, I may one day get out of here! KROWL!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Master...please give me that scary face...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: I didn't do anything wrong, though!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Man...going off on me again for no reason...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Master must be bored...so I'm treated like crap...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: It's not coming out well, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: It's not pooping time yet, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: How can I poop if I don't feel like it, KROWL...

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Pooping is only for bathroom, KROWL...

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Master, it hasn't been long since I last pooped...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: It's not time to poop yet, master...KROWL...

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Master...I don't feel like pooping yet...KROWL...

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Ahhh...that was good...but it's still embarassing...hehe

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Ahh...whoa, my breakfast just came out like that...hehe

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Phew~ Doesn't my poop look as adorable as me?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Phew~ Haven't taken a crap in 3 days and look at this!! Yowza!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: I haven't had anything to poop out in the first place...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Master...can I do it later in the dark? I don't wanna do it in public...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Master...how am I gonna crap on purpose??

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I like you very very much! KROWL!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Ah...I was thinking of something else...KROWL

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: You're the only one in my heart, master!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't be lying to me like that~!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: That sounds good! I felt like resting anyway~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Yawwwn ... I feel like going to bed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It'd be nice to take a nap under the sun.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Ahhh, I told you I'm bored!

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't like being bored. Let's do something!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: How about leveling up? Need my help?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Ooohhh... where's a nice comfy cushion when I need one?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Sounds like music to my ear. I needed some rest!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: No, play with me! Play with me!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Tell that to a lazy fat pig, not to a tiger like me!

string.name: c22_s3
string.value: I don't like hearing that, KROWL...

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: Take back what you just said, KROWL!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What? I can't believe you said that...KROWL!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Do you really mean that? KROWL?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Take back what you said! KROWL!!!!!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: I know you say this every now and then, but it still hurts...

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: You aren't gonna leave me out hanging like this, right?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: Do you really not like me??

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Wah? What? I can't hear you~

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: You didn't mean what you said, right?

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I'm sick of hearing that everyday...

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: The next time you say that, I may really flip out on you!

string.name: c25_s2
string.value: The harder you go hunting, the better the items you'll find, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s3
string.value: Isn't it nice out here today? We should go far and have fun wherever on a day like this, KROWL...

string.name: c25_s4
string.value: I need a nap right now... KROWL...

string.name: c25_f2
string.value: I'm too depressed to talk right now, KROWL~

string.name: c25_f3
string.value: I have nothing to say to you...KROWL...!

string.name: c25_f4
string.value: How am I supposed to talk? I'm a tiger, KROWL!

string.name: c26_s2
string.value: I have a feeling a nice item may come our way today! KROWL!

string.name: c26_s3
string.value: Master, you'll get me some goood food today, right? KROWL~

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: Let's go to the beach today! I wanna do something fun!!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: I don't have anything to say...KROWL...

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Master, are you dating someone? I'm not...

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: How's Ludibrium? I heard that place is nice...

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: I'm hungry, why doncha just feed me?

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: You must be really really really bored...

string.name: c27_f3
string.value: I can't hear you~ I can't hear you~

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I'm tired, and I don't feel like talking today.

string.name: c28_s1
string.value: My gosh, I feel ...really... sad right now.

string.name: c28_s2
string.value: Even I have to admit, THIS is a sad look...

string.name: c28_f1
string.value: No way! I don't feel like doing it right now!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: Why don't YOU do it, stupid!

string.name: c29_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c29_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c29_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c29_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c30_s1
string.value: Sniff ... I've never felt so sad in my life.

string.name: c30_s3
string.value: Alright, I'll show you my whole repretoir today!

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: I don't feel like acting right now...

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I know I'm good at making sad faces, but now's not the time.

string.name: c30_f3
string.value: I'm not in a good mood!

string.name: c31_s1
string.value: I'll just leave my paws out here and wait for ya~

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: How am I supposed to know how long I should wait here?

string.name: c32_s1
string.value: Okay~ I'll sit here and wait!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: I'll just sit here and wait til you come back, master~

string.name: c32_f2
string.value: Arrgh...I don't feel like doing this.

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: The great Gelimer does not sit!

string.name: c1_s2
string.value: I will sit if you insist!

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: I will take a look at the experiment data.

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Can you prove this to me mathematically?

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: My heart does not react to that...

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Where did my teddy bear go?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: I'm good at hearts. You will understand...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: This is not the first time I've heard that.
