string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I don't even know what you look like.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I don't trust something invisible. I am not that stupid.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Would you like to be a subject for my experiment?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: HAHA. I haven't heard that in a while.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: You fell for me for sure!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love is the easiest trick you can use to deceive another.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I am older than your grandpa.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Do you wanna grab a cup of tea sometime?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I am so skilled at flattering my boss.

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: My guts are not done digesting!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I am a very patient man.

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: This? It's my personal taste. Show some respect!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Excuse me. I am in a hurry.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I feel like someone is peeking.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: You will be the one cleaning up, right?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Was the potion that I took yesterday expired?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: This is so great, just like my intelligence!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Stop bothering me. I am concentrating!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I am very sophisticated, unlike you!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: How can you say that while eating?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: My brain burns all my calories.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I am such a healthy scientist!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Ahem! Did you just hear that?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I was fine when I was a youngster.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: 4 hours of sleep is enough for one day!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can sleep with only one eye closed.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Why don't YOU get some sleep?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Nothing is more important than a good night's sleep!

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: You should get some rest now. You have so much to study later.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I heard stupid humans are sleepyheads.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: We've got enough sleep. This is statistically proven.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: How dare you give me orders!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I shall see my teddy bear in my dreams tonight!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: It's little uncomfortable here... Ah well.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't touch anything while I'm asleep!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I have no time to rest!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I still need to conduct some experiments!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Even the genius needs some time off for his brain.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Don't pester me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: It's better to take some rest like this.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Not everyone can hear my voice.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Can you handle 10-hour lectures on Gelimer's Theory?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't really enjoy talking to humans.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I am Gelimer, the one who created Black Heaven! HAHA.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You must sacrifice little things in life to succeed.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I'm the one who came up with the Evolution System, too!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I am way stronger than I look.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I'm not planning to sit down at all!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Why must I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I am an old man you know...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: It feels nice to be outside of the lab sometimes.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Do you not have anyone else to talk to?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You are such a lonely subject. Should I make a human clone just for you?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Keep it down. I can't concentrate!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I am so close to perfecting my greatest creation!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Takes me 20 minutes each day to do my hair!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: You don't think I am competent as a commander? NONSENSE!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Everyone I met fell for me because of my beautiful eyes.

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I don't want to deal with you.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: Why not hunt when you are bored?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why don't you become friends with a doll if you are lonely?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: What would be the first thing you would do if the world ends now?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: You will be surprised when you learn the secret of my teddy bear.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I want to press all the red buttons in the world! Are you like that too?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Arkarium? I'm way smarter than that fool.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I am full of energy! What does it mean to be tired?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I will turn you into an Android if you don't stop giving me orders.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: How can you sit on the ground? Not classy!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: It was not easy... You should get some rest too!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Is it gonna rain? My joints are stiff and sore.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Can you hand me the cushion?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I am not the type to work under someone.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I will think about it if you give me some theoretical evidence.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Just keep hunting! I still need more data!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: It's been so long since the last time I got some fresh air!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Fresh wind is blowing through my hair. My thinning hair...

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: You are a very nice young man!

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: How dare you talk like that to elders!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: I want to be whiny sometimes HAHA.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Let me see... Something's wrong with you for sure.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I am the best scientist in Maple World!

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: This world is coming to an end.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: It's strange... It definitely worked before...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You haven't heard of the saying 'failure is the mother of success?'

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Do you wanna be my research subject?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I want to study what's inside of your head.

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: That's something I would say to my teddy bear.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Haven't heard that for a while.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Was that not enough of brainwashing?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You are not even worth studying.

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Are you sure you don't have a headache or something?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I will let this one go. You are lucky that I have a big heart.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Sorry. I was just so curious.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: It wasn't to make you happy!

string.name: f1_f
string.value: Is this the flavor of motor oil?

string.name: f1_s
string.value: This is the taste of proper molecule arrangement!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Cut it now! I'm not a glutton!

string.name: f3_s
string.value: i didn't know I could be this happy by just eating!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: I needed some sugar in my system!

string.name: s1
string.value: Where did I put my taser?

string.name: s2
string.value: I heard humans starts cussing when they have nothing else to say.

string.name: s3
string.value: You have not taken any speech classes, have you?

string.name: s4
string.value: STOP! Or else I will have you stuffed like a stuffed animal!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you like to see me suffer?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Play with fire, and you're gonna get burned.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love 'em and leave 'em, you know.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Now is not a good time.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: My pipes are too backed up, boss.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Hey, I'm not the one with bags under their eyes.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I can sleep when I'm dead.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nah. You sleep, I'm too buzzed.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I'll sleep when I'm good and ready.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You really think you can keep up?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: My secrets are too rad for you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I can't believe you're making me do this.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Shoo, or I'll bite your face!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or else.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I can't hear you! Speak LOUDER!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Hey boss, why don't you sit with me?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Take a break with me, boss.

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I said, don't order me around!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I can't believe I'm following YOU...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I said, mind your own business!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll pretend that didn't just happen.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Yeah! Show me your angry face!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Have I ever smacked you before?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mama with that mouth?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'd never say that. Not in a million years.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: You're making me feel all weird.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I'm going! To stay up! All! Nigh...Zzzz...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I want my alone time now.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I bet I could lift a ZILLION pounds!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: I wonder what Arby's up to...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: La la la... I don't hear you...

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I don't want to sit... I want to lay down.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm going to sit down. Do you mind?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Want to go fishing at Aqua Road?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You're gonna be my friend forever and ever, right?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm busy thinking. Ugh... It hurts...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: If it's food, it's good. Wait, that doesn't rhyme...

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You gotta feed me, you know. It's the law.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: My legs are so short, it's like I'm sitting already!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Okay. See? I'm a good kid!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: I don't think I'm a bad bear...

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're worse than the bad circus people!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: What is it? I feel lost... I'm scared...

string.name: f2_s
string.value: This looks yummy! Oh, but so does that!

string.name: s2
string.value: Oh, my poor little bear ears!

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: When I met you, it was love at first sight!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That's enough. Let's just drink some juice.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Wow... Are you falling in love with me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: You always get me so emotional.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I can't stop thinking about you!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I love you! I love you!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: How far do your exaggerations go?

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: If you tell that to another pet, I'll bite you!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Think things through before you tell me what to do!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: There is a time and place for everything!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: How many times a day do you want me to go?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I have no desire to go right now.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Poo poo... Let's sing about it!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I need to pee. Can I pee instead?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: How did you know I had to go?

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: You tell me to go... I will go...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: The sun's still high in the sky!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Good thinking! It's time for sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'll see you in my dreams.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I am going to get fat from sleeping all the time!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Why are you putting me to bed? It's too early!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I am in no mood to sleep!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why are you always telling me what to do?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I'm wide awake! Don't tell me to sleep!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I wanted to play some more, but okay.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: This was a such a long day!

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I have a lot on my mind lately...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I will not say anything more.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Nothing beats good food and a cuddle.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: What do you like about me the most? Tell me!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Sitting this much is bad for my hips!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: This is a marvelous place to sit!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Let's rest here for a while.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: If you feed me a lot, I'll love you even more.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: My throat hurts. Can I have a cup of tea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: With weather like this, I'm sure great items are bound to drop!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Are you bored? Let's go get a facial!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You look prettier with me at your side, don't you think so?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I am not talking to you because I like you.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm slumming it just being seen with you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am a little tired today. How about you?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I want to be alone once in a while.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I love spending time with you.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Do you know how to use scrolls?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I wanna travel the world with you!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You're the best in the world! Right?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Do I REALLY have to sit?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: We can't play if we're sitting. Let's go play!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Okay. Rock, paper, scissors. Loser sits.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Thanks, I was feeling rather tired...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: You need to learn how to enunciate.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I can't. Why? I don't know...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I will do whatever you ask me to do!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: What's a good position to sit and look cute in?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You should be setting an example for me.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Why would you punish someone as cute and little as me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: It's my first time to see you like this.

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I will never do wrong again.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Those words make me tear up...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You need to speak up. I don't understand you.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Please don't be mad. You're my only family.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I love you and I am sorry.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I just did that to get your attention.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always have such bad thoughts...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: How can you get mad at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Please forgive me. I'll listen from now on.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm gonna be so sad if you get angry like that.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You are not allowed to enter Star Planet.

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: I love you as much as I love Sierra!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I love you as much as I love Ryan D.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: My tummy is going to blow up!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Do you have a grudge against me?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Your meals are the best meals!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: This is the greatest flavor in the world!

string.name: s1
string.value: I am not going to listen to you.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Hand over wallet, Mr'kuma. You go crazy in your mind.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I come back when you not trying to eat me.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in demon culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find demon friends.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: You can go to sleep if you want. I promise not to chew on your nose.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could go for a little power nap on some hot coals.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't destroy any villages without me, okay, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of jealousy like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you felt jealousy of another, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid jealousy, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You will see the firey hand of jealousy!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can make me jealous, we can have a real relationship.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: f4_f
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we demons have some etiquette.

string.name: c1_f2
string.value: What do you want from me?

string.name: c1_f4
string.value: Sigh...I don't feel like sitting down.

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Roar!! That just made my day!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Only my master can say those things!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Did I do something wrong? What is it.

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I'm sorry, but you're not my master.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I have no idea what you're saying. What did you just say?

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Master...you just made me want to hurl.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Haha...exactly what makes you want to say that?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I knew I was born to be loved...hahaha!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: That just made me want to blush...haha

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Talk is cheap. Show me something that you really do love me.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love? What do you know about love?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't believe you. You keep making me do stupid things!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I saw you with another person. Don't lie to me.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Roar roar! I can feel your love towards me!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: I can't help it... I'm that irresistable!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: You don't even need to say it. I can see it in your eyes!

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: What do you want to hear from me?

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'd rather just hear you talk.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you have to tell me what I need to talk about?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Okay let me hear your side of the story.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: There are few things in life as annoying as talking.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'm tired. Let's rest for a second.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: One little two little three little Gorillas!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I better go workout after this!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Um...I don't think I was bought to talk!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Hey hey... let's just go in the dark alley and settle this.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Don't keep annoying me...or else I can just go back to the inventory.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Look at me. I have a hard time standing still. Leave me alone.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm hungry. I need some bananas with gasoline dippings.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: I heard main bosses carry expensive items. Is that true?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Don't keep hunting the same area over and over again.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I wonder if there's a bigger monkey than me out there...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm hungry. Let's eat something first.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I want to rest for a while. Go fight yourself.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Fire? Attack? I don't know that command.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Why don't you fight... I'm just a pet!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: What are you doing! Let's attack!

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm so tired. Let's just go to the sauna.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Why should I fight? I believe in peace.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: If you really want to fight, why don't you just go yourself?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I have to go now. I have a weekly meeting to attend.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: One! Two! One! Two! Ready to battle!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I'll teach you what a true combat is all about!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: If you're scared, just stand behind my back!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Once I batter my chest like this, the help will come!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Look at my eyes. Do I look tired?

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Do I have to sit when you tell me to sit?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I do like sitting down from time to time! Roar!!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Did you just tell a robot to sleep?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I slept too much in the afternoon, so I'm not tired.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Feed me first before making me sleep.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Go sleep first. I need to work out for a while.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: There's nothing better than sleeping after a full day!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Telling me to sleep is like telling me to die! What were you thinking?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I didn't do anything today. Why should I sleep?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I eat then sleep, I'm going to turn fat.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Ahhh... I'm full... I need some sleep.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: There's nothing like a good sleep right about now!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Hopefully I can see the lottery numbers tonight.

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: I don't want to do it.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: What transforming... you read too many cartoon books.

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Here's my real set of pythons.

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: I need 10 dozen bananas for this.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: What do you want me to do?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like changing. Let's just skip that.

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What do you want me to change into? Just tell me!

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Now hang on to my arms. These are the strongest pair of arms you'll ever see!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: Here's the power you've never thought possible.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: No one can stop me now.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: I'm just a pet, you know.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: Me? I don't know how to change.

string.name: c24_f4
string.value: You don't like how I look right now? That's cold!

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Here's my true power! Be amazed!

string.name: c24_s2
string.value: Don't be too surprised to see my clothes rip apart!

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: This is going to take a while. Just hold on a secod, okay?

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: I know changing right now might not be good...but if you say so...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Hey, you know I'm the rarest pet around...EVER. Don't disrespect me like that!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Haha... why don't you sit down first. You have no manners.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I don't have that command in my system.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sit? Well, if you bring something to sit on, then I'll think about it.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: I love how my master can't stand the pet being overworked. You're the best!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I was just getting really tired. Let's have a seat and share a glass of gasoline.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Ohhh! How did you know I love sitting down? That was awesome!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: A true pet knows how to sit properly. That's my forte, you know.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I'm sorry for being so dumb...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: If you hate me, why don't you just let me go? Roar!!

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: I knew you'd say that, so I removed that from my system. Muahaha!

string.name: c5_f3
string.value: Nah, I don't like you either.

string.name: c5_f4
string.value: Are you out of your mind? I am not the kind of a pet you'd want to mess with!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Why do you hate me, master?

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: That just breaks my metal heart...

string.name: c5_s3
string.value: Yes I am a fool...for your love.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you looking down on me for being a pet? Roar roar!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: System error! Please re-enter the command.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Who are you to tell me that I'm stupid? lol

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Did you forget the fact that I'm the rarest pet of all time? Sheesh...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: If the master tells me I'm stupid... then I'm stupid!

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I think the bolt number 7 on my head is loose. Can you tighten it a little?

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I was once a robot with a lot of promise... if only I was regularly checked up.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Despite all that, you're still all I've got!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: Hey you, do you think you are in position to scold me?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Roar! Roar! What are you saying?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Roar roar! Say it in plain English!!!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: What did I do wrong? Tell me!!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I want to be loved...sniff sniff...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry...I won't do that again!

string.name: c9_f1
string.value: What makes you think you can stand in my way?

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: Why are you saying this? You must be much worse than I thought.

string.name: c9_f3
string.value: I have no idea what I did wrong. Jeez.

string.name: c9_f4
string.value: Master, are you scolding me? Are you sure you can handle the aftermath?

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: It's all my fault, master! Please forgive me!

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: Let's just forget about it. I'll do better next time. Promise.

string.name: c9_s3
string.value: Man...I'm a rare, rare pet. How about some love?

string.name: c9_s4
string.value: Roar! Roar! Arrgh...!! Don't hate me!

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f3_f
string.value: This is an old battery! Are you trying to kill me?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: You were going to offer me THIS for all the work I did for you?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: There's nothing like being full after a good meal!

string.name: s4
string.value: If you say bad words, I am gonna ban you!

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: I may be quiet, but I haven't forgiven you.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I accept, but understand that I don't feel the same way.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I'm not going to throw that away.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Just who do you think you're bossing around?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I expect you to clean after me?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It's time to let it go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: It's much too early for that!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Don't ditch me while I'm sleeping.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I also sleep during the daytime.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Can't you just let me rest?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I said I don't want to talk!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Frankly, everything you want me to do is too much of a hassle.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: This is a piece of cake!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: You should sit and relax, too.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I am unaware of this concept.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: It's you who needs to be punished!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Don't blame me. It's your fault!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Would you please cut me some slack?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Stop it before I'll make you!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: I don't want to eat alone.

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s3
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Why do you make me suffer?

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Don't do this right before I eat!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Have you been eating strange mushrooms?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: If you really mean it, give me something to eat.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Yes, I'm one of a kind.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I'll get to work on making some.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Don't talk to me right now.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My digestive system is in full gear.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I'm not used to taking orders.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I won't wake up ever again.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Don't let anyone wake me up.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I can't hear what you're saying.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Now is not the time to sleep.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I won't wake up ever again.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I better get something out of this.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: You need to be quiet here!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Never mind... I will tell you tomorrow.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Who do you think you are, kid?

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Teach me how to sit first.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: If you want me to sit, then I guess I gotta.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm not sitting because I want to.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Why don't you just keep...doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Why are you always ordering me around?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I said I don't want to talk!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You'd better feed me on time. Or I'll run away!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I guess having a big head doesn't mean that person's smart...

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Can you defeat Zakum? I don't think you can...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Do you want to fight me?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I actually look better when I'm sitting.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Funny, I was just planning to sit anyway.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Why don't you come sit with me?

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: We might as well take a break now.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm going to sleep. Don't touch me.

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I will permit you to sit next to me.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: You're the one that should be punished!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't take your aggression out on me!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: How dare you get angry at me?! I will never forgive you for this!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Are you going to keep this up?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I didn't mean it. Cut me some slack.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Fine! Just don't expect an apology.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Is that the best you can do?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How dare you get angry at me?!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I might cry if you yell...

string.name: f2_f
string.value: Are you blind? Can't you see that I'm full?

string.name: f3_s
string.value: Well, well. Not bad at all.

string.name: s1
string.value: You kiss your mom with that mouth?

string.name: s4
string.value: I'd never say something like that.

string.name: c10_f1
string.value: Are you saying you love me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: That was a good one... ha ha...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I guess I love you, too?

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Well, um...I kinda I love you too!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I already know how you feel...

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I-I'm just a little bit shy...

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I feel like everyone is looking at me.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Doot de doo, I can't hear you...

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm sorry to interrupt you, but I can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I feel too shy to talk.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk about it.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I just don't want to do it anymore...

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: I'm fully aware that I have short legs...

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm going to bed. I'm full, I said...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: There's nothing for me to say... I don't want to talk.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'm jealous of Yeti and Pepe's relationship...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, you're going to make fun of me because I'm just as short standing as sitting!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I think I heard someone saying something...

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Sitting makes my buttocks get bigger.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Not really... I'm not doing this for you!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm never going to do it.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Ugh, my belly becomes really noticeable when I sit...

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Huh? What are you even saying?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I guess I should stay quiet.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: Don't take it out on me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'm going to crawl under a rock.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm going to find a new owner!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I'm full of tears! And they're coming out!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: s2
string.value: Even we Demons know not to cross the line.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Knock it off, I know you don't!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: You can't just SAY that, geez.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I'll pretend you didn't just say that.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Are you sure you got the right fox?

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Y-yeah, well... I-I don't not love you!

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Me? Blush? No, I'm just... cold!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Then... Stay right here with me.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Why don't you take care of it yourself?

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Geez, are all humans so rude?

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Foxes have more shame than that!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I had some raw liver, that's all.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: And will you clean up afterwards?

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Bring me a leaf at once!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: Foxes do not do such things!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Lemme have a bite of liver first.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I guess, if you're that desperate.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Y-you didn't see that, did ya?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Do I really need permission for that?

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: Why don't YOU go to bed? Jerk.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I'm just gonna close my eyes... Zzz

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Stop trying to force me to sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Don't you touch that liver while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: How come only I have to sleep?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm not sleeping here! It's cold!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Gonna have a nice little dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I want to sleep on a comfy bed.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Grandpa said to only sleep at home.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I curl my tail like this when I sleep.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I'll fall asleep faster if you hold my hand...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Are you telling ME to roar?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Fox god, fox god, my wish is...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: When I say HOO, you say RAY! HOO!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: You must wanna know a lot about me.

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Do I REALLY have to listen to you?

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I'll sit, but NOT because you told me to.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Hmph, my legs hurt, that's all.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't talk. I'm a fox.

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: ...I'm gonna eat you if you keep bothering me.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't tell me to talk, just text me.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: My favorite food? Raw liver, duh.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'm so proud of my fluffy fluffy tail!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: My grandpa is such a nag!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm an important person back home!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: Talk to your nanny if you want bedtime stories.

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You don't even listen to me anyway.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I'm not just gonna do whatever you tell me to.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Why don't you talk? To yourself!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Why does everyone ask what I say?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'll keep the humans safe! As long as they feed me.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I'm the fastest fox in town!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: No, I literally JUST brushed my tail fur.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: My legs are so sore from standing around.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm sitting because I want to.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Ugh, finally. I've wanted to sit for like the last 10 minutes.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Well I don't wanna sit by myself.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Don't you wanna sit with me?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You should have a seat here, too.

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Finally! My legs have been hurting!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Wanna try sitting on my tail? It's comfy!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Stop it or I'm gonna claw you!

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: You don't even know how to get your own food!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: That was a mistake, I swear!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: You... Why don't you believe me?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I'm so disappointed! How could you do that to me?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, it's all my fault...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: All you do is nag! I hate you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You hate me now, I knew it!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry, don't leave me here!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: If you keep getting so angry I'll...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I won't do it again, I promise!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Did you hunt this for me?

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Hmph. I'll take a bite, but only for you.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I'm full. You should have some.

string.name: s1
string.value: Why do humans say such bad things?

string.name: s2
string.value: I'll pretend I didn't hear that! But only once!

string.name: s3
string.value: You... Do I need to teach you a lesson?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Ah well... I don't know.. what to say

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Okay~ Okay~ I'll take your word for it~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: My heart will always be yours too~!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master... Please change your clothes and come back~ smells~

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Love is not a game. Get it together, Master!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I will also show how I feel~ Master~♡ Master♡ How about it? You like?

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: An adventurer must know the time and place!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: It's embarrassing, but if Master asks...!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to poop?!

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: There's no bag to pick up my poop~

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: For some reason, the poop seems to have a special energy.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I have to want it to go though... Can you do it by will, Master?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'm going next door to play~

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Hee hee~ Pooping makes me feel good~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: My poop even doesn't even smell~♡

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I can't sleep in such a loud place!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Master, do you think it's time for bed?

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I was tired. It's good that you asked me to go to sleep...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Are you going to bed already?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: You go to bed first Master~

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Sleeping all day will make you fat!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I want to see myself in my dreams..

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I've been waiting for this! Good night, Master ♡

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I'm not sleepy, I want to play♡

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Master, you must be a sleeepy head. You always ask me to sleep

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to rest sitting down!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: If you keep ordering me, I will get bad!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Master, your voice is like a lullaby...

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Next to you, I sleep better, Master...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: Is it fascinating for you to see me talk? Why do you keep talking to me?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: It's a secret that I can talk...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't feel like talking today...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Master, you look so great today~! I think I'm falling for you~!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Whenever you are down and tired~ Just call me~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Master, guard me if we see scary monsters during hunts!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, are you taking care of me?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Your beauty is so stunning I can't talk~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I've gotten picky lately~ but I like anything Master gives me♡

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Niki in the night market is so cheesy~

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: How does the penguin and Pepe know each other?

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I can't hear you~ can't hear you~~!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I don't know what to say~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I want to be left alone in my solitude...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Sometimes, fairies recommend those who did good deeds~

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Master, don't you have a lover? Do you want me to fix you up with someone?

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I will sit later~ Right now I got cramps in my legs~

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: If I sit, I won't be able to play~ Let's just go out to play~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Haven't taken a rest since forever~

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: But I want to run around more...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: What did you just say, Master? I didn't hear you~

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Right now, standing up feels more comfortable!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, you think I'm good at everything, right?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I listen to whatever you tell me to, Master~

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I'm happy to see you are pleased~

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't be mad~ I won't do it anymore~

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I'm so good and sincere~ Why are you getting mad all the time?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Don't be mad, Master. I'll never do it again

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: But you're still my favorite, Master...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: It's not fun. Let's play something else, Master~♡

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: How could you get angry at a nice pet like me?

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: Master, if you feel better again, I will kiss you 100 times~♡

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Master~ It will never happen again~

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Hm... I'm thinking about what I did wrong...

string.name: f1_f
string.value: ... I don't want a Master who tells me to eat until I feel bad...

string.name: f3_s
string.value: It's so good, I think I'm passing out~♡

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Uh... I'm so full. I can't eat anymore...

string.name: s1
string.value: You shouldn't say those bad things!

string.name: s4
string.value: You gotta talk nice to hear nice stuff!

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I'm not such an easy pet, you know

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: No thank you! I will just have a glass of juice~

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you have feelings for me?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: I have butterflies in my stomach. I don't know what to do~

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I can't get sick of listening to that~♡

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: No matter how many times I hear it, it feels so good~♡

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: Master, but you will get mad!

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: How far will Captain's lie will go?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Master, you've also fallen for me!

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I was going to say you, Master, but~ I won't~! Touchy!

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I will do anything for you, Master~♡

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: Master, you need to learn about public decency…

string.name: c13_f2
string.value: Ah! Master, please think before you order me!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: We have to uphold public ethics!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Why.. are you making me do this?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I don't want to poo poo!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: Can't be bothered. You do it for me Master?

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: How many times are you asking me to poop a day?

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: Poop~ Poop~ Do you know the pooping song?

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: You're too fond of poop you know that? You said poop just before~!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I want to pee... Can I pee?

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I can't poop when I haven't eaten anything!

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I don't know what poop is~

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Ah... Looking at my poop makes me feel as if there is another one of me...

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: How did you know I wanted to poop?

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Hee hee~ Now that I went, wipe me~

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: So much poop, thanks to your love, Master~♡

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: It feels too early for bed

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It doesn't look like it's time for bed already

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: If you won't go to sleep with me I'm not sleeping either~!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Master how could you ask me to go to sleep without a bed?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I hope you sleep tight too Master...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I want to see you in my dreams, Master~♡

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Doesn't it feel to early to go to bed?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't feel like going to bed!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I want to play with Master~ Wanna play~

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Captain, you're always giving me orders!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Going to bed with Master… Zzzzz…

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Sweet dreams to you too Master~

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: It was a tiring day Zzzz....

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I hope Master has a happy Maple trip, even when I'm asleep~

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want to chat, but... I was told I was too loud...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: The falling leaves are making me sad...

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm not saying a word from now on~

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: The world seems to be evolving around me~

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I like Henesys grass because it's so soft~

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: It wasn't easy learning the human language~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: I have to sit with you, Master~!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I don't know~ I don't know things like that~

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Do you want to sit together~?

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Master, you're so great for looking out for my legs~

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Is this how I'm supposed to sit?

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Factory owner Mr. Kaho in Ludibrium is so nice~

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Are you bored? Let's get a facial together~

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Right now, I'm enjoying the solitude

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I want to go on an exciting adventure with Master~♬

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I want to eat ice cream

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm a bit tired today. How about you, Master?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: They say you can make a wish on the moon, and it might come true~

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: I want to hear Master's story~

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I spent the whole night up talking to Husky… My throat hurts...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I think my Master is the strongest in the whole world!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: We spent such a long time together... Now shall I call you, Master?

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Talking to you makes me so happy

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: My dream is for you to be happy~

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I think I'll get dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Let's just do rock-paper-scissors and have the losing person sit~ Oh! I'm not a person~

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Sitting makes your body and mind relaxed.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Yes~ have a seat here, Master

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I wish we can do easy things everyday~

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Let's do some sports, and get up~

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I can do anything with you, Master!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Can't I sit like this everyday~?

string.name: c5_f2
string.value: Master, you have to take the lead~

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: But I'm trying to be good...

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: I will be good~ Just don't scold me~

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I will think about what I did, but don't starve me...

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I've never seen you like this before...

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I think I might hate you, Master…

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: You fool~! You're a fool, Master!

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I'll be careful from now on...

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Will you get mad when I'm so pretty~?

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Sure sure~ You're right~ Let's just say so~

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'm sorry! It will never happen again

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I want to be adored by Master, that's all~ Please understand~

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: It's so sad when Master talks like that...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me for just this once~

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to transform into a pig...

string.name: s1
string.value: Even if it's Master's orders, I won't do it!

string.name: s3
string.value: Pretty Master always say pretty things please!

string.name: s4
string.value: Don't make me say those things again and again~

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: You don't even know how to get better.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: How can a person as weak as you...

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: So many fans, so little time to crush all their hearts.

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Those words make me feel nervous and great at the same time!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I am already suffering... You don't have to make me suffer even more...

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I don't really understand what it means, but it sounds nice.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: You make my heart go pitter-patter.

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: I didn't know you liked me that much...

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Honestly, you are not my type.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Not bad, but not good either.

string.name: c13_f1
string.value: I don't know what that means.

string.name: c13_f4
string.value: I was taught to do that by myself.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: You can put this here like that, yeah?

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I feel like I just ate.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You are such a dirty toy.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: It will be easier to fly now that I feel lighter.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't know how to do that.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'm not really in the mood.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Is this what it feels like to let everything go?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I want to cover my eyes.

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: I feel like I'm gonna have a nightmare.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I can't believe you meddle in everything that I do.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: What are you gonna do while I'm sleeping?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: I don't know when my last break was.

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Why don't you take a break?

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I can't play any fun games when I'm sleeping.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I have no time for that.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Is it really okay if I'm the only one getting some sleep?

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Will I be able to see Orchid in my dreams?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm gonna sleep, not because you are making me, but because I want to.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Mhmm, why don't you get some sleep too?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I got enough sleep when I was in the laboratory.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Will I have sweet dreams tonight?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Humans need to take a break from time to time.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I will hang out with Orchid in my dreams!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I almost feel too lazy to sleep.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: You don't even know how to fly. How dare you!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I learned to talk a long time ago.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: This world is full of toys for me.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: You are such a lonely person...

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: How can you sit on the floor?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I will consider it if you get a cushion for me.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Are you acting like this because I look human now?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: Why don't you just keep... doing what you do?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: I'm not really in the mood to talk.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I kinda miss being a spirit.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Why do humans hate what I love?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: Why not hunt when you are bored?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: We are twins, but I was born first.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: My age? Hmm... not sure. I never actually kept track.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have nothing to fear as long as I am with Orchid.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't try to look down on me.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Good. I was getting tired of being in the air anyway.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I'm getting sleepy now that I'm lying down.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Pillows are such a brilliant invention.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Why don't you take a seat first?

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I can't believe a toy can talk!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Why don't you take a seat with me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Such a great weather to get some sleep.

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: Sorry, I'm still not used to this whole 'body' thing yet.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: You are making me really uncomfortable.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: I guess you don't mind dying, do you?

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Do you have any idea who you are dealing with?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me you are trying to scare me.

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: I'll apologize this time. THIS time.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: You are the first person to tell me that other than Orchid.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: How dare you get angry with me?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Admit that it was your fault.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay, stop it. I get it now!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I miss Orchid. She's so nice.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Can you feel the darkness behind me?

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: You are nothing but a lowly peon.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I am actually reflecting on myself for the first time ever.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Okay, fine. I won't do that anymore.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: So you also don't like me.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I wanted to be a good person.

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: You will have a crush soon.

string.name: c9_s2
string.value: I will accept it. Your heart, that is.

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I don't want to eat anymore.

string.name: f1_s
string.value: Eating is such a great pleasure.

string.name: s4
string.value: I don't want to hear it.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: But you hid the toilet paper!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Poop? Check! Now time to eat?

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I can't get comfy with such a big head.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I've been secretly sleeping this whole time!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Buy me a teddy pengy first.

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: It's not night yet. It's not!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll just close my eyes a moment.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: One ribbon pig... Two ribbon pigs...

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to ride a boat and sail the seas. Mommy pengy would be so proud!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I've heard that Crimson Balrog is really ugly, but I think that's a mean thing to say.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My nose is just to cute. Poke, poke!

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: My fur is soft and shiny and oh so nice!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: I look like a fish when I sit!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Next time pack a picnic, okay?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I'm your favorite pet in the entire world, right?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My biggest fear is that one day I'll wake up and have ears!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I think I'd look cute with a scarf, mittens, and earmuffs, right?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: If you turn me upside down, I can't get back up on my own. Hehe.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Is this some sort of trick?

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: My favorite shape? Hearts! My favorite food? Whatever's in your bags!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Sometimes I get really, really tired because my head is so big.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: You take such good care of me, I think I'm turning cuter every day.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I'm an expert swimmer. We should race some day!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'll do it if you feed me. I'm hungry.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I don't feel like it right now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Let's sit and recite pengy poetry!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I look adorable like this?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Will you sit at my side? Forever?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I'll be good, I pengy swear!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: It hurts my heart when you're so mean.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'm gonna call the pengy shelter to come save me!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Hehehe, you must really love me.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: This behind could use some rest.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: Do I look better sitting down?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: We could use some snacks, too.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: Let's go, I don't know, anywhere else.

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't want to sit. Sitting makes me look shorter.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: There's way too much to do to sit now!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: It's a good thing my butt is so fluffy!

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Let's watch some TV and eat some candy!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I really don't feel like getting up again...

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't want to sit unless it's on your lap...

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I don't like this place. It has nothing good to eat.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: I'd sit if this were a rose field.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I wouldn't want to wear myself out...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: The ground feels like it's going to give under my butt.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Huh? I'm too hungry to focus...

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I'm starving and you still want me to sit...

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to sit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Sit? What if something bites me?

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: Why am I being scolded this time?

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: You're not gonna hit me, are you?

string.name: c6_s2
string.value: They say being angry is bad for your health...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Don't be angry. It's pretty off-putting.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: You're scolding me for eating too much, aren't you?

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I don't even know what I did.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: I'm sorry... I won't do it again...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Yeah? I can be scarier than that!

string.name: c7_f3
string.value: I can't understand what you're saying!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You just keep punishing me! How about feeding me?

string.name: c10_s2
string.value: Hee hee... Yeah, I get that a lot.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Am I prettier than a rose?

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: Give me some time to think it over.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Can you see hearts in my eyes?

string.name: c13_s1
string.value: Got any paper? I'm all out.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c13_f3
string.value: I only do that for ME!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Look, let's get this over with.

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: Okay, so... I can't reach back to wipe...

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Ugh, you can't POSSIBLY be serious.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I... don't think I can do that.

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: That's embarrassing! I should poop in secret.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I'm sure I didn't just hear you right.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I need to eat something first!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: You go first. Then I'll think about it.

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Okay, maybe just a little... zzz...

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Nnnno, you've got a look I don't trust.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I only sleep on a full belly.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry to fall asleep...

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Yeah, I could use a rest.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If you're tired, it's okay to go to bed first!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleeping out in the open is romantic, but not now.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Wake me up if anything interesting happens.
