string.name: c17_s1
string.value: I'm sorry to interrupt you, but I can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I'm going to stay up all night... Zzz...

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: The ground is so cold and hard...

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I want octopus balls... And fried noodles...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I feel too shy to talk.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk about it.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: My brain is just so full of...stuff!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: I'm going to bed. I'm full, I said...

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: There's nothing for me to say... I don't want to talk.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I'm jealous of Yeti and Pepe's relationship...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Everything will be fine as long as you feed me well.

string.name: f2_s
string.value: It's so delicious that it brings me to tears...

string.name: s1
string.value: I'll remember this! You watch out!

string.name: s2
string.value: Even we Demons know not to cross the line.

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: You no want I steal gold? I steal good, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: Don't wanna! I wanna set your hair on fire!

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? Me not know word. Hehehe...

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay, human. You tell me when we are going to eat monsters again.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I will sit for you, Mr'kuma. You are scary and powerful!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I do as you say, for now...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Later, you sit and I get to burn houses down!

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: No way! I am not your kr'grana!

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: I don't wanna! I am mighty and full of fangs!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Rak! Why you always want to sit?!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: You take me to lake of fire first!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: My old boss was scary too. He eat my brother! So fun!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: You scare many monsters with your talk! Scare me a little too...

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: No talk to me like kr'gana. Me much strong!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Rak unar! I eat your wallet tonight!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I like it when you are angry, Mr'kuma. I will be angry too!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Yes! Let's find some little kids to yell at!

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Everytime you yell, I feel a little more at home...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Ha! More! Tell me how worthless I am!

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: You always say the same insults. Think up something new!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I know you can do better than that, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: I know you have more rage in you than that...

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I don't want to be flattered right now!

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c10_s4
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Grauk-mouthed unar! You think I simple?!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I no fall for trick. Old Mr'kuma trick me like this long ago.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: You are the cruelest of all masters...and I like it.

string.name: c12_s2
string.value: Are you mad at me because I tortured your goldfish? He was asking for it!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: That is the rudest thing you can say in devil culture!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Now I see you are just trying to be mean to me. Thank you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: There is no such thing as love.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: My heart is cold and black like a piece of coal!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm almost getting used to this constant abuse.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: You're just trying to make me get mad again.

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: Why say word "poop" all time, Mr'aku?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Master, you love pooping as much as I do!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I bet I can burn a hole in the ground with this one...

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: You no treasure drakla. It MY drakla!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: You like drakla so much? I give to you.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I love stinking up your fresh air, Mr'kuma.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Empty out everything, master. Even your soul!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I not eat enough monster today!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I'll let go of this poop when I darn well feel like it.

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: My bottom still hurts from the last one.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I have got to stop eating so many spicy monsters.

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: Good unar. We find many nightmare!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: No! You try take my eyeballs while I sleep!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: I no want to! I want eat shopkeeper toes!

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: Sleep yourself, Mr'putama. I go find devil friends.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I like sleep. Let me eat many monster heads when wake.

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: You sleep too, Mr'kuma. I steal many wallet for you later.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I'll wake up when home freezes over.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Pitchforks, fire, and screaming people. This is going to be a great dream.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: I don't need to rest! I'm an infernal machine!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: I ate an entire case of espresso beans while you weren't looking.

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I know better than to trust you.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You want me to talk? There, I talked.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I am Mr'kuma to ghost of fear like you are Mr'kuma to me.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Have you ever felt true fear, unar-master?

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I will let you avoid fear, if you prove that you are strong.

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I will show you the face of fear! Mwahaha!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: If you can scare me like my old boss, we can hang out.

string.name: c22_s1
string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.value: I sit on ground for now.

string.value: I make poona energy for you, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: See my power! We destroy much together!

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: My real form is scary, Mr'kuma!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: You do trick. I want laugh when you fall.

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I show you already! You have bad brain!

string.name: c23_s1
string.value: What if I did this at your next surprise party?

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: Let's go scare some little girls with this trick!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: With this power, I could conquer all of you puny humans.

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: Bask in awe, master! I am a being of pure terror!

string.name: c23_f1
string.value: How about I torch all your underwear instead?

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: Are you sure? You can never unsee it.

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Shouldn't we be undermining somebody's hope?

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I'll eat your eyebrows if you tell me that again!

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Why you talk like wimp, Mr'kuma?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: What are you trying to do to me?!

string.name: s3
string.value: Old boss call me that. He so cool.

string.name: s4
string.value: Hey! Even we devils have some etiquette.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: WEK~~ this is the way to do it, right?

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Sit? Okay! I stll feel great though ~~~ WEK~ WEK~

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: You show me how to do it first...WEK

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I never learned how to sit... weK!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Keep letting me do this ~~ WEK~

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: Do I sit like this? WEK!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: You must be kidding me... WEK

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Don't let me do stupid things like this... WEK..

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: It's not like I'll be getting a prize for doing this... WEK

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I mastered the art of sitting.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I can sit! I really can sit!!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: Give me something harder to do.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Wait til I turn back into a doll... then I'll sit.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Look, I'm fat, and it's hard for me to sit.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: And what are you trying to say? WEK!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Umm... you're no different than me. WEK!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do! WEK!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: I won't do that again... WEK... WEK....

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Okay now ... calm down ... WEK WEK..

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I get it. I'll be a good penguin now.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: What do you want me to do? WEK!

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: Did I do anything wrong? WEK?

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: My heart's been torn to pieces... sigh...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: What can I do to make you feel better?

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: Hey, you're the one that started!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: Seriously, I didn't do anything wrong.

string.name: c10_s3
string.value: Don't look! This is embarassing. WEK

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Long way to go before I poop. WEK

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: I don't feel like pooping. WEK.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Hah, I ate a lil too much last night. WEK

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Sorry. It's going to reak here. WEK.

string.name: c11_f1
string.value: I don't want anyone seeing this. WEK

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: I haven't felt it, yet. WEK.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Hey, don't look. It's not a pretty sight.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Ahhh, this is quite a relief.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: You must really like the smell of poop.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I can't poop now. I held on to it for too long.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I can't poop what I never ate.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: Can you force yourself to poop?

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: Of course, the penguins must stand tall... WEK.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So I stand and sit, then stant and sit. WEK!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I don't want to do it, WEK!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: This is a piece of cake, WEK.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I'm good, right? Give me something harder to do, WEK.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Can I do something else? I'm tired, WEK.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do, okay? WEK!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I can do it. I'm the bomb, right?

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: What other penguin can stand so beautifully like this?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: If I keep practicing, I may be able to run one of these days.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: Don't repeat the same thing over and over again.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: The weather's beautiful today, perfect for a chit chat, WEK.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: If you find somethng delicious, give me some, WEK.

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Do you want to kiss me on the cheek? WEK!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I can help you out, WEK!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: What? Who said I was fat? WEK!!

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Have you ever seen a talking penguin? WEK.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Any good movie to watch, WEK?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Tell me you love me the most, WEK.

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Treat others just the way you want to be treated, WEK.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: Take me to a seafood store, WEK.

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Don't feel like talking right now, WEK.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: If I ever turn back into a doll, please get me a water of life so I can keep hanging out with you.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I'll help you gather up some items on the ground.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I see a lot of elves these days. I heard they were very hard-working.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't tell others your ID and password.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: And what exactly do you want from me?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: Don't bother me. I'm just chillin here.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Now you gotta kiss me! WEK

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Hehe, give me a warm hug. WEK

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: I'm too heavy for you to hug, WEK.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I've been in need of some love these days... WEK.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You can hug me as long as you want, WEK!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: NO! You haven't showered in days! WEK!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: I got no time for you, WEK!

string.name: c22_s2
string.value: Don't hug me too hard. I can't breathe.

string.name: c22_s4
string.value: Awwww, it's embarassing though. Hug me when no one's looking.

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: No, I wanna do something fun! WEK!

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Look, it's well into the morning right now, WEK.

string.name: c23_f4
string.value: I don't feel like sleeping here, WEK.

string.name: c24_s1
string.value: Master, you sleep here with me. WEK.

string.name: c24_s3
string.value: I was about to sleep anyway.

string.name: c24_s4
string.value: You need to wake me up later.

string.name: c24_f1
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c24_f2
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet.

string.name: c24_f3
string.value: I feel fine, I don't feel like sleeping.

string.name: c26_s4
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f1
string.value: This makes me feel good, WEK!

string.name: c26_f3
string.value: Liar. I don't like you, WEK.

string.name: c26_f4
string.value: Really? I don't think you do, though. WEK.

string.name: c27_s1
string.value: Do you really mean that, WEK?

string.name: c27_s2
string.value: You know how I feel about this, right? WEK~

string.name: c27_s3
string.value: I love you too, master! WEK!

string.name: c27_s4
string.value: Yay, I'm being loved by my master~ WEK!

string.name: c27_f1
string.value: And what do you want from me? WEK.

string.name: c27_f2
string.value: What? I didn't hear you. WEK.

string.name: c27_f4
string.value: I know you say that to others, too. WEK.

string.name: c28_s4
string.value: I love you too, master! Yay!!

string.name: c28_f2
string.value: We penguins don't take that phrase "I love you" lightly.

string.name: c28_f3
string.value: If you don't mean that, that I don't think you should say it.

string.name: c29_s3
string.value: So I should just stick it out like this? WEK..

string.name: c30_s2
string.value: You know I'm the bomb, WEK.

string.name: c30_f1
string.value: No way, I'm too tired. WEK.

string.name: c30_f2
string.value: I'm too lazy to do this. WEK.

string.name: c31_s2
string.value: Heavy, isn't it? I can't fly with these, though.

string.name: c31_s3
string.value: Is it fluffy? It feels good, right? This is fuuuun!

string.name: c31_f1
string.value: Ugh, this is quite a chore.

string.name: c31_f3
string.value: What am I, a dog? I'm a penguin, you know!

string.name: c32_s3
string.value: Make sure not to leave a hole on my cheek!

string.name: c32_f1
string.value: Um... do you know exactly where we are right now?

string.name: c32_f3
string.value: No way, I don't wanna do it.

string.name: c33_s3
string.value: Don't do it for too long, though. Yay!

string.name: c33_f1
string.value: Who in the right mind would wanna kiss you?

string.name: c33_f3
string.value: You ain't doing this for free.

string.name: c33_f4
string.value: Tell me that was a joke.

string.name: c34_s3
string.value: I deserve a trophy for this performance!

string.name: c34_s4
string.value: I believe I can fly!!! WEK WEK!

string.name: c34_f1
string.value: Um...don't I look a litttttle hefty for that?

string.name: c34_f2
string.value: Hey, have you ever seen a flying penguin?

string.name: c34_f3
string.value: You must have lost your mind.

string.name: c35_s2
string.value: Show me another penguin that can fly like me.

string.name: c35_s4
string.value: No need to waste time. Here we go!

string.name: c35_f3
string.value: I suggest you study a little on penguin's anatomy.

string.name: c35_f4
string.value: Um, have you heard of Law of Gravity? Hello!!

string.name: c36_s1
string.value: I'm at a loss for words...WEK!

string.name: c36_s2
string.value: It's hard to find a penguin as cute-looking as me! WEK!

string.name: c36_s3
string.value: Hey, I've been cute for quite some time, you know! WEK!

string.name: c36_s4
string.value: Really? You're not kidding, right? WEK!

string.name: c36_f2
string.value: I'm not CUTE. I'm DASHING. WEK!!!

string.name: c36_f3
string.value: I NEED SOME TRUTH AROUND HERE! WEK!

string.name: c36_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say in return, WEK?

string.name: c37_s2
string.value: You won't find a penguin quite like me. Enjoy it!

string.name: c37_s3
string.value: I can never get enough of your compliments!

string.name: c37_s4
string.value: Thanks for your kind words! I really appreciate that!

string.name: c37_f1
string.value: Since when did we compliment each other anyway...

string.name: c37_f4
string.value: Feed me instead of waxing stupid poetics like that.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I can't eat no more. WEK.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Ugh, I feel like throwing up. WEK.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I need to be on a diet.

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I'm sitting because you said so.

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't know how, hee hee.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Sometimes, I don't like to sit because I feel like I'm seeing a fish in the sky!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Let's watch some TV and eat some candy!

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I feel like I'm on a picnic!

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I'll do it if you feed me. I'm hungry.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Master, you're trying to get a better look at me?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Let me lie down. It's more comfortable as I get older.

string.name: c4_f2
string.value: Master, I didn't hear you because I was thinking about you feeding me.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: I'm in no mood to sit.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Huh? I can't focus because I'm starving...

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: No! I'll be good! I promise!

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: Are you really going to keep doing this?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: You're so mean all the time!

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: It hurts my feelings when you're being mean.

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Did you just raise your hand?

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I never thought you'd think so little of me!

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: If you keep getting mad at me, I'll tell my mom!

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: I'll stop pooping on your socks...

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm not crying! It's just raining on my face.

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: I'm going to tell on you!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: If you give me a piece of cake, I won't eat you up!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: I'll call the cops if you keep bothering me!

string.name: c9_f2
string.value: I'm s-sorry... I have to reject you.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Are we going to stay together? Forever?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I've been waiting so long for you to say that!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I could do this all day!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I don't want to... I'm not going to...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I want to dance! I don't like pooping!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: It's embarrassing! I should poop in secret.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I will poop only in a bathroom!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I should poop quickly and then go eat!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It's really hard to poop, but it feels refreshing!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I hate poop. I'll poop tomorrow.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I can't poop because I'm so hungry...

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I'll only poop at home! Never outside!

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: I only sleep on a full belly.

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Nothing beats sleeping on a soft pillow.

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I'm not tired yet. Why are you forcing me to sleep?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: I do this all the time.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you! Zzz...

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: So you can doodle on me? No thanks!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: If you're tired, it's okay to go to bed first!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: I could sleep for three days straight.

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: One snail... two snails... three... zzz...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: Bring me a blanket and pillow or no deal!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Sleep? That's what you do at night!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: You make me do all sorts of things.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I've always wanted to ride a bota.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I've heard that Crimson Balrogs found on boats are ugly. Is is true?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My nose is my best part.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I'm sleepy... I'll go to sleep...

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I hate being alone more than anything.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I think Pepe in El Nath may be cold!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I can do anything super duper well!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Niki at the Night Market and I look alike, don't we?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Let's just go to bed... Zzzz.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: Yeti and Pepe are BFFs. I want a BFF>

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Riding on clouds is easy if you know how!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: The other day I looked into the mirror, and I was stunned by my beauty!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Sometimes I want to fly. I mean, rarely.

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I should just pretend like I can't hear. This is fun!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: If I speak, you'll say I'm too noisy, won't you?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I was going to go on a diet.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: You can't feed a pretty pets like me such cheap food.

string.name: f4_f
string.value: Blech, how could you give me such an awful thing like this?

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: I hope no one notices I'm here... Eep!

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Ahh, nice. Maybe it's time for a nap.

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: I want to sit... But I need exercise!

string.name: c2_f2
string.value: I don't think I heard you...

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: This place is filthy... I can't be here...

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: With legs as short as mine, it doesn't matter!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Do you know what it's like to sit on a cloud?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I'm... already sitting. Can't you tell?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Whew. I guess I am a little tired.

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Ugh, you can see my belly when I sit...

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We don't have time for this!

string.name: c5_s1
string.value: I don't want to be punished.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Well, um... I kinda love you too!

string.name: c11_s4
string.value: Hee hee... You're making me blush!

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Do you mean it? Are you sure?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Do you treat all your pets like this?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Don't you think you're going too far?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I can't, okay? I just can't! Leave me alone!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: I miss the thrill of battle...

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! I want to play more!

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: No! I have lots of energy!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: I just love to play the harp!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: I want to journey with you!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: My brain is just so full of... stuff!

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: If you could sing me to sleep...

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I've got a good feeling about today!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm just happy to be with you.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Did you do your good deed for the day?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Are there more angels like me?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I was tired from all that walking.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do.

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: I was going to take a break anyway.

string.name: c5_s2
string.value: Who do you think you are?

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: But look at how cute I am!

string.name: c7_f1
string.value: Take a look in the mirror, buddy.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: What are you blaming ME for?

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: How could you not? I'm adorable!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: That could go in a museum!

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I kind of want to touch it.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: You sleep. I'm gonna keep working hard.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Okay, but only because I want to.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: I was just about to, until you said that.

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I'm going to tape my eyes open.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Some days, I just look at the world and smile.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: My weakness is my ears, but don't tell!

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: What do you want me to say?

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: One day, I'm gonna beat Zakum in a boxing match!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Feed me lots of protein so I can beef up!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Takes me 20 minutes each day to do my hair!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Don't tell me what to do!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: You think you can take me? Let's try!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Let's just have a moment of silence, okay?

string.name: s2
string.value: This is abuse! I'll have you locked up!

string.name: s4
string.value: You kiss your mama with that mouth?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Why don't we sit together, master?

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I'm so nice, obeying your every whim.

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't just sit on the street.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: What's that? Is that something I can eat?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: How does Ducky look right now?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Hey, don't you order me around.

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: Uh, where's my cushion? I won't sit without it!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: Ducky don't want to do it right now.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Ducky is very scared of you now.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Is Ducky being yelled at right now?

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: Ducky don't understand why you're mad.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: Ducky's scared when you get mad.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: It hurt Ducky's feelings when you're being mean.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Ducky won't do that EVER again.

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Ducky won't do it again. Give me a chance.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: Can't you see my tears? Please, have a heart...

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: If you keep punishing Ducky, Ducky will turn BAD!

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: You're strange. You keep punishing Ducky without feeding Ducky!

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Ducky will call the police if you keep harassing Ducky! QUACK!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You do that one more time, you'll never see me again.

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: I'm so happy. Say it again, please?

string.name: c10_f2
string.value: Quack... Put more emotion into it next time.

string.name: c10_f3
string.value: Sorry but I'm taken. Find another duck.

string.name: c10_f4
string.value: Master, I'm serious. Snap out of it.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: Love... Is this feeling love? I think I'm falling for you, master.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: This little duck loves you too!

string.name: c11_f2
string.value: Quack!! Your words are not very convincing.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: I'm so happy you're my master, quack!

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Tell me that ten times every day!

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I hope you never, ever change!

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: It's not you, it's me... I'm a duck, quack. Give up.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Do you even know what love means?

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Meh... I'm not feeling it... Quack...

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I love you like family, too!

string.name: c14_s2
string.value: I think I'm going to have a wonderful dream tonight, quack!

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: You can sleep right next to me, quack!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: How did you know ducky was sleepy?

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: It's much too early for that! Quack!

string.name: c14_f3
string.value: You want me to sleep all day long? Quack!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: I'm already falling into sleep. Quack...

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I'm going to take a short nap.

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: You are telling me to sleep at a place like this. Master, you are mean!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: Are you planning a party for after I fall asleep?

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: It's no time for sleeping, you must level up!

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: My snuggly pillow is making me... fall.. asleep...

string.name: c16_s2
string.value: Stand by me while I sleep, please?

string.name: c16_s3
string.value: Lately, the more I sleep, the sleepier I get...

string.name: c16_s4
string.value: I just wanna sleep all day long!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: Why are you forcing me to sleep? It's creepy...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you plotting to abandon me when I fall asleep?! I won't fall for that!

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I will sleep when I sleep. Bug off!

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: No, no... I won't let you get something yummy while I fall asleep! Never!

string.name: c17_s2
string.value: I am talented at talking, I know.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: Nice weather out. How about taking me for a stroll along the Strolling Path?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: Have you not seen a talking duck before?

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't want to talk right now.

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: What do you think about this red muffler? I'm a fashionista!

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: I just wanna talk with you all day long!

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Anything you wanna hear from me?

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Don't wanna talk. Why don't you talk?

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: You don't have any friends, do you?

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: I am enjoying my solitude right now.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Scuba Pepe and I are nothing. It's not what you think. Quack!

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: This is a secret, but I can transform...

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: I love spending time with you, master.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Once upon a time there was a duck named Ducky...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: I talked too much today. Let's talk again tomorrow.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Are ya bored, master? Go hunt more!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: This is the dance that'll make you move!

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Everybody! Dance, with, me. Oh yeah.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Shake it, shake, shake it. Boom boom boom.

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: Dance? I need some music, please!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Why don't you give it a try first? Quack!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I dance til the end of night! Quack, quack, quack!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Compliment me, and I shall dance more!

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Look at these crazy moves I'm doing!

string.name: c21_f1
string.value: My dancing is so good you might fall in love with me!

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: You're gonna make fun of me, aren't you?!

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Dancing is not my thing. Nope. Nada.

string.name: c22_f1
string.value: That doesn't just happen out of nowhere!

string.name: c22_f2
string.value: What are you going to do for me?

string.name: c22_f3
string.value: I can only do it when no one's around...

string.name: c22_f4
string.value: I'm too sleepy to do that... Quack.

string.name: c23_s2
string.value: This is a once in a lifetime event!

string.name: c23_s3
string.value: I practiced every day for this moment!

string.name: c23_s4
string.value: You might just fall in love with my transformed self!

string.name: c23_f2
string.value: I don't feel like it. Quack...

string.name: c23_f3
string.value: Quack, quack. You're not even looking at me. I'm pooped...

string.name: f4_s
string.value: You give the best food, master! Quack!

string.name: s2
string.value: Quack! How could you say that?

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: The witch didn't make me talk to her.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Either I can talk, or you're hearing voices!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Nice voice! Ever thought of doing commercials?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Life is more fun than when I'm with my friends!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm going to tell the witch if you keep doing that.

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: The witch didn't make me talk to her.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Either I can talk, or you're hearing voices!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Nice voice! Ever thought of doing commercials?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Life is more fun than when I'm with my friends!

string.name: s3
string.value: I'm going to tell the witch if you keep doing that.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Either I can talk, or you're hearing voices!

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I don't talk to just anyone!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: You should be honored I'm talking to you!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: It's always fun being with you.

string.name: f3_f
string.value: Does it have a bow on it? I only eat fancy food!

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Where did you get such delicious food?

string.name: s1
string.value: Where did you learn to say that?

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: I love when it rains! You too?

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Have you ever been to Arboren?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: I'm... daydreaming. Talk to me later.

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Where do you get this delicious food?

string.name: f4_f
string.value: I don't feel like eating right now.

string.name: s4
string.value: What's wrong? You have a problem?

string.name: f4_s
string.value: Master... thank... you... for... the... good... food...

string.name: s4
string.value: I... hate... master... who... uses... bad words!

string.name: c2_s1
string.value: Let's rest here for a while.

string.name: c2_s2
string.value: Am I good? Gimme a treat!

string.name: c2_s3
string.value: This is a marvelous place to sit!

string.name: c2_s4
string.value: Are you worried that my feet are tired?

string.name: c2_f3
string.value: I don't think you're taking this seriously!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: You sit down, too! You look tired!

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I like to take things nice and easy.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: I love sitting on soft ground.

string.name: c3_f2
string.value: I think there's dirt on me!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: I'm so cold. Gimme a blanket!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Okay! With you at my side, I can do anything!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I like your big, cushiony leg for that.

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: C'mon! Let's go see something cool!

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: If you want a seat, just take one yourself.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: This is boring. Let's try something challenging!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Please don't be mad. You're my only family.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: You're doing this for my own good, aren't you?

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: Hearing that makes me so sad.

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: I'm sorry for hurting your feelings...

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: It was just a tiny mistake.

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: I can't stop thinking about you!

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You can say that a hundred times and I won't get tired of it.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: Nah, let's just have some juice or something.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: I'm happy that you're my buddy.

string.name: c12_f1
string.value: That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: I don't have the energy to reply.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: Money over love, pal. Pay me!

string.name: c13_s3
string.value: I'll really pour myself into this one!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I clean up after myself. I'm so squeaky clean!

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: So many eyes here, I can't poop...

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: It feels soooooo good to go.

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: Will you play with me when I'm done?

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: So much poo... Like my love for you!

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: I don't know what poop is.

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Are you sleepy? I'm not sleepy.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: It's not time for bed yet.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: It's not time to sleep yet!

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: We even sleep the same now!

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I wanna sleep next to you!

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: You don't sleep, I don't sleep.

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: I'll see you in my dreams!

string.name: c18_s1
string.value: Good, I've been awake for too long...

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Come lay down next to me.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Stop telling me what to do!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: No, I want to talk and play!

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: If we run into something scary, you have to protect me.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: What I'm going to tell you is totally secret...

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Me no speak your language. Argh!

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: You look prettier with me at your side, don't you think so?

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: I'll eat whatever you feed me... because it's from you!

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: I'm slumming it just being seen with you.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I just wanna talk with you all day long!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: With weather like this, I'm sure great items are bound to drop!

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I don't have a big appetite, but anything you give me is good!

string.name: c20_f3
string.value: What do I need to say?

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Give me all your potions and you can hunt more easily!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: I really like beards. They're so soft and comfy.

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I love the snow! Can we play in the snow?

string.name: c21_f3
string.value: I can't hear you! I hear nothing!

string.name: f1_s
string.value: This is the greatest flavor in the world!

string.name: f2_s
string.value: Everything you give me is good!

string.name: s2
string.value: What goes around, comes around, you know?

string.name: c2_f1
string.value: Sitting this much is bad for my hips!

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Show me how to do it!

string.name: c3_s1
string.value: Let's sit together! Is it hard because your head's so big?

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: Okay! Want to sit with me?

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: This is perfect! Want me to massage you?

string.name: c3_f1
string.value: I want to be alone. Everyone, please log out.

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Sit? I haven't sat since I was three.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: La ti... ugh! It's a caterpillar!

string.name: c4_s1
string.value: Hey, I look pretty cute like this!

string.name: c4_s2
string.value: Does sitting down give me a gut?

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: Do the worms talk to YOU, too?

string.name: c4_f3
string.value: We can't rest like this every day!

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: I don't like sitting. I'm already short enough.

string.name: c5_f1
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_s1
string.value: Hehehe, you're cute when you're mad!

string.name: c6_s3
string.value: I am truly sorry, but I cannot return the sentiment.

string.name: c6_f1
string.value: La la la. I can't hear you.

string.name: c6_f2
string.value: I'm too charming to be bad!

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Stop it... or I'll get mad!

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: There's something in my eye, is all.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: If only I had someone to take care of me.

string.name: c8_s3
string.value: I get sad when you're mad!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: You must not love me anymore.

string.name: c8_f3
string.value: Maybe getting a smack on the head will make you come around!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: You've never seen me TRULY mad!

string.name: c9_s1
string.value: You... You really feel that way about me?

string.name: c10_s1
string.value: You... You really feel that way about me?

string.name: c11_s1
string.value: Wait... I can't be falling for you!

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: I guess... I guess that's okay.

string.name: c11_f3
string.value: I can't criticize your taste, but...

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: All right. I've got your back.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I could use a little space.

string.name: c13_s4
string.value: I thought I was constipated, but... nope!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: I can't. My tummy's stuffed up.

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Hehehe, I have a different use for newspapers!

string.name: c15_s3
string.value: I know I'm cute, but no looking!

string.name: c15_f3
string.value: I've been having problems with that lately...

string.name: c16_s1
string.value: I should've drank more coffee. Zzzz...

string.name: c16_f2
string.value: Still a long way to go!

string.name: c17_s1
string.value: Why should I listen to you?

string.name: c17_s3
string.value: Don't bother me while I sleep.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Why don't you prepare a nice bed for me first?

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: How am I supposed to help you if I'm sleeping?

string.name: c18_s2
string.value: Will I still be cute if I'm so lazy?

string.name: c18_s3
string.value: Sleeping at your side is the best!

string.name: c18_s4
string.value: I need a lot of sleep to keep my skin so smooth.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Why do you want me to sleep? What don't you want me to see?

string.name: c18_f3
string.value: Why don't you sleep first? I've got things to do!

string.name: c18_f4
string.value: Should we be sleeping when your level is so low? Go hunt!

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: Nice weather out. How about taking me for a stroll along the Strolling Path?

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: You should try harder. At everything, you know?

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: This is me talking. See? I'm talking.

string.name: c19_s4
string.value: Don't ask me how pet feed tastes. Taste it yourself.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'm holding out for a better offer. You understand, right?

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Forget it! Why don't we just go and hunt?

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I don't want to right now.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Can you really run with those short legs?

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Tell me about your favorite holidays.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: Your arms and limbs are really stumpy!

string.name: c20_f1
string.value: We all speak different languages, you know.

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: I can't talk to other pets. We don't speak the same language.

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: You can force me to talk, but it doesn't mean I'll like it!

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: Your head is as big as my tummy!

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: Once upon a time there was a ducky named Ducky...

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: I have my own unique style. Can you see it?

string.name: c21_f2
string.value: I'm not a dog... Wait, am I?

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Should we visit Henesys Pig Farm?

string.name: f1_f
string.value: I'm going to throw up if I eat another bite.

string.name: f2_f
string.value: I think... I think I ate too much.

string.name: s2
string.value: Huh? What do you want me to say?

string.name: s3
string.value: I know you want me to, but I won't do it.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: You make me so sad! Caw.

string.name: c11_s3
string.value: Nothing's gonna ever keep you down! Caw.

string.name: c12_f2
string.value: Food or shinies. Don't need anything else, caw.

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: I'm in a bad mood! Caw.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I don't feel like doing that. Caw.

string.name: c12_s1
string.value: Today is a happy day. Caw.

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: Love is like a flower. You water it, caw.

string.name: c12_s4
string.value: Master, I'm so lucky to have met you. Caw.

string.name: c13_s2
string.value: Could YOU do it on command? Caw.

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: Sure, just point me towards your car, caw.

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: Ugh, you can't POSSIBLY be serious. Caw.

string.name: c14_f4
string.value: I think I'm running on empty. Caw.

string.name: c14_s1
string.value: I'd been holding it in! Caw.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: What a workout. Now I'm hungry. Caw.

string.name: c15_f1
string.value: Feed me! Feed me! Feed me! Caw.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: Okay, here I go! Hrrrkk! Caw.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: I came, I cawed, I conquered!

string.name: c16_f1
string.value: How can I sleep here? Caw.

string.name: c16_f3
string.value: I'm not sleepy right now. Caw.

string.name: c16_f4
string.value: No! No! No way! Caw caw.Caw caw.caw.

string.name: c17_f1
string.value: Why don't YOU get some sleep? Caw caw.

string.name: c17_f2
string.value: Caw caw.caw! Woof! I mean caw!

string.name: c17_f3
string.value: No! No! No way! Caw caw.Caw caw.caw.

string.name: c17_s4
string.value: I hope I dream of shiny things, caw.

string.name: c18_f1
string.value: Caw caw.caw! Woof! I mean caw!

string.name: c18_f2
string.value: No! No! No way! Caw caw.Caw caw.caw.

string.name: c19_f1
string.value: I'll talk if you feed me. Caw.

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: What you want me to say? Caw.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: Don't bother me, I'm meditating! Caw.

string.name: c19_f4
string.value: I'm too hungry to talk. Caw.

string.name: c19_s1
string.value: You're lucky I'm too small to use magic, caw.

string.name: c19_s2
string.value: Who's a pretty birdy? Tengu! Caw.

string.name: c19_s3
string.value: Some pets are scared of me. Do I look scary? Caw.

string.name: c2_f4
string.value: Caw caw caw! Woof! I mean caw!

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: Hang on. Just wait a moment, Caw caw..

string.name: c20_s1
string.value: I love sunny days. Usually! Caw.

string.name: c20_s2
string.value: Sure, I'm up for whatever. Caw caw caw.

string.name: c20_s3
string.value: Want to hear my story? Caw, caw.

string.name: c20_s4
string.value: I'm really sensitive, some would say that's a plus. Caw.

string.name: c21_f4
string.value: Let's talk again tomorrow. Caw caw.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: I sing better than I talk. Caw caw.

string.name: c21_s2
string.value: The world revolves, and I am part of the world. Caaw

string.name: c21_s3
string.value: I'm enjoying my me time right now. Caaw

string.name: c21_s4
string.value: Come to me whenever you need advice. Caaw

string.name: c3_f3
string.value: Ask me nicely. Poot... Caw caw.

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: Ew. I prefer clean places. Caw caw.

string.name: c3_s2
string.value: I'm pretty, and I listen. What a catch! Caw caw.

string.name: c3_s3
string.value: I feel like I'm on a picnic! Caw caw.

string.name: c3_s4
string.value: Master, you sit down too. Caw caw.

string.value: Huh? Did you say something? Caw caw.

string.value: Perfect! I was missing you. Caw caw caw.

string.value: I'm hungry... HINT, HINT! Caw caw caw.

string.value: Yip! What a nice breeze! Caw caw caw.

string.value: How dare you? Caw caw caw caw.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: Do you want to get scolded too? Caw caw caw caw caw caw!

string.name: c6_f4
string.value: No! No! No way! Caw caw caw caw caw.

string.value: Don't scold me. Caw caw caw.

string.value: Don't get angry! Caw caw caw.

string.value: Sometimes... I like it when you're mad. Caw caw caw.

string.name: c6_s4
string.value: Eek! I don't like this! Caw caw caw.

string.name: c7_f2
string.value: I don't understand you. Caw caw caw.

string.value: I'm going to hit you! Caw caw caw.

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: How could you say that? Caw caw caw.

string.name: c7_s3
string.value: Please cut me some slack. Caw caw caw.

string.name: c7_s4
string.value: I'll be more careful! I promise! Caw caw caw.

string.value: It's all a misunderstanding! Caw caw caw.

string.value: All you do is order me around. Caw caw caw caw caw.

string.value: I'm not scared of you! Caw caw caw!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: Stop telling me what to do, caw caw caw!

string.value: Stop scolding me! Caw caw caw!

string.value: I won't do it again! Caw caw caw!

string.value: I won't do that! Caw caw caw!

string.value: I messed up... Sorry... Caw caw caw!

string.value: You're the only one for me master! Caw caw.

string.value: Delicious! Caw caw caw! Caw caw caw!

string.value: Food is always good. Caw caw caw! Caw caw caw!

string.value: Mine! Caw caw caw! Caw caw caw!

string.value: Stop making me say strange things! Caw caw caw!

string.name: s4
string.value: I know you are but what am I. Caw caw caw!

string.value: How was my day at the office? It was ruff!

string.value: I'm so nice. I do whatever you say. I'm the best.

string.value: Sitting makes my butt look big!

string.name: c3_f4
string.value: No, I'm so short I don't need to!

string.name: c4_s3
string.value: I guess I could do that... THIS time.

string.value: I guess I should stay quiet.

string.value: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! Don't hurt me!

string.value: Oh yeah? Maybe I'll just stop eating!

string.value: You do that one more time, you'll never see me again.

string.value: I-It's a bit embarrassing... Let me just...

string.value: Now that you mention it, I love you too!

string.value: Are you saying you love me?

string.value: I guess I love you too?

string.value: Well, um... I kinda love you too!

string.value: That was a good one... ha ha...

string.value: Ha ha ha... What can I say?

string.value: Ahhh, that could heat an entire village for a month!

string.name: c14_s4
string.value: I-It's a bit embarrassing... Let me just...

string.value: How can I do that here?

string.value: Not here! I'll die of shame!

string.value: I feel like everyone is watching me.

string.name: c15_f4
string.value: I'll let you off for today...

string.value: Sorry, but I can't keep my eyes open...

string.name: c17_f4
string.value: I don't even have a blanket...

string.value: I don't want to go to bed...

string.value: I want to tell you about so many things...

string.value: I'd like to be alone now.

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I want something fancy to eat! Octopus balls!

string.value: Don't ever forget about me, okay?

string.value: My brain is just so full of... stuff!

string.value: Have you heard of the witch under the sea?

string.value: I'm going to bed. I'm full, I said...

string.value: Yetis and Pepes have such a nice friendship...

string.value: Should I train to be a thief? It looks like fun...

string.value: I think there's dirt on me!

string.value: Perfect! I was just about to call you!

string.value: Anything for the wonderful person who feeds me!

string.name: c4_s4
string.value: I listened well, now where's my reward?

string.name: c4_f1
string.value: Let's just hang around here for a while.

string.name: c4_f4
string.value: If you want a seat, just take one yourself.

string.name: c6_f3
string.value: I am so nice... You've hurt me.

string.name: c7_s1
string.value: I didn't know any better. Forgive me!

string.name: c7_s2
string.value: Please don't be mad. You're my only family.

string.name: c7_f4
string.value: I am starting to not like you.

string.name: c8_s1
string.value: If you stop being mad, I will give you 100 kisses!

string.name: c8_s2
string.value: I'm just trying to please you!

string.name: c8_s4
string.value: Please forgive me, just this once.

string.name: c8_f1
string.value: How can you get so mad?

string.name: c8_f2
string.value: This is boring. Let's play something else!

string.name: c8_f4
string.value: It was just a tiny mistake.

string.name: c11_s2
string.value: You can say that a hundred times, and I won't get tired of it.

string.name: c11_f4
string.value: Wow... Are you falling in love with me?

string.name: c12_s3
string.value: You're the best master. I'll follow you forever!

string.name: c12_f3
string.value: That's nice... But you smell funny.

string.name: c12_f4
string.value: I don't have the energy to reply.

string.name: c14_s3
string.value: I clean up after myself. I'm so squeaky clean!

string.name: c14_f1
string.value: So many eyes here, I can't poop...

string.name: c14_f2
string.value: I can't just go anywhere! Eww!

string.name: c15_s1
string.value: Look at it! I sculpted it to look like you.

string.name: c15_s2
string.value: It feels soooooo good to go.

string.name: c15_s4
string.value: Watch out! Don't step on my poop!

string.name: c15_f2
string.value: I just went. Did you forget?

string.value: I think there's something wrong with you.

string.value: Are you sleepy? I'm not sleepy.

string.value: I don't think it's time to sleep yet.

string.value: I sleep better when I'm near you.

string.value: I want to sleep on your lap...

string.value: I am in no mood to sleep!

string.value: I will rest while I sit...

string.value: You are so awesome today! I think I am in love!

string.value: You hunt. I'll feed you potions.

string.value: Nothing beats good food and a cuddle.

string.value: But I don't have anything to say...

string.name: c19_f2
string.value: Why is the sky so blue, then?

string.name: c19_f3
string.value: I don't talk. That's how I am.

string.value: I am not talking to you because I like you.

string.value: We all speak different languages, you know.

string.value: What do I need to say?

string.name: c20_f2
string.value: Are you bored? Let's go get facials!

string.name: c20_f3

string.name: c20_f4
string.value: If you feed me a lot, I'll love you even more.

string.name: c21_s1
string.value: You're the best. Nobody gives me as much food as you!

string.value: Do you know how to use scrolls?

string.value: Take me for a walk. I'm a total chick magnet!

string.value: Can I have a cup of water first? And a story? And a kiss goodnight? And a...

string.value: I love... boxing! Would you have guessed?

string.value: You sleep. I'm gonna keep working hard.

string.value: I don't want to deal with you.

string.value: Am I human? Am I a fish?

string.value: How can you be so blunt?

string.value: I can't criticize your taste, but...

string.value: Sleeping at your side is the best!

string.value: You should try harder. At everything, you know?

string.value: This is me talking. See? I'm talking.

string.value: Sitting this much is bad for my hips!

string.value: Show me how to do it!

string.value: I can't talk to other pets. We don't speak the same language.

string.value: You can force me to talk, but it doesn't mean I'll like it!

string.value: Can you really run with those short legs?

string.value: Tell me about your favorite holidays.
